01021013	Tamen nio ko aŋkam popoŋana ki mbesooŋo moori lutuunu tomini ma tipet ma tiwe boozo . Pa ni tomini , ina nu lutum . ”
01021014	Tana mankwoono mbeŋbeŋŋana na , Abaraam imaŋga to ikam Agar ka narabu mi yok putuunu , mi iur sala ka bolboolo , to iur Agar ziru Ismael ma tila len . Ziru tipa ma tila , mi tiwwa pa lele bilimŋana ki Ber-Seba .
01021015	Mi yok kizin imap . To Agar izem lutuunu isu ke ta uunu ,
01021016	mi ila molo ri pini , to mbuleene isu ma imbotmbot . Pa leleene be ire lutuunu mi imeete pepe . Tana imbutultul , mi ziru lutuunu tikam tiŋiizi biibi .
01021017	Anutu ileŋ Agar lutuunu tiŋiizi kini to , Ŋgoŋana kini saamba kana , iboobo sula pa Agar ma iso : “ Agar , parei ? Lelem ipata mi moto pepe . Pa lutum ta ikenne mi itaŋtaŋ na , Anutu ileŋ tiŋiizi kini kek .
01021018	Lutum tana , nio ko aŋkam popoŋana kini ma tipet ma tiwe boozomen . Tana maŋga ma la mi teege su pa lutum mi witi ma imaŋga . ”
01021019	To Anutu ikam Agar mataana ma ikam pak mi ire yok touŋana ta , tau imbot kolouŋana pizin . Agar ikam yok putuunu kizin mi ila ma ikut . To imiili ma imar mini , mi ikam pa lutuunu ma iwin .
01021020	Timbotmbot su lele bilimŋana mi Anutu imboro Ismael ma iwe tomtom mi tiroono imbol pa uraata kamŋana . Mi ni peene kor kana ka tomtom .
01021021	Ni imbotmbot su lele bilimŋana ta zaana Paran na , mi naana ikam Aikuptu nan ta ma iwooli .
01021022	Indeeŋe tana , king Abimelek ziru Pikol , ta biibi kizin malmal kan kini na , ziru timar ki Abaraam be ziŋan tiso sua . King isu to iso pini ta kembei . Iso : “ Nio aŋute : Anutu ta ilae ku pa koroŋ boozomen ta kamam na .
01021023	Tana leleŋ be nu mbuk sua mbolŋana pio ila Anutu mataana ta kembei : Nu ko kam pakaamŋana sa pio , mi lutuŋ bizin , mi popoŋana tio tabe tipet pa kaimer i na pepe . Pa nio aŋkampewe u , tana nu irao kampe yo mi zin tomtom tau timbot toono ti ta we leembe pa i . ”
01021024	Mi Abaraam iso : “ Ina ambai . Nio aŋbuk sua be aŋkam ta kembei piom . ”
01021025	Mi Abaraam le sua ri pa Abimelek . Pa yok touŋana kini , ta mbesooŋo ki Abimelek tikam ma iwe len kek .
01021026	Tamen Abimelek iso : “ Wae , nio aŋute koroŋ tana som . Pa muŋgu nu so yo som tau . Asiŋ ikam mbulu tana ? Buri ŋonoono ta nu sotaara yo pa i , tabe aŋleŋ . ”
01021027	Tona Abaraam ikam sipsip mi makau pakan pa Abimelek , mi ziru timbuk sua be tiparlup zin .
01021028	Mi iyake sipsip paŋgarŋgaara popoŋan lamata mi ru tomen ma iur zin lae .
01021029	To Abimelek iwi i ma iso : “ Uunu parei ta nu yake zin sipsip tana ma tilae ? ”
01021030	Abaraam ipekel kwoono ma iso : “ Iŋgi nio aŋkam pu , bekena nu ute kat ta kembei : Nio ta aŋtou yok tana . ”
01021031	Tanata tiwatwaata lele tana be Ber-Seba . Paso , ziru timbuk sua mi tipombol isu tana .
01021032	Tana ziru timbuk sua isu Ber-Seba be tiparlup zin , to Abimelek ziru Pikol , timiili mini ma tila pa lele kizin Pilistia .
01021033	Mi Abaraam ipaaza ke tamarisk ta isu Ber-Seba , mi isuŋ pa Merere ta imbotmbot ma alok i .
01021034	Mi Abaraam imbotmbot isu toono kizin Pilistia ma molo .
01022001	Kaimer to Anutu itoombo Abaraam . Aigule ta na , iboobi . Iso : “ Abaraam , Abaraam ! ” Abaraam ipekel kalŋaana ma iso : “ Oi , nio ituŋ ti . ”
01022002	To Anutu iso : “ Nu lutum tamen ŋonoono ta Isak . Mi lelem pini ilip kat . Tamen koozi kami , mi niomru kala lele pakaana ki Moria . Kala , to kasala pa abal tabe aŋso u pa i . To puni ma imeete mi neeni be iwe patoronŋana pio . ”
01022003	Tana kozeere , to Abaraam imaŋga , mi ipaala ke mi ituugu , to iur sala doŋki . Tona ikam lutuunu Isak mi mbesooŋo kini ru , mi ziŋan timaŋga ma tipa ma tila pa lele ta Anutu iso i pa i .
01022004	Tipa pa aigule ru , mi so iwe tel pa , to Abaraam mataana ila na , ire la pa lele ta tisombe tila pa i .
01022005	To iso pa mbesooŋo kini ru tana . Iso : “ Niomru kombot tiŋgi raama doŋki . Mi nio niamru lutuŋ ko amla lele pakaana taŋga be amsuŋ . Tona amiili ma amar mini . ”
01022006	To Abaraam ikam ke tabe ineene patoronŋana pa i , mi ikam la ki lutuunu Isak ma ikwaara , mi ni ikam you mi buza , mi ziru tipa ma tila .
01022007	Tiwwa ma tila , mi Isak iso pa tamaana Abaraam . Iso : “ Wae tamaŋ ! ” Abaraam iso : “ Lutuŋ , parei ? ” Isak iso : “ You ma ke , ta takam i . Mi sipsip iŋgoi , tabe tapatoron Merere pa i ? ”
01022008	To Abaraam iso : “ Lutuŋ , sipsip na , Anutu itunu ko ikam piti be tapatoroni pa . ” Abaraam iso ta kembei , mi ziru tipa ma tila .
01022009	Ziru tila ma tipet lele tau Anutu iso Abaraam pa na , to Abaraam iŋgas pat ma iwe patoronŋana muriini , mi isan ke isala pat ŋgasŋana tana . Tona ipo lutuunu Isak kumbuunu ma namaana mi iuri sala .
01022010	Mi ikam buza ma iwit namaana be iup su pa lutuunu .
01022011	Som , mi Ŋgoŋana saamba kana ki Merere iboobo sula pini ma iso : “ Abaraam , Abaraam ! ” Abaraam iso : “ Ituŋ ti . ”
01022012	To Ŋgoŋana tana iso : “ Nomom pasaana lutum mi kam kosa sa pini pepe ! Koozi mi nio aŋute kat : Nu mototo Anutu mi leŋleŋ la kalŋaana . Pa lutum tamen ŋonoono tina , nu ruuti pio som . ”
01022013	To Abaraam mataana ila na , ire sipsip ta ka kandaara ikoleege la ke namaana ma imbotmbot . Tana ila ma ikam sipsip tana , mi ipekel lutuunu mi ipatoron Merere pa .
01022014	Tana Abaraam ipaata lele tana zaana be ‘ Lele tau Merere ikam piti . ’ Tabe koozi tomini tomtom tiwatwaata abal tana be ‘ Lele ta Merere ikam piti . ’
01022015	To Ŋgoŋana ki Merere saamba kana iboobo sula pa Abaraam mini ma iso :
01022016	“ Iŋgi Merere itunu kalŋaana ta ima i . Nu leŋ la ni kalŋaana mi ruutu lutum tamenŋana tina pini som . Tana Merere imbuk sua mbolŋana pu , mi ipombol pa itunu zaana .
01022017	Sua ta kembei : Ni kola iur kampeŋana biibi kat ise ku , mi ikam popoŋana ku ma tipet ma tiwe boozomen kembei pitik ta timbot saamba i , mi magargaara ta tai kana i . Mi popoŋana ku tana ko timender mbolŋana pa malmal ma tilip pa kan koi bizin .
01022018	Paso , nu leŋ la Merere kalŋaana . Tana popoŋana ku ko tiwe zaala be kampeŋana biibi ise kizin wal boozomen ta timbotmbot su toono na . ”
01022019	Tona Abaraam ziru Isak timiili ma tisula mini ki mbesooŋo ru tau . Mi ziŋan timaŋga mi timiili pa lele Ber-Seba , to Abaraam ipun su tana .
01022020	Kaimer na , Abaraam ileŋ tiziini Naor kusiini Milka uruunu kembei ni ipeebe pikin pakan kek .
01022021	Mi lutuunu bizin ta zan tis : Uz ( ni muŋgamuŋga ) . To Bus , Kemuel ( Kemuel ti , ni Aram tamaana ) . To Kesed , Aso , Pildas , Yidlap , mi kaimerŋana kat na Betuel . ( Betuel ti , ni ta Rebeka tamaana ) . Zin lamata mi tel tina , ina Abaraam tiziini Naor ziru Milka lutun bizin .
01022022	
01022023	
01022024	Mi Naor , ni iwoolo moori toro tomini , zaana Reuma . Reuma , ni ipeebe pikin paŋ : Teba , Gaam , Taas , mi Maaka .
01023001	Ndaama ki Sara irao 127 , mana imeete su kar Kiriat Arba , ta imbot la lele pakaana ki Kanaan . ( Kiriat Arba zaana toro na , Ebron ) . Abaraam itaŋtaŋ pini ma som ,
01023002	
01023003	to izemi mi imaŋga ma ila kizin wal ki Et , mi iso pizin ta kembei . Iso :
01023004	“ Nio iŋgi aŋwe leembe pa lele ti , mi leŋ toono sa som . Tana ko parei ? Irao kere leŋ toono pakaana sa , be aŋgiimi ma iwe meeteŋan tiam murin , mi aŋur kusiŋ ilela ? ”
01023005	To zin wal ki Et tiso pini . Tiso : “ Biibi , leŋ . Nu kolman mi tomtom zomŋom ki Anutu ta mbotmbot raama yam i . Tana itum re lele iŋgoi ta ambai be kusim ilela . Mi kam ŋgar boozo pepe . Tomtom tiam tasa ko iruutu pu na som . ”
01023006	
01023007	Tona Abaraam imaŋga , mi ituundu pizin , mi iso pizin . Iso : “ Sombe koyok pio be aŋurpe leyam meeteŋan murin isu lele tiŋgi , na kala ki Zoar lutuunu Epron mi kiwi i pio , be ikam leŋ raŋ sumbuunu ta imbot toono kini Makpela zilŋaana na . Pa lele tana , ta aŋsombe aŋgiimi ma iwe leyam , mi aŋurpe ma iwe meeteŋan tiam murin . Mi kadoono piizi ta ni isombe leleene pa i , inako aŋkam pini . ”
01023008	
01023009	
01023010	Abaraam izzo sua tana pizin wal ki Et ta tilup zin su lupŋana muriini na , Epron itunu imbotmbot tomini . Tana imaŋga mi imender la iwal biibi matan , to ipekel Abaraam kalŋaana ta kembei . Iso :
01023011	“ O biibi tio leŋ , nio leleŋ be ŋgiimi toono tio pepe . Nio aŋbuk sua pu ila iwal ti matan ta kembei : Toono tana raama ka raŋ sumbuunu , ina nio aŋkam pu sorok , be iwe meeteŋan ku murin . La ma urpe kusim muriini mi uri lela . ”
01023012	Tona Abaraam ituundu pizin mini , mi iso pa Epron ila iwal ta boozomen matan ma iso :
01023013	“ Ina ambai . Mi tamen nio leleŋ be aŋgiimi kat toono tana . Tana toono kadoono ima muŋgu , tonabe aŋla ma aŋurpe kusiŋ muriini . ”
01023014	Epron ipekel Abaraam kalŋaana ma isombe :
01023015	“ Biibi , leŋ ! Toono tana kadoono irao kembei pat milmilŋan munŋaana ta ( 400 ) . Tamen toŋgo pa . Pa tomtom kembei ta iti na , tere pat tana kembei ta koroŋ sorok . La ma urpe kusim muriini . ”
01023016	Abaraam ileŋ Epron kalŋaana , to inin le pat milmilŋan irao munŋaana ta ( 400 ) , kembei ta ni iso na .
01023017	Tanata toono ki Epron ta imbot la Makpela mi igarau pa Mamre na , raama ka raŋ sumbuunu mi ke boozomen ta timbot pa toono tana , ina Abaraam iŋgiimi ma iwe lene . Mi wal boozomen ki Et ta timbotmbot pa lupŋana tana na , tileŋ sua tana mi tire kat koroŋ ki matan . To Abaraam ila ma iurpe kusiini Sara mi iuri ilela raŋ sumbuunu ta imbot pa toono Makpela , mi igarau pa kar Mamre na . ( Kar Mamre , zaana toro Ebron . )
01023018	
01023019	
01023020	Tana toono pakaana tana raama ka raŋ sumbuunu , ina zin wal ki Et tikam ma iwe Abaraam lene , be iurpe ma iwe meeteŋan kini murin .
01024001	Merere iur kampeŋana matakiŋa boozo ise ki Abaraam , mi ila ila ma Abaraam iwe kolman kat .
01024002	To aigule ta na , Abaraam isu mi iso pa mbesooŋo kini mataana kana tau imborro koroŋ kini ta boozomen i , ma iso : “ Leŋ . Nio leleŋ be nu ur nomom ise mbasaŋoŋ mi mbuk sua mbolŋana pio pa Merere ta imborro saamba mi toono na zaana ta kembei : Zin Kanaan ta itiŋan tombotmbot i , na nu ko irao kam moori kizin sa pa lutuŋ Isak pepe .
01024003	
01024004	Kozo miili ma la pa toono tio mi wal tio , mi roogo moori sa ta niamŋan uyam tamen na , mi kami ma kamar . ”
01024005	Mbesooŋo kini ileŋ sua tana , to iwi i ma iso : “ Mi sombe moori leleene be izem lele kini ma niamru amar toono tiŋgi som , nako parei ? Ko aŋur lutum ma imiili ma ila mini pa toono ta nu zem na ? ”
01024006	Abaraam ipekel kwoono ma iso : “ Som kat ! Ur lutuŋ ma imiili mini pa kar muŋguŋana ta aŋzem na pepe .
01024007	Pa Merere Anutu saamba kana , ta ikam yo ma aŋzem tamaŋ bizin mi toono tio na , ni imbuk sua be ikam toono ta tiŋgi pio mi zin popoŋana tio . Ni itunu ko iŋgo aŋela kini ma imuuŋgu pu . Tana nu ko rao ndeeŋe moori sa pa lutuŋ isu tiŋga .
01024008	Tamen sombe moori mburaana be niomru kimiili ma kamar lele tiŋgi som , inako sua mbukŋana ku taiŋgi iwe pataŋana pu som . Mi motom iŋgal , kam lutuŋ ma imiili ma ila mini pa kar tio muŋguŋana pepe . ”
01024009	Abaraam iso makiŋ , to mbesooŋo tana iur namaana ise Abaraam mbasaŋana , mi imbuk sua pini be ito sua kini tana .
01024010	Tona mbesooŋo ikam kamel laamuru ki biibi kini mi koroŋ ambaimbaiŋan matakiŋa tomini , mi imaŋga raama ma ila . Ipa ma ila lele molo ki Mesopotamia . Ila igarau kar ki Naor ,
01024011	mi rorou , to keteene su yok touŋana ta imbot igarau kar . Kar tana ka moori bizin , rorou to tilala be tise kan yok isu tana .
01024012	Tana mbesooŋo isu mi isuŋ ta kembei . Iso : “ O Merere Anutu ki biibi tio Abaraam , koozi swe kampeŋana ku pa biibi tio , mi lae tio mi kam ma uraata tio iur ŋonoono . Leleŋ be kam ta kembei :
01024013	Nio ko aŋmender kolouŋana pa yok touŋana ti . Mi iŋgi be zin moori kar kan timar ma tise yok i .
01024014	Tana nio ko aŋso pa moori sa be ise koŋ yok . Mi sombe ni ipekel sua tio ta kembei : ‘ Ina ambai . Nio ko aŋse kom be win . Mi ko aŋse yok pizin kamel ku tomini . ’ Sombe ni iso ta kembei , inako moori ta tana tabe aŋkami pa mbesooŋo ku Isak . Naso aŋute kembei nu motom iŋgalŋgal sua ta mbuk pa biibi tio Abaraam na , mi urur lelem pini . ”
01024015	Ni izuŋzuŋ , mi moori ta , ni ikuundu kuuru mi imar pa yok touŋana tana . Moori tina zaana Rebeka , mi tamaana Betuel . Betuel , ni Naor mi Milka lutun . Mi Naor , ni Abaraam tiziini .
01024016	Rebeka , ni moori kaibiim kat , mi tomooto tasa ire i zen . Ni isula yok touŋana ma ise ka yok ila kuuru kini , mi ikuundu ma ise mini ,
01024017	to mbesooŋo tana ipaŋuru i ma ila , mi iso pini . Iso : “ Ai , irao liŋ koŋ yok risa ma aŋwin ? ”
01024018	Rebeka ipekel kalŋaana ma iso : “ Biibi tio , is , win . ” To loŋa mi iur kuuru isu mi ise ka yok ma iwin .
01024019	Iwin makiŋ , to Rebeka iso : “ Nio ko aŋse kamel ku kan yok ma tiwin ma irao zin tomini . ”
01024020	Tana karau men mi iliŋ yok isula zwor kizin kamel mi ila ma ise mini . Inoknok ma kamel ta boozomen tiwin ma timap .
01024021	Mi mbesooŋo , ni imbotmbot , mi irre i men mi ikam ŋgar ta kembei : Pai kini ko iur ŋonoono , som som ?
01024022	Zin kamel tiwin ma tirao , tona ni ikam ŋooro milmilŋana ma iur la Rebeka kuzuunu , mi ikam ŋgeeme milmilŋan bibip ru ma izun sala Rebeka namaana .
01024023	To iwi lae pini ma iso : “ Nu tomom asiŋ ? Ko niam irao amkeene ruumu kini pa mbeŋ ta koozi ? ”
01024024	Mi Rebeka ipekel kalŋaana ma iso : “ Nio Betuel lutuunu moori , mi tumbuŋ bizin Naor mi Milka .
01024025	Ruumu tiam , iŋga irao . Mi zin mbili tomini na , kan kini irao . ”
01024026	Tona mbesooŋo ilek kumbuunu mi ituundu su toono , mi ipakur Merere ta kembei .
01024027	Iso : “ Nio aŋpakur Merere Anutu ki biibi tio Abaraam . Pa ni itoto sua ta imbuk pa biibi tio Abaraam mi iurur leleene pini . Tanata ipaŋgutŋguutu yo ma aŋmar aŋpet mi aŋdeeŋe kat Abaraam itunu wal kini tau . ”
01024028	Tona Rebeka iloondo ma ila , mi isotaara naana pa mbulu boozomen ta ipet pini su yok touŋana na .
01024029	Beso Rebeka toono Laban ire ŋooro milmilŋana ta imbot la lunuri kuzuunu , mi ŋgeeme milmilŋan ru ta isala namaana , mi ileŋ ka sua ta boozomen na , iloondo karau men ma ila pa yok touŋana be ire mbesooŋo tana . Beso ipet yok touŋana uunu na , ire i imendernder raama kamel kini .
01024030	
01024031	Ipet kini , to iso : “ O kampeŋana ki Merere ko imbotmbot se ku . Parei ta nu mendernder mat ? Mar ma tala ruumu . Pa nio aŋurpe nu niomŋan kamel ku muriyom kek . ”
01024032	Tana mbesooŋo ikam zin kamel mi ziŋan tila ruumu ki Laban . To Laban ikam mburu ma isu pizin kamel , mi ikam kan mbutmbuutu ma tikan . Mi ikam yok ma ila pa mbesooŋo ki Abaraam ziŋan zin wal ta tigaabi na , be tiŋguuru kumbun pa .
01024033	Mi tiurpe kini pini mi tiur su kereene uunu be ikan . Tamen ni iso : “ Kini ti imbot muŋgu . Pa nio leŋ sua piom . ” Laban iso : “ Ambai . So yam lak . ”
01024034	Tona mbesooŋo imaŋga mi iso ta kembei . Iso : “ Nio mbesooŋo ki Abaraam . Ni , Merere Anutu ikampe i ma biibi kat , tana iwe tomtom zaanaŋana mi mbio uunu . Ni le makau , sipsip , mekmek , doŋki , mi kamel boozo kat . Mi le pat milmilŋan boozo , mi mbesooŋo tomooto mi moori boozo tomini .
01024035	
01024036	Biibi tio Abaraam kusiini Sara iwe kolmannan kat mi ipeebe Abaraam le pikin tomooto ta . Mi ni iur koroŋ kini ta munŋaana men be iwe lutuunu tana lene .
01024037	Mi biibi tio iso pio ma aŋbuk sua mbolŋana pini ta kembei : Zin Kanaan ta ni ziŋan timbotmbot na , nio irao aŋkam moori kizin sa pa lutuunu Isak na som .
01024038	Bela aŋla pa itunu wal kini mi aŋru moori sa pa lutuunu .
01024039	Mi indeeŋe tau nio be aŋmaŋga ma aŋmar i na , aŋwi biibi tio ta kembei . Aŋso : ‘ Mi sombe moori tana mburaana be niamŋan amar som , inako parei ? ’
01024040	Mi ni ipekel kalŋoŋ ma isombe : ‘ Merere ta imbotmbot raama yo mi aŋbesmbeeze pini i , ni ko iŋgo aŋela kini ma igaabu mi niomru kala , bekena uraata ku iur ŋonoono . Tana nu ko rao kam moori tasa ki wal ki tamaŋ bizin pa lutuŋ Isak .
01024041	Mi sombe wal tio tiyok som , inako sua ku mbukŋana tana iwe pataŋana pu som . ’ ”
01024042	To mbesooŋo iseeŋge sua kini mini ma iso : “ Koozi nio aŋmar yok touŋana na , aŋsuŋ ta kembei : ‘ O Merere Anutu ki biibi tio Abaraam , sombe nu lelem be uraata tio iur ŋonoono , na lae tio be mbulu ta kembei ipet :
01024043	Nio ko aŋbot kolouŋana pa yok touŋana ti . Mi sombe moori sa imar be ise yok , na nio ko aŋso pini be ikam koŋ yok risa ma aŋwin . Mi sombe ni ipekel ma iso : ‘ Ina ambai . Ko aŋse kom yok risa be win . Mi ko aŋse pizin kamel ku tomini be tiwin . ’ Sombe ipekel ta kembena , na moori ta nu itum roogi pa biibi tio lutuunu na , ni ta tina . ’
01024044	
01024045	Nio aŋzuŋzuŋ la leleŋ , mi motoŋ ila na , aŋre Rebeka ikuundu kuuru mi ipa ma imar . Ni isula ma ise yok makiŋ , to aŋso lae pini be ikam koŋ yok risa ma aŋwin .
01024046	To ni loŋa men mi iur kuuru kini isu , mi iso : ‘ Is , win . Mi kamel ku tomini , ko aŋse kan ma tiwin . ’ Tana nio aŋwin , mi ni ise yok pizin kamel tio tomini ma tiwin ma tirao .
01024047	Tabe aŋwi i ma aŋso : ‘ Nu asiŋ lutuunu moori ? ’ Mi ni iso : ‘ Nio tamaŋ Betuel . Mi tumbuŋ bizin Naor mi Milka . ’ Indeeŋe nio aŋleŋ sua tina , tona aŋkam ŋooro ma aŋur ila kuzuunu , mi aŋzun ŋgeeme ru sala namaana .
01024048	Tona aŋlek kumbuŋ mi aŋtuundu su toono , mi aŋpakur Merere Anutu ki biibi tio Abaraam . Paso , ni ipaŋgutŋguutu yo ma aŋmar aŋpet ma aŋdeeŋe kat biibi tio tumbuunu moori be aŋkami pa lutuunu .
01024049	Tana koozi , sombe niom kakampe biibi tio mi koto mbulu ki toŋmatiziŋ ma koyok , na koso kat sua ma aŋleŋ . Mi sombe som , na kosotaara yo bekena aŋru zaala toro sa . ”
01024050	Tona Laban ziru Betuel tipekel kalŋaana ma tiso : “ Mbulu taiŋgi ipet pa Anutu itunu tau . Tana niamru amrao amso sua sa som .
01024051	Rebeka , ni imbotmbot i . Kami mi niomru kala , bekena iwe biibi ku lutuunu kusiini , kembei ta Merere itunu iso na . ”
01024052	Mbesooŋo ki Abaraam ileŋ sua tana , to iŋgun kumbuunu mi ituundu su toono mi ipakur Merere .
01024053	Tona ikam yorondiŋ mi natabu , mi koroŋ milmilŋan pakan , mi mburu ndabokbokŋan ma ikam pa Rebeka . Mi ikam Rebeka toono Laban ziru naana len koroŋ ambaimbaiŋan tomini bekena iroogokaala Rebeka pa Isak .
01024054	To ziŋan wal kini tikan kini mi tikeene . Mankwoono na , timaŋga to ni iso : “ Nio leleŋ be aŋmiili ma aŋla mini ki biibi tio . Parei , niom koyok ? ”
01024055	Tamen Rebeka toono Laban mi naana tiso : “ E-e , kala loŋa pepe . Moori ti ko itiŋan tombot ŋana ri muŋgu , mana ko niomŋan kala . ”
01024056	Tamen mbesooŋo iso pizin . Iso : “ Kuruutu yo pepe . Koyok pio mibe loŋa aŋmiili ma aŋla ki biibi tio . Pa Merere ilae tio , mi ikam ma uraata tio iur ŋonoono kek . ”
01024057	To ziru tiso : “ Kenako toboobo Rebeka ma imar , mi tiwi i ten . ”
01024058	Tana tiboobo Rebeka ma imar , to tiwi i . Tiso : “ Parei , nu lelem sombe niomru tomtom ti kala ta buri ? ” Mi ni ipekel kwon ma iso : “ E , nio leleŋ be aŋla . ”
01024059	Tabe tiur Rebeka ziru moori tabe mataana pini i , be ziŋan mbesooŋo ki Abaraam mi wal kini tila .
01024060	Mi tipombol Rebeka pa sua ta kembei . Tisombe : “ Luyamri , nu ko we tomtom munŋaana ka tieene nan . Mi popoŋana ku ko tikas kan koi bizin , mi tikam toono kizin . ”
01024061	Tona Rebeka ziŋan zin mbesooŋo moori kini tise kamel , mi timaŋga be tila . Tana mbesooŋo ki Abaraam ikam Rebeka ma ziŋan timiili ma tila .
01024062	Indeeŋe mazwaana tana , Isak imbotmbot lele pakaana ki Negeb . Imbot lele bilimŋana ta igarau yok touŋana ta zaana Laai-Roi .
01024063	Rorou ta na , ni ipera mat bekena iwwa lene ri . Mi mataana ila na , ire zin kamel timar .
01024064	Mi Rebeka tomini mataana ila na , ire la pa Isak imar . Tana izem kamel kini , mi isu toono ,
01024065	mi iwi mbesooŋo ki Abaraam ma iso : “ Tomtom ta ipa ma imar i , iŋga asiŋ ? ” Mi mbesooŋo iso : “ Iŋga biibi tio . ” To Rebeka ikam kawaala mi ipakaala mataana .
01024066	Tana Isak imar ipet kizin , to mbesooŋo iso i pa mbulu boozomen ta ipet pini isu lele ki Mesopotamia na .
01024067	To Isak ikam Rebeka ma tilela beeze ta muŋgu naana Sara imbotmbot pa na , mi ziru tiwoolo . Mi Isak , ni leleene ilip kat pa Rebeka . Tabe mataana mbeleele naana ta imeete na , mi leleene ipata pini mini som .
01025001	Kaimer to , Abaraam iwoolo moori toro , zaana Ketura .
01025002	Ketura , ni ipeebe pikin lamata mi ta . Pikin ta zan tis : Simran , Yoksan , Medan , Midian , Isbak , mi Sua .
01025003	Yoksan , ni ipeebe Seba mi Dedan . Mi Dedan , ni popoŋana kini ta zin wal ki Asur , Letus , mi Leum .
01025004	Midian , ni lutuunu bizin zan ta Epa , Eper , Anok , Abida , mi Elda . Ina zin tana , ta tiyooto pa Ketura .
01025005	Abaraam ikam koroŋ kini ta boozomen ila ki lutuunu Isak .
01025006	Tamen indeeŋe ta ni imbotmbot men na , ni ikam sorok koroŋ kini pakan pa lutuunu bizin pakan , to iur zin ma tila len pa lele pakaana ki zoŋ uunu . Pa leleene be tigarau lutuunu Isak pepe .
01025007	Abaraam , mbotŋana kini ambai men ma iwe kolman kat . Mi ndaama kini irao 175 , mana imeete ma ila igaaba zin wal kini ta timeete muŋgu na .
01025008	
01025009	Mi lutuunu bizin ru , Isak ziru Ismael , ta tiuri lela naala raŋŋana su toono Makpela ta igarau pa kar Mamre na . Muŋgu , toono tana , ki Zoar lutuunu Epron . Zoar , ni uunu kini imar pa Et .
01025010	Toono Makpela tana , ina Abaraam iŋgiimi la kizin Et . Toono tana , ta titwi Abaraam ziru kusiini Sara sula pa .
01025011	Abaraam imeete , to Anutu iur kampeŋana kini ise ki lutuunu Isak . Indeeŋe tana , Isak imbotmbot igarau yok touŋana ta tipaata be Laai-Roi .
01025012	Iŋgi Abaraam lutuunu Ismael ziŋan popoŋana kini mbol kizin . Agar , ta Aikuptu nan mi mbesooŋo moori ki Sara na , ta ipeebe Abaraam le pikin tomooto ta zaana Ismael . Mi Ismael , ni ipeebe Nebaiot , Kedar , Adbel , Mipsam , Misma , Duma , Masa , Adad , Tamar , Yetur , Napis , mi Kedema .
01025013	
01025014	
01025015	
01025016	Ismael lutuunu bizin tina tipet ma tiwe uunu laamuru mi ru , mi tila timbot pa lele kizin kizin .
01025017	Ismael , ndaama kini irao 137 , to imeete ma ila igaaba zin wal kini ta timeete kek na .
01025018	Mi popoŋana kini tila ma timbot la lele ki Abila mi Sur mazwan . Lele tina igarau pa toono ki Aikuptu ka seŋgaaŋa mi zaala ta ila pa lele kizin Asiria . Mi Ismael popoŋana kini tana ziŋan zin toŋmatiziŋ kizin na , gorgori tiparzorzooro mi tiparwe kan koi .
01025019	Iŋgi Abaraam lutuunu Isak ziŋan popoŋana kini mbol kizin .
01025020	Indeeŋe ndaama ki Isak irao tomtooru ( 40 ) , to iwoolo Rebeka . Rebeka tamaana zaana Betuel . Ni uunu kini ipet pa Aram , mi imbotmbot la lele pakaana ki Mesopotamia . Mi Rebeka toono , ni zaana Laban .
01025021	Rebeka , ni koposomŋana . Tana Isak isuŋ Merere be iuuli . Mi Merere ileŋ suŋŋana kini , to Rebeka kopoono .
01025022	Pikin tana boogo tau . Mi timbulmbuulu lele lela nan kopoono . Tana Rebeka iso : “ Wai , parei ta mbulu ti ipet pio i ? ” Mi ila isuŋ Merere be ipaute i pa ka uunu .
01025023	To Merere iso pini ta kembei . Iso : “ Ina tomtom un ru ta timbot lela kopom na . Pa wal ru ko tiyooto pu , mi tipeete zin ma tiparmbot molo pizin . Ta ko mburaana ilip pa toro . Mi kolmanŋana ko imbeeze pa kaimerŋana . ”
01025024	Indeeŋe Rebeka ikam tomtom na , ipeebe pikin boogo ma tisu .
01025025	Muŋgamuŋga na , kuliini siŋsiŋŋana mi rumunrumunŋana . Tana tipaata zaana be Isau .
01025026	To tiziini na , isou kiskis toono kumbu ŋuzuunu mi isu . Tana tipaata zaana be Yakop . Indeeŋe pikin ru tana tisu na , Isak ndaama kini irao tomto tel ( 60 ) .
01025027	Timbotmbot ma pikin ru tana titum ma tiwe tomtom . Isau , ni tomtom ki buzur ruŋana mi kumbu paipaiŋana . Tamen Yakop , ni tomtom manneŋana mi imborro uraata kar kana .
01025028	Tana Isak leleene ilip pa Isau . Pa leleene be ikanan buzur su kana . Mi Rebeka na , leleene ilip pa Yakop .
01025029	Aigule ta na , Yakop iurpe yambon ambaiŋana ma inoinoi , mi Isau imbot su mi ipet . Mi peteli ma isaana kat .
01025030	Tana ipet to , iso pa Yakop : “ Aiss , nio ti petel yo ma aŋsaana kat . Yambon siŋsiŋŋana tina , zoobo koŋ sa imar , be aŋwin ta buri . ” ( Tanata tipaata Isau zaana toro be Edom ) .
01025031	Tamen Yakop iso : “ Ambai . Mita irao be taparpekel murindi , mi nio aŋkam murim ma aŋwe pikin muŋgamuŋga ? ”
01025032	To Isau iso : “ Aiss , muriŋ muŋgamuŋga na koroŋ sorok . Aŋgo pa kosa i . Mi yambon imar ma aŋwin lak . Pa iŋgi be aŋmeete i . ”
01025033	Yakop iso : “ Ta nu yok kat mi mbuk sua pio muŋgu mi pombol ma imbol kat . ” Tona Isau imbuk sua pini , mi ipombol ma imbol kat be ziru tiparpekel murin ma Yakop iwe pikin muŋgamuŋga .
01025034	Imbuk sua pini makiŋ , to Yakop ikam ka narabu mi yambon ma ikan mi iwin . To imaŋga ma ila ne . Tana Isau irepiili muriini muŋgamuŋga kembei koroŋ sorok .
01026001	Indeeŋe tana , peteele biibi toro ipet su toono Kanaan , kembei ta muŋgu ipet pa mazwaana ki Abaraam na . Tabe Isak imaŋga mi isombe iko ma isula pa lele kizin Aikuptu . Iwwa ma ila , to ipet kar Gerar . Kar tina , king kizin Pilistia ta zaana Abimelek , ni imborro .
01026002	Isak imbotmbot su kar tina , mi Merere ipet kini mi iso pini ta kembei : “ Sula pa lele kizin Aikuptu pepe . Mbotmbot lele ta aŋso u pa na .
01026003	Naso aŋbotmbot raamu , mi aŋkampe u . Pa toono ta boozomen tiŋgi , kola aŋkam ma iwe nu mi zin popoŋana ku leyom . Mi sua ta muŋgu aŋbuk la ki Abaraam mi aŋpombol , nako imbol ma imbotmbot men .
01026004	Nio kola aŋkam popoŋana ku ma tipet ma tiwe munŋaana ka tieene kembei pitik ta timbot sala saamba na . Mi aŋkam toono tiŋgi ma imap ma iwe len . Mi popoŋana ku tana ko tiwe zaala be kampeŋana biibi ise kizin wal boozomen ta timbotmbot toono na .
01026005	Kola aŋkam ta kembena . Paso , tomom Abaraam , ni ileŋleŋ la kalŋoŋ mi ito kat . Mi itoto tutu tio mi sua boozomen ta aŋur pini na . ”
01026006	Tana Isak isula Aikuptu som , mi imbotmbot su kar Gerar .
01026007	Tamen indeeŋe zin tomooto ki kar tana tiwi Isak pa kusiini na , ni iso : “ Iŋgi nio luŋri . ” Iso sua tana paso , Rebeka , ni moori kaibiim kat . Tana Isak imoto : Kokena tipuni ma imeete mi tikam kusiini .
01026008	Isak imbotmbot kar tana ma molo ŋana ri . To aigule ta na , Abimelek ta king kizin Pilistia na , imender la miiri kwoono mi mataana ila , to ire Isak imbeŋbeeŋe pa Rebeka .
01026009	Tabe Abimelek iboobo Isak ma imar , mi iso pini : “ Wae , ina sa nu kusim na ! Parei ta nu so nu lumri ? ” Isak ipekel kalŋaana ma iso : “ Nio aŋkam ta kembena paso , aŋmoto : Kokena kupun yo ma aŋmeete mi kakam kusiŋ . ”
01026010	To Abimelek iso : “ Oo , parei ta nu kam pakaamŋana piam ta kembei ? Kozobe tomooto sa ziru kusim tikeene , so amkam sanaana biibi mi pataŋana ise tiam . ”
01026011	Tona Abimelek iur sua pa tomtom kini ta boozomen ma isombe : “ Keleŋ ! Tomtom tasa isombe imbuulu tomtom taiŋgi , som kusiini , nako imeete . ”
01026012	Indeeŋe ndaama tana na , Isak ipaaza kini isula toono tana ma ŋonoono ipet ma irao kembei tomto lamataŋa . Pa Merere ikampe i kat .
01026013	Tabe ni iwe tomtom biibi . Pa ka kini mi le mburu boozomen . Mi ila ila ma irao ni iwe mbio uunu kat .
01026014	Ni le mbili matakiŋa boozo kat . Mi mbesooŋo kini ta kembena , boozomen . Tana zin Pilistia kan matan mburmbur pini ,
01026015	mi tikam toono mi tilol yok touŋan boozomen ta muŋgu zin mbesooŋo ki Abaraam tikel na .
01026016	Tona king Abimelek iso pa Isak : “ Zem lele tiam tiŋgi mi la lem . Pa nu mburom ilip piam kek . ”
01026017	Tana Isak imaŋga , to izem zin , mi ila ma itu su lele keteeneŋana ta zaana Gerar .
01026018	To yok touŋan ta muŋgu zin mbesooŋo ki Abaraam tikel mi zin Pilistia tilol na , ni itou mi iurpe mini , mi iwatwaata zan tau muŋgu tamaana iwatwaata na .
01026019	To zin mbesooŋo kini tila ma tikel toono sumbuunu toro isu lele tana ma tindeeŋe yok bukbuk ma ise .
01026020	Tamen zin mboroŋan kizin sipsip ki kar Gerar ziŋan zin mbesooŋo ki Isak ta timborro sipsip kini na , tisu mi tiŋooŋo pa yok tana . Zin Gerar kan tiso ina zin kizin . Mi zin mboroŋan ki Isak tiso : “ Som , ina niam tiam . ” Tanata tipaata yok touŋana tana zaana be ‘ Yok Ŋoŋi Kana . ’ Pa tiŋooŋo pa tau .
01026021	Tona zin mbesooŋo kini tikel yok touŋana toro . Tamen wal pakan tiŋooŋo pa yok tana tomini . Tana tipaata yok tana zaana be ‘ Yok Ki Parzooroŋana . ’
01026022	To Isak izem lele pakaana tana , mi ila ma ikel yok touŋana toro . Mi yok touŋana tina , tiŋooŋo pa som . Tana Isak ipaata yok tana zaana be ‘ Mazwaana Biibi . ’ Pa isombe : “ Koozi , Merere iur lele ta irao piti . Tana iŋgi be tombot ambai su toono ti ma tamasak . ”
01026023	To Isak imaŋga mini , mi isala pa kar Ber-Seba .
01026024	Mi mbeŋ na , Merere ila ipet kini , mi iso pini ta kembei . Iso : “ Nio Anutu ki tomom Abaraam . Moto pepe . Pa motoŋ iŋgalŋgal mbesooŋo tio Abaraam . Tana nio kola aŋbotmbot raamu mi aŋkampe u , mi aŋkam ma popoŋana ku tipet ma tiwe boozomen . ”
01026025	To Isak iŋgas pat ma iwe patoronŋana muriini , mi isuŋ pa Merere isu lele tana . Mi itu su lele tana , mi mbesooŋo kini tikel yok touŋana toro .
01026026	Kaimer mana Abimelek , ni izem kar Gerar mi imar be ire Isak . Imar ramaki tomtom kini ŋgarŋana ta zaana Ausat , mi biibi kizin malmal kan kini , zaana Pikol . Zin tel tana timar ma tipet ki Isak ,
01026027	to ni iso pizin ta kembei . Iso : “ Niom kuur koi pio mi kiziiri yo pa toono tiom kek . Mi iŋgi parei ta kamar tio mini ? ”
01026028	To zin tel mi tiso : “ Niam amkilaala kek ta kembei : Nu , Merere imbotmbot raamu . Tana amsombe itiŋan tumbuk sua be taparlup ti ma tewe tamen .
01026029	Naso nu pasaana yam som , kembei ta muŋgu niam ampasaanu som , mi amkampe u , mi amzemu ma la raama lelem ambaiŋana . Mi re , iŋgi kampeŋana ki Merere imbotmbot se ku i . ”
01026030	Tona Isak iurpe kini biibi , mi ziŋan tikanan ma tiwinin .
01026031	Mankwoono mbeŋbeŋŋana na , timaŋga mi ziŋan timbuk sua mi tipombol ma imbol kat . To Isak iur zin la zaala ma tila raama lelen ambai .
01026032	Indeeŋe aigule tana , zin mbesooŋo ki Isak timar ma tiso pini : “ Ai , niam amdeeŋe yok bukbuk ma ise pa toono sumbuunu ta amkel na . ”
01026033	To Isak ipaata yok touŋana tina be Seba . Tanata tiwatwaata kar ta imbot igarau pa yok tana na , zaana be Ber-Seba . Mi zaana tana imbotmbot men i .
01026034	Indeeŋe Isau ndaama kini irao tomtooru ( 40 ) , to iwoolo moori ru ta un ipet pa Et . Moori ta , zaana Yudit . Ni Beri lutuunu moori . Mi toro zaana Basemat . Ni Elon lutuunu moori .
01026035	Tamen leembe nan ru tana tikam ma rwon Isak ma rwon moori Rebeka lelen ipata kat .
01027001	Isak , ni iwe kolman kat mi mataana isaana ma irao ire kat lele mini som . Aigule ta na , iboobo lutuunu Isau ma imar , mi iso pini ma iso : “ Lutuŋ o ! ” Isau iso : “ Oi , ituŋ ti . ”
01027002	To Isakbi iso : “ Leŋ . Iŋgi aŋwe kolman kek , mi aŋkankaana pa koŋ mete .
01027003	Tana kam peene ku mi la pa su ma ru koŋ buzur sa .
01027004	To urpe koŋ yambon ambaiŋana sa tabe ikam ŋgureŋ i , mi kam ma imar ma aŋwin . Tonabe aŋkam pombolŋana tio ise ku . Besombe aŋmeete , na aŋmeete lak . ”
01027005	Indeeŋe Isak izzo sua pa lutuunu Isau na , Rebeka ileŋuti kek . Tana Isau ila pa su be iru buzur , to Rebeka imaŋga mi iso pa lutuunu Yakop ma iso : “ Buri ŋonoono ta aŋleŋ tomom iso pa tom ta kembei . Isombe :
01027006	
01027007	‘ Isau , kam buzur sa ma urpe koŋ yambon ambaiŋana . Tonabe aŋpombolu pa Merere mataana . Besombe aŋmeete , na aŋmeete lak . ’
01027008	Tana lutuŋ , kozo leŋ la kalŋoŋ , mi to sua ta iŋgi aŋur pu i .
01027009	La ta mbili murin a . To kam mekmek lutuunu ndekndekŋan ru ma timar tio , mi nio ko aŋurpe tomom ka yambon ambaiŋana tabe iwin ma ikam ŋgureene i .
01027010	To kam ma la kini ma iwin . Naso ikam pombolŋana kini ise ku pataaŋa . ”
01027011	Mi Yakop iso pa naana Rebeka ma iso : “ Wai anaŋ , ina ambai , mi tamen atoŋ Isau , ni kuliini rumunrumunŋana . Mi nio na , kuliŋ ŋgeezeŋoŋ .
01027012	Kokena tamaŋ izorom yo , to iute kembei nio aŋpakaami . Tona ikam pombolŋana kini ise tio som , mi ipiri sua sananŋana pio . ”
01027013	Tamen naana iso pini : “ Lutuŋ , kam ŋgar boozo pepe . Sombe ni ipiri sua sananŋana pu , inako ka pataŋana ise tio . Tana leŋ la kalŋoŋ ti , mi la ma kam zin mekmek ma timar . ”
01027014	Tana Yakop imaŋga , to ila mi ikam zin mekmek ma ila ki naana . Mi ni karaukarau ma iurpe yambon ambaiŋana tabe Isak iwin ma ikam ŋgureene i .
01027015	To Rebeka ila ma ikam mburu ambaiŋana ki lutuunu Isau ta iur su beeze leleene na , mi ikam la ki Yakop be izeebi pa .
01027016	Mi iur mekmek kuliini ma ise Yakop ka bolboolo , mi itautau la namaana ŋgureene .
01027017	Tona ikam yambon tana ramaki narabu ma ila ki Yakop .
01027018	Yakop ikam mi ila ki tamaana , to iso pini . Iso : “ O tamaŋ ! ” Tamaana iso : “ Lutuŋ , ina nu asiŋ ? ”
01027019	Yakop iso : “ Nio Isau tau , lutum muŋgamuŋga . Yambon ta so pa , ta iŋgi aŋkam ma aŋmar i . Maŋga ma win mi kam pombolŋana ku ise tio . ”
01027020	To Isak iso : “ Wae , lutuŋ , nu ndeeŋe koroŋ karau men ? ” Yakop iso : “ Merere Anutu ku ta ipaŋgutŋguutu yo , tabe loŋa mi aŋdeeŋe . ”
01027021	To Isak iso : “ Mar ŋana mi aŋteegu . Ko nu lutuŋ Isau tau ? ”
01027022	Tana Yakop ila ma tuŋla kat ki tamaana , mi ni izoromi to iso : “ Kalŋom na , kembei Yakop kalŋaana . Tamen nomom na , rumunrumunŋana kembei ta Isau namaana . ”
01027023	Tana Isak ikilaala Yakop som . Paso , namaana rumunrumunŋana kembei ta Isau . To Isak imaŋga be ipomboli . Som , mi iso : “ E-e ! Nu Isau tau ? ” Yakop iso : “ E , nio tau . ”
01027024	
01027025	Tona Isak iso : “ Kena kam koŋ yambon tana imar . Pa leleŋ be aŋwin buzur su kana ka yambon ta itum urpe na . Tona aŋpombolu . ” To Yakop ikam yambon ma ila ki tamaana Isak ma iwin , mi ikam ka yok baen tomini .
01027026	Iwin makiŋ , mi iso pini : “ Lutuŋ , mar sou yo . ”
01027027	Tana Yakop ila ma isou i . Mi Isak iyoozo mburu ki Isau kuziini , to ikam pombolŋana kini ise ki Yakop . Iso : “ Aa , lutuŋ ti kuziini na , kembei su ta kampeŋana ki Merere imbotmbot pa !
01027028	Anutu ko ikam tolou ki saamba ma isu pu , mi ipembeeze toono ku ma mbuyeene , bekena ipiyooto kini mi baen ma boozo kat .
01027029	Zin karkari ko timbeeze pu . Mi toono pakan ka tomtom bizin ko tilek kumbun pu . Nu ko we biibi pa toŋmatiziŋ ku . Mi nom lutuunu bizin ko tilek kumbun pu . Zin wal ta so tipiri sua sananŋana pu , inako zitun tisaana . Mi zin wal ta so tisuŋ Anutu be ikampe u , inako zitun tikam kampeŋana tomini . ”
01027030	Isak ipombol Yakop makiŋ , to Yakop izemi mi iyooto ma ila lene . To molo som na , toono Isau per ma ipet pa su .
01027031	Mi ni tomini iurpe yambon ambaiŋana . Tana ikam ma ila ki tamaana , mi iso : “ O tamaŋ , buzur su kana ka yambon , ta aŋurpe kek . Maŋga ma win mi pombol yo . ”
01027032	Tabe Isak imorsop mi iso : “ Wai , iŋgi nu asiŋ toro ? ” Isau iso : “ Nio Isau tau , lutum muŋgamuŋga . ”
01027033	To Isak keteene ikam keŋ mi iso : “ Nu mar zen , mi tomtom sa ta ikam koŋ yambon ma imar ma aŋwin mi aŋpomboli kek . Ko asiŋ ? Pa pombolŋana tio , ta imap ma ise kini kek . Mi iŋga ko imbotmbot se kini ma alok . ”
01027034	Isau ileŋ tamaana iso sua tana , to isu na itaŋ ma biibi . Itaŋ ma iyeryer , mi iso : “ O tamaŋ , pombol yo tomini lak . ”
01027035	Tamen Isak iso : “ Waii , pombolŋana ta aŋso aŋkam pu , ta tizim imar ma ipakaam yo mi ikem kek . ”
01027036	Tabe Isau iso : “ Pisis Yakop , ina itop la kat kini ! Pa iŋgi ni ipakaam yo pa ru i . Muŋgu ikem muriŋ muŋgamuŋga kana i . Mi buri ikem pombolŋana tabe ise tio i tomini . ” To Isau iwi tamaana mini ma iso : “ Parei , pombolŋana toro sa som ? ”
01027037	Isak ipekel kalŋaana ma iso : “ Nio aŋur tizim mi popoŋana kini be tiwe biibi pu , mi nu mi popoŋana ku be kewe mbesooŋo pizin . Mi kini mi baen ŋonon na , aŋkam pini kek . Tana lutuŋ , kosa sa imbot be aŋkam pu i som . ”
01027038	Tamen Isau itaŋroro tamaana . Iso : “ Tamaŋ parei ? Pombolŋana ku tamen ŋonoono ta tina ? Toro sa som ? O tamaŋ , pombol yo tomini . ” To Isau isu ma iyeryer mini .
01027039	Tona tamaana Isak ipekel kalŋaana ma iso : “ Kar ku , mi lele ku ko imbot molo pa toono mbuyeeneŋana . Mi tolou saamba kana ko isu pu som .
01027040	Mi nu ko kam malmal pa buza , be ndeeŋe kom kini mi lem koroŋ . Mi ko we mbesooŋo pa tizim . Tamen kaimer ko maŋga mi noknok zooroŋana , to ni ko irao imboro u mini som . ”
01027041	Isau , ni keteene malmal biibi kat pa Yakop . Pa pombolŋana kini , ta tamaana iur se ki Yakop . Tamen iyaramraama ma imbot la leleene men . Pa ikam ŋgar ta kembei : “ Molo som to tomoyam imeete . Tonabe aŋpun Yakop ma imeete . ”
01027042	Tamen wal pakan tiŋgal Rebeka talŋaana pa ŋgar ki Isau . Tabe iboobo Yakop ma imar , mi iso pini : “ Lutuŋ , leŋ . Tom Isau isombe ipunu ma meete , bekena ipokot mbulu ta kam pini na .
01027043	Tana leŋ la kalŋoŋ , mi maŋga ta buri ma ko ma la ki wom Laban ta imbotmbot ta kar Aran a .
01027044	La mbotmbot kini ma irao tom leleene iluumu .
01027045	Mi sombe tom leleene iluumu mi mataana mbeleele mbulu ta kam pini na , tona nio ko aŋso ma pu be miili ma mar mini . Pa nio aŋmoto : Kokena niomru koporou ma kemeete pa aigule tamen . ”
01027046	To Rebeka imaŋga mi iso pa Isak : “ Aiss , nio ti niŋ gesges kat pa rwondo moori bizin ru tiŋga . Mi sombe Yakop tomini iwoolo moori sa ta ki Et , na nio ko irao aŋbot mini na som . Ko aŋmeete ma aŋla leŋ . ”
01028001	Tana Isak isu , mi iboobo Yakop ma imar . To ipomboli mi iur sua mbolŋana pini ta kembei . Iso : “ Woolo moori tasa ki Kanaan pepe .
01028002	Maŋga ma la pa lele Mesopotamia ta buri . Mi la ta ruumu ki tumbum Betuel , to woolo wom Laban lutuunu moori sa .
01028003	Anutu mbura keskeezeŋana ko ipombolu mi ikam lem pikin boozomen ma kamasak bekena we tomtom boozomen un .
01028004	Mi ni ko ipombolu mi zin popoŋana ku , kembei ta ipombol tumbum Abaraam . Naso nu irao kam lem toono biibi tiŋgi , ta we leembe pa i . Pa toono tiŋgi , Anutu imbuk ka sua pa tumbum Abaraam ta muŋgu kek . ”
01028005	Isak iso sua tana pa Yakop makiŋ , to iuri ma ila pa Mesopotamia , be ila ki woono Laban , ta Betuel lutuunu na .
01028006	Indeeŋe ta Isak ipombol Yakop mi iuri ma ila pa Mesopotamia na , iur sua mbolŋana pini be irao iwoolo moori ki lele tana men . Mi iŋgalsek pini be iwoolo Kanaan nan sa pepe .
01028007	Tabe Isau ileŋ sua tina , mi ire kembei Yakop isombe ito tamaana ziru naana kalŋan mi ila pa Mesopotamia ,
01028008	tona ikilaala ta kembei : Kanaan nan ru ta ni iwoolo zin na , tamaana leleene pizin risa som .
01028009	Tana ni izem tamaana ma naana , mi ila ki tamaana kolmanŋana Ismael , mi iwoolo moori toro , zaana Maalat . Maalat toono zaana Nebaiot . Ziru Ismael lutuunu bizin .
01028010	Tana Yakop imaŋga , mi izem kar Ber-Seba , mi isombe ila pa kar Aran .
01028011	Ni iwwa ma ila ipet lele ta , mi mbeŋkaali . Tana isu to iŋgas pat pakan ma iliu i , mi ikam pat ta ma ikiliigi , mi ikeene .
01028012	To imiu mi ire koroŋ kembei ndeete ta imbot saamba mi isu toono . Mi zin aŋela ki Anutu tizzu mi tizalla pa .
01028013	To Merere itunu tau imender sala ndeete uteene , mi iso pini ma iso : “ Nio Merere , Anutu ki tumbum Abaraam mi tomom Isak . Toono ta kenne pa i , ina nio ko aŋkam pu mi popoŋana ku ma iwe leyom .
01028014	Mi popoŋana ku kola tipet ma timasak ma tiwe boozomen , kembei ta ululu ki toono . Mi zin ko tipera mi tilela , mi tila pa zilŋaana zilŋaana bekena tirao pa toono ta boozomen . Mi nu niomŋan popoŋana ku ko kewe zaala be kampeŋana biibi ise kizin wal boozomen ta timbotmbot toono na .
01028015	Nio ko aŋbotmbot raamu mi motoŋ pu pa lele boozomen tabe la pa i . Mi ko aŋkamu ma miili ma mar mini pa lele tiŋgi . Tana nio ko irao aŋzemu na som . Ko aŋbotmbot raamu , mi aŋkam ma sua tio mbukŋana ti iur ŋonoono . ”
01028016	Tona Yakop ipol ma imaŋga mi iso : “ Ŋonoono kat ! Merere imbotmbot lele ti . Mi muŋgu nio aŋute som . ”
01028017	To motoŋana ikami . Tabe iso : “ Lele tiŋgi potomŋana kat ! Ikam yo ma aŋmoto koŋ . Pa iŋgi sa Anutu muriini na ! Mi zaala saamba kana kwoono ta ti . ”
01028018	Mankwoono , mbeŋbeŋŋana na , Yakop ikam pat ta ikiliigi na , ma isuŋgun su toono be iwe kilalan pa lele tana . To iliŋ ŋgere isalakaala pat tina .
01028019	Mi ipaata lele tana zaana be Betel . Muŋgu na , kar tana zaana Lus .
01028020	To Yakop imbuk sua pa Anutu ta kembei : “ Merere , sombe nu lae tio mi mboro yo pa pai tio ti , mi kam koŋ kini mi leŋ mburu be aŋzeebe yo pa i , mi sombe aŋbot ambai men ma irao aŋmiili ma aŋmar mini pa ruumu ki tamaŋ , inako nu we Anutu tio , mi nio ko aŋbeeze pa nu itum tamen .
01028021	
01028022	Mi koroŋ boozomen ta so nu kam pio na , nio ko aŋpeete ma iwe pakaana laamuru , mi pakaana ta ko aŋpas ma ima pu . Mi pat ta aŋsuŋgun su ti , iŋgi iwe kilalan kembei lele tiŋgi na Anutu muriini . ”
01029001	Yakop imaŋga mini pa pai kini , mi iwwa ma ila pa lele kizin wal ta timbot la zoŋ uunu na .
01029002	Ila ipet lele tana , to ire yok touŋana ta . Mi zin sipsip uunu tel ta timbot kolouŋana pa yok tina . Pa yok tana , ta tizze pizin sipsip be tiwin . Mi yok kwoono na , pat biibi imbot se be ipakaala .
01029003	Lele tana na , ka mbulu ta kembei : Sombe zin sipsip timap ma timar lup pa yok tana , tona zin mboroŋan kizin timar ma tizuuru pat biibi tana ilae pa yok kwoono , bekena tise yok pizin sipsip ma tiwin , mana tipakaala yok kwoono mini pa pat tana .
01029004	Indeeŋe Yakop ipet lele tana na , iwi zin mboroŋan ma iso : “ Atoŋan , niom kamar pa so kar i ? ” Zin tiso : “ Niam amar pa kar Aran . ”
01029005	To iwi zin ma iso : “ Laban ta Naor lutuunu i , niom kuute i ? ” Zin tiso : “ E , niam amute i . ”
01029006	To iwi zin mini ma iso : “ Mi parei , imbot ambai ? ” Mi zin tiso : “ E , ni imbot ambai . Re . Iŋga lutuunu moori Rael ta ziŋan zin sipsip kini timar i . ”
01029007	To Yakop iso pizin : “ Kere . Iŋgi aigule biibi ma zin sipsip tirao be tilela siiri leleene zen . Kese kan yok , mi kakam zin ma timiili mini be tikanan kan mbutmbuutu . ”
01029008	Tamen zin tiso : “ Soom . Bela timbotmbot mi amnaama zin pakan ma timar lup , tona amzuuru pat tiŋgi ma ilae pa yok kwoono , mi amse kan yok ma tiwin . ”
01029009	Yakop ziŋan zin mboroŋan tana tizzo sua ma timbotmbot , mi Rael ikam sipsip ki tamaana ma timar . Pa ni ta imborro zin .
01029010	Yakop ire woono Laban lutuunu moori Rael mi zin sipsip kini , to imaŋga mi izuuru pat biibi tana ilae pa yok kwoono , mi ise zin sipsip kan yok ma tiwin .
01029011	To isou Rael , mi itaŋ .
01029012	Mi iso pini ma iso : “ Nio ti , awoŋ ta Laban na . Tomom Laban tana lunuri Rebeka ta nio naŋgoŋ i . ” Rael ileŋ sua tana , to iloondo ma ila ki tamaana Laban , mi isotaari .
01029013	Laban ileŋ kembei woono Yakop imar kek , to imaŋga mi iloondo ma ila kini . Ila to isou i , mi ikami ma ziru tila pa ruumu kini . To Yakop ipit mbol pa mboti mi pai kini ta imar i ma Laban ileŋ .
01029014	Ipit mbol makiŋ , to Laban iso pini . Iso : “ Oo ŋonoono kat . Ituru siŋ tamen . ”
01029015	Yakop imbot ki Laban irao puulu ta , to Laban isu mi iso pini . Iso : “ Nu na , nio awoŋ ŋonoono . Tana irao kam uraata pio sorok na som . Lelem pa so kadoono i ? So ma aŋleŋ . ”
01029016	Laban , ni lutuunu moori bizin ru . Kolmanŋana zaana Lea , mi naŋgaŋŋana zaana Rael .
01029017	Lea , ni ruŋguunu ambai pe som . Miso Rael na , ni moori kaibiim kat .
01029018	Mi Yakop ni leleene pa Rael ilip kat . Tabe iso pa Laban ma iso : “ Nio leleŋ be aŋwoolo Rael . Mi sombe nu yok pio be aŋkami , nako aŋkam uraata pu irao ndaama lamata mi ru , tona aŋwooli . ”
01029019	Laban ileŋ to iso : “ Ambai be wooli . Pa leleŋ be iwoolo tomooto toro pepe . Tana mbotmbot raama yo mi kam uraata . ”
01029020	Tana Yakop ikam uraata pa Laban ma irao ndaama lamata mi ru bekena ikam Rael . Tamen ndaama lamata mi ru tana , ni ire kembei koroŋ sorok . Paso , leleene pa Rael ilip .
01029021	Ndaama lamata mi ru tana imap , to Yakop isu mi iso pa Laban : “ Ndaama ta ur pio be aŋkam uraata pu , ta iŋgi imap i . Kam Rael ma imar be aŋwooli . ”
01029022	Tana Laban iurpe kini biibi , mi iso la pizin wal kar kan be timar ma ziŋan tikan kini tana .
01029023	Tamen mbeŋ na , ikam pakaamŋana pa Yakop , mi iur lutuunu moori kolmanŋana Lea ma ila kini , mi ziru tikeene .
01029024	Mi iur mbesooŋo moori kini , zaana Silpa , ma ila ki Lea be imbeeze pini .
01029025	Mankwoono mbeŋbeŋŋana na , Yakop imaŋga mi so mataana lae na , ire Lea imbotmbot . To ila ma iso pa Laban : “ Wae , parei ta nu kam mbulu tiŋgi pio ? Nio aŋbel uraata pu be aŋkam Rael . Mi nu pakaam yo paso ? ”
01029026	Laban ipekel kwoono ma iso : “ Kam ‘ Wae ! ’ paso ? Niam mbulu tiam imbot pataaŋa ta kembei : Moori naŋgaŋŋana irao iwoolo sala moori kolmanŋana uteene na som .
01029027	Kena mbot raama Lea ma irao uraata ula kana imap muŋgu , tonabe aŋur Rael tomini ma ima . Tamen ko kam uraata pio pa ndaama lamata mi ru tomen . ”
01029028	Yakop ileŋ na , iyok . Tana uraata ula kana imap , to Laban iur lutuunu moori Rael ma ila kini .
01029029	Mi iur mbesooŋo moori kini toro , zaana Bila , ma ila ki Rael be imbeeze pini .
01029030	Tana Yakop ziru Rael tikeene tomini . Mi Yakop leleene ilip kat pa Rael . Mi Lea na , pe som . Mi Yakop imbotmbot ki Laban mi ikam uraata pa ndaama lamata mi ru tomen .
01029031	Merere ire kembei Yakop leleene pa Lea pe som , tana iuulu Lea bekena kopoono . Mi Rael na , ni kopo somŋana .
01029032	Tana Lea kopoono , to ipeebe pikin tomooto ta , mi ipaata zaana be Ruben . Pa ikam ŋgar ta kembei : “ Merere ire pataŋana tio , tanata ikam leŋ pikin tiŋgi . Iŋgi be kusiŋ iur leleene pio i . ”
01029033	Timbotmbot ma Lea kopoono mini , to ipeebe pikin tomooto toro . Tana isu mi iso : “ Wai , Merere , ni iute kembei kusiŋ iur kat leleene pio som . Tanata ikam leŋ pikin toro ti . ” To ipaata zaana be Simion .
01029034	Timbotmbot ma Lea kopoono mini , to ipeebe pikin tomooto toro ma iwe tel pa . Mi isu to iso : “ O , iŋgi ko kusiŋ imar tuŋ mar tio i . Pa aŋpeebe le pikin tomooto tel kek . ” Tana ipaati be Lebi .
01029035	Timbotmbot ma Lea kopoono mini , mi ipeebe pikin tomooto toro . To iso : “ Koozi nio aŋpakur Merere . ” Tana ipaata pikin zaana be Yuda . Indeeŋe Yuda isu , to Lea kopoono mini som , mi imender ma molo .
01030001	Rael ire kembei ni irao be ipeebe Yakop le pikin sa som , tana mataana mburmbur pa toono moori . Mi isu to iso pa Yakop ta kembei . Iso : “ Kozo kam leŋ pikin sa . Som , to aŋmeete . ”
01030002	Yakop ileŋ sua ki Rael na , keteene malmal . Tona iso : “ Wai ! Nio ti Anutu be aŋso mi nu kopom ? Nio aŋsekaalu pa peebeŋana ? ”
01030003	To Rael iso : “ Ambai . Mi mbesooŋo moori tio Bila imbotmbot i . Kami ma niomru kekeene , bekena ipeebe pio . Naso nio leŋ pikin tomini . ”
01030004	Tana Rael iur mbesooŋo moori kini ila ki Yakop ma ziru tikeene .
01030005	Mi Bila kopoono , to ipeebe Yakop le pikin tomooto ta .
01030006	Tabe Rael iso : “ Iŋgi Anutu itiiri yo ma leŋ uunu sa isaana som . Pa ileŋ suŋŋana tio mi ikam leŋ pikin tomooto ti . ” Tana ipaati be Dan .
01030007	Bila kopoono mini , to ipeebe pikin tomooto toro .
01030008	Tabe Rael iso : “ Nio niamru atoŋ moori amparkam siloogo biibi ma aŋlip pini kek . ” Tana ipaata pikin zaana be Naptali .
01030009	Lea ire kembei ipeebe pikin mini som , to iur mbesooŋo moori kini Silpa ila ki Yakop be iwe kembei ta kusiini toro .
01030010	Silpa kopoono ma ipeebe pikin tomooto ta , tona Lea iso : “ Iŋgi koroŋ ambaiŋana . ” Tana ipaati be Gat .
01030011	
01030012	Timbotmbot mi Silpa , ta mbesooŋo moori ki Lea na , ipeebe Yakop le pikin tomooto toro .
01030013	Tona Lea iso : “ Koozi nio menmeen yo biibi . Mi zin moori kar kan ko menmeen zin pio tomini . ” Tana Lea ipaata pikin zaana be Aser .
01030014	Indeeŋe mazwaana ki kini wit yembutŋana na , Ruben iwwa pa mokleene mi indeeŋe ke pwoono pakan , to ikam ma ila ki naana Lea . ( Koroŋ tina tikamam pizin tomtom be timbel zin pa . ) Rael ire , to iso pa Lea ma iso : “ Ai , kam leŋ sa imar . ”
01030015	Tamen Lea iso pini : “ Wae ! Nu ta kam ma kusiŋ leleene pio pe som . Mi iŋgi sombe kam lutuŋ koroŋ kini tiŋgi tomini ? Ina ko som . ” To Rael iso : “ Ambai . Nu kam leŋ sa . Mi mbeŋ koozi to Yakop ima ku . ”
01030016	Rorou na , Yakop imiili ma ipet kar , to Lea ikoŋuru i mi iso pini ta kembei : “ Leŋ . Mbeŋ to nu mar tio . Pa nio aŋgiimu pa ke pwoono ki lutuŋ kek . ” Tana mbeŋ na , Yakop ila ki Lea ma ziru tikeene .
01030017	Anutu ileŋ suŋŋana ki Lea , tabe kopoono mini to ipeebe pikin tomooto toro ma iwe lamata pa .
01030018	Lea isu to iso : “ Nio aŋur mbesooŋo moori tio ila ki kusiŋ , tanata Anutu ikam leŋ kadoono ambaiŋana ti . ” Tana ipaata pikin zaana be Isaka .
01030019	Kaimer to Lea kopoono mini , to ipeebe pikin tomooto toro , ma iwe lamata mi ta pa .
01030020	Mi iso : “ Anutu ipomoozo kat yo . Iŋgi be kusiŋ Yakop ipakur yo . Pa aŋpeebe le pikin lamata mi ta kek . ” Tana ipaata pikin zaana be Zebulun .
01030021	Mi kaimer na , Lea ipeebe pikin moori ta . Mi ipaata zaana be Dina .
01030022	Kaimer mana , Anutu mataana iŋgal Rael tomini .
01030023	Tana ileŋ suŋŋana kini mi ikam ma Rael kopoono . To ipeebe pikin tomooto ta . Mi isu to iso : “ Aa buri ! Anutu iziiri koŋ miaŋ ma ila lene kek .
01030024	Mi leleŋ be Merere ikam leŋ pikin tomooto toro . ” Tana ipaata pikin zaana be Yosep .
01030025	Rael ipeebe Yosep , tona Yakop isu na iso pa Laban ma iso : “ Lak . Yok pio be aŋmiili ma aŋla pa toono tio .
01030026	Nu ute : Nio aŋbel uraata biibi pu kek . Tana kam kusiŋ bizin mi lutuŋ bizin ma timar be niamŋan amla . Pa kadoono ta ur pio na , aŋposop ma imap kek . ”
01030027	Tamen Laban iso pini : “ Wai zoŋ ! Nio aŋso ituru tombotmbot . Pa nio aŋute nu ndomom pio ta Merere ikampewe yo i .
01030028	Tana nio leleŋ be zem yo ma la pepe . Sokorei sa ta so lelem pa , na nio ko aŋkam pu mi ituru tombotmbot . ”
01030029	Yakop iso pini ma iso : “ Nu itum ute tau nio aŋbel uraata biibi pu , mi ina uunu tina ta mbili ku timasak ma tiwe boozo .
01030030	Muŋgu nu lem mbili boozo pe som . Tamen nio aŋmar aŋbot ku , tabe mbili ku timasak ma tiwe boozo kat . Tana nio ta aŋwe zaala pa kampeŋana ki Anutu ta imarmar pu i . Mi ŋiizi na aŋkam uraata pa ituŋ wal tio ? ”
01030031	To Laban iwi i mini ma iso : “ Nu lelem pa sokorei ? ” Mi Yakop iso : “ Kam leŋ koroŋ sa ta buri pepe . Mi parei , ko irao yok pio be aŋla aŋkam leŋ sipsip lutunlutun koskoozoŋan ta boozomen , mi mekmek ŋgaltitiŋan ta boozomen ? Ina kadoono tina men ta nio leleŋ pa . Nu sombe yok pa , inako aŋbot mi aŋboro mbili ku mini .
01030032	
01030033	Beso kaimer , ma re mbili sa ta ka mos toro pa mos ru tana , inako nu ute kembei mbili tana , nio aŋkemi . Tana toto zaala ta kembei . Naso nu ute nio tomtom ki sua ŋonoono men . ”
01030034	Laban ileŋ sua ki Yakop mi iso : “ O , ina ambai . Ko takam kembei ta so na . ”
01030035	Tamen aigule tina Laban imaŋga mi iyo zin mekmek tomooto parrisŋan mi zin mekmek paŋgaara ŋgaltitiŋan mi zin sipsip lutunlutun koskoozoŋan ta boozomen ma iur la ki lutuunu bizin naman be matan pizin .
01030036	To lutuunu bizin tikoki zin mbili tana , mi tipa ma irao aigule tel , to timbotmbot su tana . Mi Yakop , ni mataana pizin mbili pakan ta Laban izem zin su kini na .
01030037	To Yakop isu mi ikam ke namannaman pakan ta mbitiŋan i , mi izekzek tenten kulin bekena tiwe parrisŋan .
01030038	Mi iur se zwor kwon beso zin mbili timar ma tiwin na , tire ke parrisŋan tana .
01030039	Beso zin mekmek timar ma tiwin yok , mi tomooto tino zin paŋgaara igarau pa ke namannaman tana , to tipeebe ŋgaltitiŋan mi parrisŋan men .
01030040	Mi zin sipsip na , Yakop iur zin ma timbot ndel pizin mekmek . Mi indeeŋe ta zin tomooto tikamam be tino zin paŋgaara , to itooro zin ma matan ila kizin sipsip parrisŋan mi koskoozoŋan ki Laban . Ikamam ta kembei , tabe ipamasak mbili kini ma tiwe boozo kat . Mi ikam zin ma timbot ndel pa Laban kini .
01030041	Tana indeeŋe zin mbili tumkatŋan tikamam be tino zin paŋgaara na , Yakop iurur ke namannaman parrisŋan se zwor kwoono .
01030042	Tamen indeeŋe zin mbili koŋkoŋŋan tisombe tino na , itatkewe ke namannaman tana pizin . Tabe molo som mi , Yakop le mbili tumkatŋan men . Mi ki Laban na koŋkoŋŋan .
01030043	Ina zaala tina ta Yakop iwe mbio uunu pa . Ni irao kat pa mekmek , sipsip , mburu , mbesooŋo , kamel , doŋki , mi koroŋ ta boozomen .
01031001	Kaimer to Yakop ileŋ Laban lutuunu bizin tizzo ta kembei . Tiso : “ Yakop ti iyo koroŋ ta boozomen ki tamanda ma imap . Koroŋ ta boozomen kini tiŋga na , imar pa tamanda tau . ”
01031002	Mi Yakop ire Laban iur leleene pini kembei ta muŋgu na som .
01031003	To Merere iso pa Yakop : “ Miili ma la pa toono ki tomom bizin mi wal ku . Nio ko aŋbotmbot raamu . ”
01031004	Tana Yakop iso la pa Rael mi Lea be timar ma tipet kini ta mbili murin a .
01031005	Ziru tila tipet kini to , iso pizin ma iso : “ Nio aŋre tomoyom iur leleene pio kembei ta muŋgu na som . Tamen Anutu ki tamaŋ , ni imbotmbot raama yo mi mataana pio .
01031006	Niomru kuute : Nio aŋbelmbel uraata pa tomoyom . Mi ni ipakamkaam yo mi itortooro sua pa leŋ kadoono pa piizi sa kek . Tamen Anutu ipateke tomoyom , tabe ni ipasaana yo som .
01031007	
01031008	Kere . Indeeŋe ta tomoyom iso : ‘ Mekmek ŋgaltitiŋan ko tiwe lem kadoono ’ na , zin mekmek tipeebe ŋgaltitiŋan men . Mi indeeŋe ta ni iso : ‘ Zin mekmek parrisŋan ko tiwe lem kadoono ’ na , mekmek tipeebe parrisŋan men .
01031009	Ina zaala tana , ta Anutu itatke zin mbili ki tomoyom , mi ikam zin ma tiwe leŋ .
01031010	Pa kere ! Indeeŋe mazwaana kizin mbili be tiparno zin na , nio aŋmiu ta kembei : Mekmek tomooto ta tinono zin paŋgaara na , parrisŋan mi ŋgaltitiŋan men .
01031011	To aŋela ki Anutu ta iso pio ma isombe : ‘ Yakop ! ’ Mi nio aŋtur la kalŋaana ma aŋso : ‘ Oi , ituŋ ti . ’
01031012	To ni iso : ‘ Mbulu ta Laban ikamam pu na , nio aŋute ma imap . Tana re . Mekmek tomooto ta tino zin paŋgaara na , parrisŋan mi ŋgaltitiŋan men .
01031013	Anutu ta ipet ku su lele Betel , mi nu mbuk sua mbolŋana pini na , nio tau . Lele tana , ta nu suŋgun pat mi liŋ ŋgere sala . Mi iŋgi aŋso pu : Maŋga ta buri ma zem lele tiŋgi , mi miili ma la pa toono ta pesem isula pa na . ’ ”
01031014	Yakop iso zin pa sua tana makiŋ , to Rael ziru Lea tisu mi tiso : “ Tomoyam , kaimer ko ikam leyam koroŋ kini sa be iwe matamur kini ? Na som .
01031015	Pa ni mataana iŋgalŋgal yam som . Ni ire yam kembei tomtom toro lutuunu bizin . Mi nu ute : Nu woolo yam sorok som . Nu ŋgiimi yam kek . Mi kadoono biibi tana , ta ni itunu ikan ma imap kek . Ire leyam ri sa som kat .
01031016	Koroŋ boozomen ta Anutu itatke pini , ina niamŋan lutundu bizin koroŋ tiam . Tana kam kembei ta Anutu iso pu na . ”
01031017	Tabe Yakop imaŋga mi iyauyau mbili ma mburu kini boozomen ta ikam su lele pakaana ki Mesopotamia na , mi iur kusiini bizin ma lutuunu bizin sala kamel kini , to ziŋan timaŋga be tila ki Yakop tamaana Isak , tau imbotmbot su toono Kanaan na .
01031018	
01031019	Indeeŋe mazwaana tana , Laban , ni imbotmbot kar som . Paso , ni ila be ipup sipsip kini rumunrumun . Tana Rael ila mi ikemut ke teeteŋan ki tamaana .
01031020	Mi Yakop isotaara rwoonobi kembei ni be izemi ma ila ne na som . Ikam ki keŋana .
01031021	Tana Yakop iyauyau koroŋ kini ta boozomen , mi ziŋan wal kini tiko ma tila len . Tila ma tindu yok Euprates , to tipa ma tila pa lele abalabalŋana zaana Gileat .
01031022	Aigule ru ilae , beso iwe tel pa na , wal pakan tisotaara Laban ta kembei . Tiso : “ A , nu mbotmbot ? Zom ta iko ma ila ne kek . ”
01031023	To Laban imaŋga mi ikam wal kini pakan , mi ziŋan tiketoto Yakop bizin . Tiketo zin ma tila tila ma irao kan mbeŋ lamata mi ru , to tigarau zin su lele abalabalŋana ki Gileat .
01031024	Tamen mbeŋ na , Laban ta wal ki Aram na , imiu be Anutu ipet kini mi iso : “ Kozo mbuulu kwom pa Yakop pepe . ”
01031025	Yakop , ni ipo beeze isu lele tana kek . Tana Laban ziŋan wal kini tise kini na , zin tomini tipo beeze su lele tamen tau .
01031026	Laban isu to iso pa Yakop ma iso : “ Parei ta nu kam mbulu tiŋgi pio ? Iŋgi pakaam yo mi koki lutuŋ moori bizin ma kembei ta mbulu ki malmal .
01031027	Parei ta kam mbulu ki keŋana mi ko pio sorok ? Tabe nu sotaara yo , so irao leleŋ ambai pu , mi amkam kini biibi mi amkam naroogo piom , tona amur yom ma kala . Mi iŋgi som . Nu sotaara yo som , tana nio aŋkat lutuŋ moori bizin mi tumbuŋ bizin naman som . Iŋgi nu kam mbulu kankaanaŋana kat .
01031028	
01031029	Nio aŋrao be aŋpasaana yom . Mi toŋgo . Pa mbeŋi , Anutu ki tomom iso pio be aŋbuulu kwoŋ pu pepe .
01031030	Nio aŋute : Ŋgar ku imbol kat be miili ma la ki tomom mi wal ku . Tanata zem yo . Mi parei ta kem ke teeteŋan tio ? ”
01031031	Yakop ipekel Laban kalŋaana ma iso : “ Nio aŋmoto , ta aŋko pu : Kokena yakat lutum moori bizin pio .
01031032	Tamen ke teeteŋan ku , ina nio aŋkankaana pa . Nu sombe ndeeŋe tomtom sa ta ikem zin , inako imeete . Tana itum tiiri koroŋ tio ta boozomen ila wal kiti tiŋgi matan , mi ru ke teeteŋan ku . Mi sombe ndeeŋe koroŋ ku tasa , na kam . ” Yakop , ni iute tau Rael ikem ke teeteŋan ki tamaana na som .
01031033	To Laban ila ma ilela beeze ki Yakop , beeze ki Lea , beeze kizin mbesooŋo moori ru , mi ipitiiri koroŋ ta boozomen . Tamen indeeŋe kosa sa som . Mana ilela beeze ki Rael be iru koroŋ kini .
01031034	Mi Rael , ni iturke ke teeteŋan ki tamaana lela pelpeele ki kamel kek , mi mbuleene salakaala ma imbotmbot . Tabe Laban ipitirtiiri koroŋ boozomen ta imbot lela beeze ki Rael na , ma som .
01031035	To Rael iso pa Laban ma iso : “ O tamaŋ , ketem malmal pio pepe . Iŋgi irao aŋmaŋga na som . Pa mete tiam moori ikam yo . ” Tana Laban iru iru ma indeeŋe som .
01031036	Tona Yakop keteene malmal , mi iyaamba Laban ma iso : “ Nio aŋmolo so tutu i , mi aŋkam so sosor i , ta nu ketoto yo ma mar ?
01031037	Koozi nu pitiiri koroŋ tio ta boozomen , bekena ru ke teeteŋan ku . Mi sombe ndeeŋe koroŋ ku tasa kek , na kam ma ur su mat ti pizin wal ku mi wal tio matan be tire . Koozi ko ituru tere kat . Asiŋ ta iso sua ŋonoono .
01031038	Nio aŋbot ku irao ndaama tomoota kek . Mi ndaama ta boozomen tana , sipsip mi mekmek ku tipepeebe ambai men . Mi nio aŋkan sorok sipsip ku sa som .
01031039	Mi indeeŋe ta koroŋ saŋsaŋŋana sa ikam malmal pa sipsip ku tasa ma ikani na , nio aŋkam sipsip tana ma aŋmar aŋso u pa som . Som kat . Nio aŋpekel pa ituŋ mbili tio . Paso , nu ur sua mbolŋana pio , beso koroŋ ku tasa imbiriizi pa aigule , som mbeŋ , inako nio ituŋ aŋkot .
01031040	Zoŋ ikanan yo pa aigule , mi tolou ikamam yo pa mbeŋ ma niŋ tekteege . Tabe aŋkennekaala motoŋ som .
01031041	Nio aŋbesmbeeze pu ma irao ndaama tomoota kek . Aŋkam uraata pa ndaama laamuru mi paŋ bekena aŋkam lutum moori bizin ru . Mi aŋkam uraata pa ndaama lamata mi ta tomen bekena aŋkam leŋ mbili pakan . Mi nu tortooro kalŋom pa leŋ kadoono pa piizi sa kek .
01031042	Kozobe Anutu ki tumbuŋ Abaraam , ta tamaŋ Isak imototo i mi imbesmbeeze pini na , ilae tio som mi mataana pio som , so irao nomoŋ ila ndemeŋ , mi ziiri yo ma aŋla leŋ . Tamen Anutu ire pataŋana tio mi uraata biibi ta aŋbelmbel pu na , tanata mbeŋi iyaambu . Pa nio leŋ uunu sa isaana som . ”
01031043	Yakop iso sua tana makiŋ , to Laban ipekel kalŋaana ma iso : “ Zin moori tiŋgi na , nio lutuŋ moori bizin . Mi zin pikin tiŋgi na , nio tumbuŋ bizin . Mi sipsip ma mekmek ta boozomen tiŋgi , ina nio tio . Tana koroŋ boozomen ta nu rre i , ina nio tio men . Tamen koozi ko aŋkam parei ? Pa lutuŋ moori bizin ru ziŋan lutun bizin tizem yo kek .
01031044	Tana nio leleŋ aŋsombe ituru tulup lelende mi tumbuk sua sa . ”
01031045	Tabe Yakop ikam pat molo ta mi ipamender , bekena iwe kilalan pa sua kizin mbukŋana tana mi ipombol .
01031046	To iso pa wal kini be tila mi tindou pat pakan . Tila tindou makiŋ , to tilup zin mi tikan kini igarau pa pat ndouŋana tana .
01031047	Pat ndouŋana tana , Laban ipaata zaana ila zin wal ki Aram kalŋan be Yegar Saduta . Mi Yakop ipaata zaana be Galet .
01031048	To Laban iso : “ Koozi , pat ndouŋana tiŋgi imbot la ituru mazwanda be ipombol sua kiti mbukŋana . ” Tana tipaata pat ndouŋana tana zaana be Galet .
01031049	Mi tipaata zaana be Mispa tomini . Pa Laban iso ta kembei : “ Ituru ko taparlup ti mini som . Tamen Merere ko ire kiskis ituru . Tana nu sombe kam sanaana pa lutuŋ moori bizin , o woolo moori pakan , na kozo re u . Pa Anutu , ni ileŋ sua mbukŋana tiŋgi kek . Mi mbulu kiti keŋana ta tomtom tiute som na , ni ire lup . ”
01031050	
01031051	To Laban iseeŋge sua kini ma iso : “ Tana re pat ndouŋana mi pat suŋgunŋana ta timbot la ituru mazwanda i .
01031052	Koroŋ ru tiŋgi be tipei ŋgar kiti mi matanda iŋgal sua kiti mbukŋana . Sua ta kembei : Nio ko irao aŋmolo pat ndouŋana tiŋgi mi aŋma ma aŋkam mbulu sananŋana sa pu na som . Mi nu tomini ko irao molo pat ndouŋana ma pat suŋgunŋana tiŋgi , mi mar ma kam mbulu sananŋana sa pio na som .
01031053	Anutu ki Abaraam , ziru anutu ki Naor ko tire kiskis ituru pa mbulu kiti . Mi sombe kiti tasa ikam sanaana , inako tiur kadoono pini . ” Laban iso sua tana makiŋ , tona Yakop tomini ipaata Anutu ta tamaana Isak imototo i mi imbesmbeeze pini na zaana be ipombol sua mbukŋana tana .
01031054	Tona ipun mbili ta ma ineeni sala abal uteene be ipatoron Merere pa . To iboobo wal ta boozomen ma timar , ma ziŋan tikan kini ma imap , mi tikeene su lele tana pa mbeŋ .
01031055	Mankwoono mbeŋbeŋŋana na , Laban imaŋga , to ikat lutuunu moori bizin mi tumbuunu bizin naman , mi ipombol zin pa sua pakan , mana izem zin , mi imiili ma ila mini pa kar kini .
01032001	Mi Yakop tomini , ni imaŋga mini pa pai kini , mi ipa ma ila , mi zin aŋela ki Anutu tipet kini su zaala lwoono .
01032002	Yakop ire zin na , iso : “ Wae ! Iŋgi sa zin malmal kan ki Anutu na . ” Tana ipaata lele tana be Manaim .
01032003	Tona Yakop iŋgo tomtom pakan be tikam sua mi timuuŋgu ma tila ki toono Isau , ta imbotmbot su lele abalabalŋana ki Seir . Toono tana imbot lele pakaana ki Edom .
01032004	Ni isope zin ta kembei . Iso : “ Kozo kala kepet ki biibi tio Isau , to koso pini ma koso : ‘ Mbesooŋo ku Yakop iso ta kembei : Ni ziru zaanabi timbel mbotŋana , tamen buri isombe imiili ma imar mini .
01032005	Ni le makau , doŋki , sipsip , mekmek , mi mbesooŋo tomooto , mi mbesooŋo moori boozo kat . Tana ni iŋgo yam ma amar bekena amsotaaru pini . Pa leleene be nu muŋai i mi lelem ambai pini . ’ ”
01032006	Yakop isope zin makiŋ , to tila . Beso timiili ma timar na , tiso : “ Ou , niam amla ampet ki tom ta amar i . Mi leŋ ! Ni ziŋan tomtom munŋaana ta ( 400 ) , ta tiwwa ma timarmar pa zaala i be tire u . ”
01032007	Yakop ileŋ sua tana na , imoto kana mi ikam ŋgar boozo . To ipeete zin tomtom mi mbili ta ziŋan tiwwa i ma tiwe uunu ru .
01032008	Pa ikam ŋgar ta kembei : “ Sombe Isau imar mi ikam malmal pa uunu ta ma ipun zin ma timetmeete , nako uunu toro tirao be tiko . ”
01032009	To Yakop isuŋ . Iso : “ O Anutu ki tumbuŋ Abaraam mi tamaŋ Isak , leŋ yo . Merere , nu ta so pio ta kembei : Sombe aŋmiili ma aŋla mini pa toono tio mi wal tio , nako nu kampe yo mi aŋbot ambai men .
01032010	Nio aŋute nio tomtom ndabokŋoŋ som . Tamen nu muŋai mbesooŋo ku mi kampe yo biibi kat . Pa muŋgu , indeeŋe ta aŋdu yok Yordan ma aŋla na , nio leŋ kosa sa som . Aŋteege tete tio men mi aŋpa . Tamen koozi aŋmar raama zin tomtom mi koroŋ boozo , mi iŋgi aŋpeete yam ma amwe uunu bibip ru .
01032011	O Merere , nio aŋsuŋu be kamke yo pa atoŋ namaana . Pa nio aŋmoto koŋ : Kokena imar ma ikam malmal pio mi kusiŋ bizin mi lutuŋ bizin mi ipun yam ma ametmeete lup .
01032012	Merere , nu itum ta mbuk sua pio be kampe yo , mibe kam popoŋana tio ma tipet ma tiwe munŋaana ka tieene , kembei magargaara tai kana ta amrao be amnin na som . ”
01032013	Yakop ikam suŋŋana tana ma imap , to imbot lele tana pa mbeŋ . Mankwoono to ikam mbili pakan , mi ipumuuŋgu zin ma tila pa toono Isau .
01032014	Mbili ta kembei : Mekmek paŋgarŋgaara tomto laamuru , mi tomooto na , tomoota . Sipsip paŋgarŋgaara tomto laamuru mi tomooto na , tomoota .
01032015	Kamel paŋgarŋgaara raama lutun bizin , tomoota laamuru . Makau paŋgarŋgaara tomtooru , mi tomooto na , laamuru . Mi doŋki tomooto laamuru .
01032016	Yakop iyake mbili kini tana makiŋ , to iur un un la mbesooŋo kini pakan naman be timboro zin , mi iso pizin ma iso : “ Niom kumuuŋgu . Mi kapa la mbata pepe . Kaparpa molo piom . ”
01032017	Mi Yakop isope mbesooŋo kini ta imuuŋgu na , ta kembei : “ Sombe atoŋ Isau indeeŋu su zaala , mi iwi u ma iso : ‘ Nu mbesooŋo ki asiŋ ? Mi nu la swoi ? Mi mbili uunu tana ki asiŋ ? ’
01032018	Ni isombe iwi u ta kembei , to kozo pekel kwoono ma so : ‘ Mbili ta boozomen tiŋgi , ki mbesooŋo ku Yakop . Ni ikam pu sorok , pa nu biibi kini . Mi ni itunu iwwa kaimer i . ’ ”
01032019	Yakop ikam sua raraate men pa mbesooŋo kini ta iwe ru pa , mi toro ta iwe tel pa , mi mbesooŋo kini boozomen tabe matan pizin mbili un un mi tikam zin ma tila i . Mi kwoono imbol pizin ma iso : “ Niom kosombe kendeeŋe atoŋ Isau , na koso sua raraate men pini .
01032020	Mi motoyom iŋgal be koso pini ta kembei : ‘ Biibi , mbesooŋo ku Yakop iwwa kaimer ma imar i . ’ ” Yakop ikam ta kembena , pa ikam ŋgar ta kembei . Iso : “ Nio ko aŋkam koroŋ tiŋgi pini sorok , bekena aŋurpe leleene mi leleene ambai pio . Beso aŋdeeŋi , to imuŋai yo . ”
01032021	Tana Yakop ipumuuŋgu koroŋ boozomen tana ma ila . Mi ni itunu imbot su lele tana pa mbeŋ .
01032022	Mbeŋ tana , ni imaŋga to ikam kusiini bizin ru , ziŋan mbesooŋo moori kini ru , mi lutuunu bizin mi tila tindu yok Yabok .
01032023	Iur zin ma tilae , to imiili mini ma iyo mburu kini ta boozomen ma ilae tomini .
01032024	Mi itutamen imiili ma imbotmbot yok pakaana tana pa mbeŋ . Molo som mi tomtom ta imar , to ziru Yakop tipartoombo mburan ma irao kozeere .
01032025	Tomtom tana ire kembei mburaana irao be ilip pa Yakop som , to ipun lae pa Yakop ka soobo ma imbekes .
01032026	Mi iso : “ Kiskis yo pepe . Zem yo be aŋla . Pa iŋgi be kozeere i . ” Tamen Yakop iso : “ E-e . Nio ko aŋkiskisu ta kembei ma irao pombol yo muŋgu , tona aŋzemu ma la . ”
01032027	To tomtom tana iwi i ma iso : “ Nu zom asiŋ ? ” Yakop iso : “ Nio zoŋ Yakop . ”
01032028	To tomtom tana iso : “ Nu ko zom Yakop mini som . Ko tipaatu be Israel . Pa nu niomŋan Anutu mi zin tomtom kapartoombo mburoyom , mi nu lip pizin kek . ”
01032029	To Yakop iso : “ Mi nu zom asiŋ ? ” Tomtom tana ipekel kwoono ma iso : “ Parei ta nu wi yo pa zoŋ ? ” To ipombol Yakop isu lele tana .
01032030	Mi Yakop iso : “ Nio aŋre Anutu pa motoŋ kek , tamen aŋmeete som . ” Tana ipaata lele tana zaana be Peniel .
01032031	Zoŋ ise na , Yakop izem lele Peniel tana , mi ipa kelsuk ma ila . Paso , ka soobo imbekes .
01032032	Uunu tina ta zin Israel tirao tikan buzur mazaana ta imbot la buzur ka soobo som , ta muŋgu mi imar ma indeeŋe koozi . Paso , Merere ipun Yakop ka soobo ma imbekes .
01033001	Yakop ipa ma ila , to mataana ila na , ire toono Isau imar raama zin tomtom kini munŋaana ta . Tabe ibalak lutuunu bizin ki Lea , mi Rael , mi mbesooŋo moori kini ru .
01033002	Mi iur zin mbesooŋo moori ru ziŋan lutun bizin ma timuuŋgu , to Lea ziŋan lutuunu bizin tito zin , mi Rael ziru lutuunu Yosep tipa kaimer .
01033003	Mi Yakop itunu imuuŋgu . Ipa ma ila ma ire la pa toono , to ilek kumbuunu pini . To imaŋga mini ma ila ŋana ri , to ilek kumbuunu mini . Ikamam ta kembei ma irao lamata mi ru . Ni ikamam , mi toono iloondo ma imar na isou i mi ziru titaŋ .
01033004	
01033005	To Isau mataana ila na , ire zin moori ma pikin . Tabe iwi i ma iso : “ Iŋga ziŋoi ta niomŋan kamar i ? ” Yakop iso : “ Biibi . Iŋga nio lutuŋ bizin ta Anutu ipomoozo yo pa tau . ” Tana zin mbesooŋo moori ru ziŋan lutun bizin timar ma tilek kumbun pa Isau .
01033006	
01033007	To Lea ziŋan lutuunu bizin timar ma tilek kumbun pini . Mi Yosep ziru naana Rael tipa kaimer mi tilek kumbun pini tomini .
01033008	To Isau iwi Yakop ma iso : “ Mi zin wal raama mbili uunuŋan ta timuuŋgu ma timar tipet tio na , ka uunu parei ? ” Yakop iso : “ Biibi tio , ina aŋkam pu bekena nu lelem ambai pio . ”
01033009	Tamen Isau isombe : “ Wai tiziŋ , nio aŋrao pa koroŋ ta boozomen . Koroŋ ku imbot . ”
01033010	To Yakop iso : “ E-e atoŋ , kena pepe . Nu sombe lelem pio kat , nako kam koroŋ boozomen ta aŋkam pu na . Pa muŋaiŋana ta swe pio i , na aŋre kembei ta Anutu muŋaiŋana kini .
01033011	Tana kam koroŋ ta nio aŋkam pu na . Pa Anutu ipomoozo yo ma ikam leŋ koroŋ boozo kat . ” Yakop imaŋmaŋ tabe Isau ikam .
01033012	To Isau iso : “ Ambai , tamaŋga mini ma tala ta buri . ”
01033013	Tamen Yakop iso : “ E-e biibi , nu muuŋgu . Pa iŋgi niamŋan zin pikin ma moori amwwa . Mi zin sipsip mi mekmek ti nan bizin tipiwinin zin men i . Mi nin saana pa pai kek . Sombe aŋpatoto zin ma tikam pai londi pa aigule tamen , nako timetmeete lup .
01033014	Tana nu muuŋgu , mi nio niamŋan lutundu bizin mi zin mbili ko ampa riŋariŋa ma ko ama ampet ku ta Seir na . ”
01033015	To Isau iso : “ Ambai , kenako aŋur lem wal tio pakan be timboro yom mi niomŋan kamar . ” Tamen Yakop iso : “ E-e . Toŋgo . Muŋaiŋana ta swe piam kek , ina irao . ”
01033016	Tana aigule tana Isau imiili ma ila mini pa Seir .
01033017	Tamen Yakop , ni ila Seir som . Ipa ma ila kar toro zaana Sukot . Ila ipet kar tana , tona ipo le beeze , mi ipo beeze pakan pizin mbili kini tomini . Tana tipaata kar tana zaana be Sukot .
01033018	Indeeŋe Yakop izem lele ki Mesopotamia , mi imiili ma imar toono Kanaan na , ipun su kolouŋana pa kar biibi ta zaana Sekem .
01033019	Mi iŋgiimi toono ta ni imbotmbot pa na ila kizin wal ki Amor pa pat milmilŋan tomto lamata . ( Amor tina , ni lutuunu zaana Sekem . )
01033020	Mi Yakop ipo patoronŋana muriini isu tana , mi ipaata be El Eloe Israel .
01034001	Zin tipun su igarau kar Sekem , mi aigule ta na , Yakop ziru Lea lutun moori Dina ila ma iso ire zin tamuriŋ kar kan .
01034002	Tamen Amor ta ikamam peeze pa kar tana na , lutuunu Sekem ire Dina , to isou i mi imbuuli .
01034003	Sekem , ni leleene ilip kat pa Dina , tana ikam sua leleeneŋana pini bekena leleene pini .
01034004	Mi iso pa tamaana Amor ma iso : “ Tamaŋ , nio leleŋ pa moori taŋga . Tana leleŋ be la ki wal kini , mi niomŋan kuurpe sua be aŋwooli . ”
01034005	Indeeŋe ta Yakop ileŋ sua pa mbulu ta Sekem ikam pa lutuunu moori na , iso sua karau som . Pa lutuunu bizin tila timborro mbili kini isu lele pakaana toro . Tana iyaraama itunu mi inaama zin be timar muŋgu .
01034006	Inamnaama zin ma imbotmbot , mi Amor ta Sekem tamaana i , imaŋga to ila kini , be ziru tiurpe sua .
01034007	Mi indeeŋe tana na , Yakop lutuunu bizin timiili ma tipet kar kek . Beso tileŋ sua pa mbulu pamiaŋŋana ta Sekem ikam pa lunri na , keten malmal ma lelen ibeleu kat . Pa tire mbulu tiŋga ma irao som kat .
01034008	Tamen Amor iso pizin ma iso : “ Keleŋ . Lutuŋ Sekem , ni leleene ilip kat pa moori tiom tina . Tana parei , ko irao koyok be ziru tiwoolo ?
01034009	To iti ko irao taparwoolo iti . Niam ko amwoolo lutuyom moori bizin , mi niom ko kowoolo lutuyam moori bizin .
01034010	Naso tewe toŋmatiziŋ . Mi iti ko taparlup ti , mi tombotmbot la mbata su toono ti , mi taparŋgimgiimi koroŋ kiti . ”
01034011	To Sekem imaŋga mi iso pa Dina tamaana mi toono bizin ma iso : “ Niom kosombe koyok la kalŋoŋ , na koroŋ ta sombe leleyom pa i , nako aŋkam piom .
01034012	Tana koso yo pa kadoono ki moori . Mi sombe isala , som isu , na nio ko aŋkam piom . Tamen koyok pio be aŋkam moori tana . ”
01034013	Tamen Yakop lutuunu bizin tikam ŋgar pa lunri Dina ta Sekem ipasaani kek . Tana tikam sua pakaamŋana pa Sekem ziru tamaana Amor ta kembei . Tiso :
01034014	“ Niam ko irao amyok pa luyamri be iwoolo tomooto ta tireeti som na som . Pa sombe amkam ta kembena , inako koyam miaŋ .
01034015	Zaala tamen ta imbotmbot i . Bela niom kereete tomooto tiom ta boozomen ma tiwe kembei ta niam i , to amyok pa sua tiom .
01034016	Mi amyok piom be itiŋan taparwoolo iti , mibe ambot su lele tiŋgi ma itiŋan tewe wal tamen .
01034017	Tamen sombe koyok pa reeteŋana som , nako amkam luyamri mi niamŋan amla leyam . ”
01034018	Amor ziru lutuunu Sekem tileŋ sua tana na , lelen pa . Tabe karau men mi Sekem imaŋga pa ka uraata . Paso , ni leleene ilip kat pa Yakop lutuunu moori . Sekem tina , wal kini ta boozomen matan ise kini mi tileŋleŋ la kalŋaana .
01034019	
01034020	Tana Amor ziru lutuunu Sekem tila pa lupŋana muriini ta igarau pa zaala kwoono na , mi tiso sua pizin wal kar kan ta kembei . Tisombe :
01034021	“ Wal taŋga , zin ambaimbaiŋan . Mi tisombe itiŋan taparlup ti ma tewe wal tamen . Mi niamru amsombe zin tirao be timbot pa toono kiti mi tipa pa . Pa toono kiti biibi ma irao pa iti mi zin tomini . Mi iti sombe toyok pizin , inako irao be itiŋan taparwoolo iti .
01034022	Tamen zin timbol pa koroŋ tamen tis . Bela tereete tomooto kiti ta boozomen ma tewe kembei ta zin a , tona tiyok piti be itiŋan tombot lele tiŋgi ma tewe wal tamen .
01034023	Mi mbili ma mburu kizin ko tiwe lende tomini . Tana amsombe amwi yom muŋgu . Parei , ko toyok pa ŋgar kizin ? Niom ituyom tau . ”
01034024	Zin wal kar kan tileŋ Sekem ziru tamaana Amor kalŋan na , tiyok men . Tana tireete tomooto kizin ta boozomen .
01034025	Uraata ki reeteŋana imap ma ka aigule iwe tel pa na , zin tomooto tina timbotmbot raama ka yoyouŋana . Tana timbotmbot , mi Yakop lutuunu bizin ru , Simion mi Lebi , timaŋga ramaki buza kizin mi tilela kar biibi . Mi kar kan tiute ŋgar kizin som . Tana Simion ziru Lebi tila mi tikas zin tomooto ta boozomen ma timap .
01034026	Mi tiŋgal Amor ziru Sekem tomini . To tikam lunri Dina , mi tizem ruumu ki Sekem ma tila len .
01034027	To Yakop lutuunu bizin pakan timaŋga ma tilela kar tana , mi tiyo koroŋ kizin wal ta timetmeete na ma imap . Paso , zin tipasaana lunri tau . Mi tikam makau kizin , doŋki kizin , sipsip kizin , koroŋ kizin ruumu leleene kana , kini kizin , mburu kizin ta kadon bibip na , mi tiyo ma imap kat . Sa imbot mini som . Mi tikoki zin moori kizin mi pikin tomini . To tizem kar mi tila len .
01034028	
01034029	
01034030	Tikam mbulu tana tabe Yakop isu mi iso pa Simion ziru Lebi ma iso : “ Waii , niomru kapasaana uruŋ ma isaana kat . Zin wal ki Kanaan mi Peres ta timbotmbot lele pakaana ti na , sombe tilup zin mi tikam malmal piti , inako tikas ti ma tamap . Pa iti boozoŋanda iŋgoi ? ”
01034031	Tamen ziru tipekel kalŋaana ma tiso : “ Luyamri , ni moori zaala lwoono kana be tikam mbulu ta kembei pini ? ”
01035001	Kaimer to Anutu iso pa Yakop ma iso : “ Indeeŋe ta nu ko pa tom Isau na , nio ta aŋpet ku isu zaala lwoono . Tana maŋga ma sala mini pa kar Betel , mi po patoronŋana muriini pio isu tana . ”
01035002	Tana Yakop iso pa wal kini mi zin tomtom ta ziŋan timbotmbot na , ma iso : “ Kozo kipiri ke teeteŋan tiom ta munŋaana men ma tila len , mi kuurpe ituyom , mi kekel yom .
01035003	Tonabe tamaŋga mi tasala pa kar Betel . Pa nio aŋsombe aŋpo patoronŋana muriini pa Anutu ta ileŋ suŋŋana tio mi itatke yo pa pataŋana tio , mi mataana pio pa pai tio . ”
01035004	Tana zin tikam ke teeteŋan kizin ta boozomen ramaki aigau tau talŋan kana i , mi tiur la ki Yakop , mi ni itwi sula ke biibi uunu ta igarau pa kar Sekem na .
01035005	Tona ziŋan wal kini timaŋga pa pai kizin , mi tiwwa ma tila . Mi wal boozomen ta timbotmbot kolouŋana pa kar Sekem na , Anutu ikam zin ma timoto biibi kat . Tabe timbuulu Yakop ziŋan wal kini som .
01035006	Yakop ziŋan wal kini tiwwa ma tila mi tipet kar Lus . Lus imbot pa lele pakaana ki Kanaan . Ina Betel tau .
01035007	To Yakop ipo patoronŋana muriini ta , mi ipaata kar tana be El Betel . Paso , muŋgu , indeeŋe ta ni iko pa toono na , Anutu ipet kini isu kar tana .
01035008	Yakop ziŋan wal kini timbotmbot su kar Betel , mi Debora ta mbesooŋo moori ki Rebeka na , imeete . To titwi i su ke biibi uunu ta igarau pa kar na . Tana tipaata ke tana zaana be “ ke ki tiŋiizi . ”
01035009	Indeeŋe Yakop izem lele pakaana ki Mesopotamia , mi imiili ma imar ipet toono Kanaan mini na , Anutu ipet kini , mi ipomboli ma iso : “ Nu zom Yakop tau . Tamen koozi ko zom Yakop mini som . Ko tipaatu be Israel . ” Tana Yakop zaana popoŋana na Israel .
01035010	
01035011	Mi Anutu iso pini ta kembei . Iso : “ Nio Anutu mburoŋ keskeezeŋoŋ . Popoŋana ku tabe tiyooto pu i , ko timasak ma tiwe wal boozomen un . Mi pakan ko tiwe king mi timboro zin wal pakan .
01035012	Toono tiŋgi , ta muŋgu aŋbuk sua pa be aŋkam pa Abaraam mi Isak . Mi iŋgi koozi aŋkam pu mi popoŋana ku tabe tipet pa kaimer i . ”
01035013	Anutu iso sua tana pa Yakop ma imap , to izemi mi ila .
01035014	Mi Yakop isuŋgun pat molo ta , to iliŋ yok baen mi ŋgere isala be iwe kilalan pa sua ta ni ziru Merere Anutu tizzo su lele tana .
01035015	Mi ipaata lele tana zaana be Betel .
01035016	To Yakop ziŋan wal kini tizem Betel . Beso tila ma tigarau pa kar Eparata na , Rael pikin ikamami . Mi ni iyamaana yoyouŋana biibi kat .
01035017	To moori ta ipapepe i gi , iso pini ma iso : “ Moto pepe ! Pa iŋgi kam pikin tomooto toro . ”
01035018	Rael iyataaŋa be ipas , mi ipaata pikin zaana be Benoni , mana imeete . Tamen Yakop itooro zaana ma iwe Benyamen .
01035019	Tana Rael imeete , mi titwi i sula zaala ta ila pa kar Eparata na zilŋaana . ( Eparata , ina Betelem tau . )
01035020	To Yakop isuŋgun pat ta be iwe kilalan pa naala ki Rael . Mi koozi kilalan tana imbotmbot men a .
01035021	Israel imaŋga mini , mi iwwa ma ila ipet Migdol Eder , to ipo beeze isu lele tana , mi imbot pa .
01035022	Timbotmbot su lele tana , mi Ruben ila ki tamaana kusiini Bila ma ziru tikeene . Mi uruunu ila ma Yakop ileŋ . Yakop lutuunu bizin tomooto laamuru mi ru tipet ta kembei :
01035023	Lea , ni ipeebe Ruben , ta muŋgamuŋga na , mi Simion , Lebi , Yuda , Isaka , mi Zebulun .
01035024	Mi Rael , ni ipeebe Yosep mi Benyamen .
01035025	Mi mbesooŋo moori ki Rael ta zaana Bila na , ni ipeebe Dan mi Naptali .
01035026	Mi mbesooŋo moori ki Lea ta zaana Silpa na , ni ipeebe Gat mi Aser . Indeeŋe Yakop imbotmbot su lele pakaana ki Mesopotamia na , zin pikin tana tisu .
01035027	Kaimer to , Yakop imaŋga mini mi ila ipet ki tamaana Isak isu kar Mamre ta igarau pa kar Kiriat Arba na . ( Kiriat Arba , ina Ebron tau . Kar tina ta muŋgu Abaraam ziru Isak timbotmbot pa . )
01035028	Mi Isak , ni imbot ma iwe kolman kat , mi ndaama kini irao tomto lamata tomto paŋ ( 180 ) , mana imeete ma ila igaaba zin wal kini ta timetmeete kek na . To lutuunu bizin ru Isau mi Yakop titwi i .
01035029	
01036001	Iŋgi Isau ziŋan popoŋana kini mbol kizin . ( Isau zaana toro Edom . )
01036002	Isau iwoolo moori ru kizin Kanaan : Ada mi Olibama . Ada , ni Elon lutuunu moori . Mi Elon , ni uunu ipet pa Et . Mi Olibama , ni tamaana Ana mi tumbuunu Zibeon . Zibeon , ni uunu ipet pa Ep .
01036003	Mi Isau iwoolo Basemat tomini . Ni Ismael lutuunu moori , mi Nebaiot lunuri .
01036004	Ada ipeebe Elipas . Mi Basemat ipeebe Reuel .
01036005	Mi Olibama ipeebe Yeus , Yalam , mi Kora . Zin pikin ki Isau tina , ta tisu Kanaan .
01036006	Kaimer to Isau imaŋga , mi ikam kusiini bizin , lutuunu bizin , mi wal boozomen ta ziŋan timbotmbot ruumu kini na , ramaki zin mbili mi koroŋ kini boozomen ta ikam su Kanaan na , mi izem tiziini Yakop ma ila pa lele pakaana toro .
01036007	Paso , Yakop ziru Isau , mbili kizin boozo kat . Tana toono irao be ziru timbot mbata na som .
01036008	Tana Isau ta zaana toro Edom na , ila ma imbot pa lele abalabalŋana ki Seir .
01036009	Iŋgi mbol ki Isau ta popoŋana kini tipet ma tiwe wal ki Edom , mi timbotmbot pa lele abalabalŋana ki Seir na .
01036010	Isau lutuunu bizin tipet ta kembei : Kusiini Ada ipeebe Elipas , mi kusiini Basemat ipeebe Reuel .
01036011	Isau lutuunu Elipas lutuunu bizin ta zan tis : Teman , Omar , Sepo , Gatam , mi Kenas .
01036012	Elipas , ni iwoolo moori toro tomini , zaana Timna . Mi Timna , ni ipeebe Amalek . Ina Ada tumbuunu bizin .
01036013	Mi Reuel lutuunu bizin ta zan tis : Naat , Sera , Samma , mi Mizza . Ina zin tina ta Basemat tumbuunu bizin .
01036014	Mi Olibama na , ipeebe pikin tel ta zan tis : Yeus , Yalam , mi Kora .
01036015	Isau popoŋana kini tana tila timbot leŋaleŋa . Mi timender pa urum kizin kizin . Isau lutuunu muŋgamuŋga Elipas , ni lutuunu bizin ta zan tis : Teman , Oman , Sepo , Kenas , Kora , Gatam , mi Amalek . Zin popoŋana ki Elipas tina timbot lele pakaana ki Edom , mi timender pa urum kizin kizin . Ina Ada tumbuunu bizin .
01036016	
01036017	To ki Reuel ta Naat , Zera , Samma , mi Mizza . Zin popoŋana ki Reuel tina , zin tomini timbot lele pakaana ki Edom , mi timender pa urum kizin kizin . Ina Basemat tumbuunu bizin .
01036018	Mi Olibama na , ni ipeebe Yeus , Yalam , mi Kora . Mi zin tomini timender pa urum kizin kizin .
01036019	Wal ta boozomen tana , ta Isau popoŋana kini men . Mi zin ta boozomen timender pa urum kizin kizin .
01036020	Tomooto ta , zaana Seir , ni imbot lele ki Edom tomini . Ni uunu ipet pa Or . Iŋgi Seir lutuunu bizin ta zan tis : Lotan , Sobal , Zibeon , Ana , Dison , Ezer , mi Disan . Seir lutuunu bizin tina , ta tikamam peeze pizin Or ta timbot su lele pakaana ki Edom na .
01036021	
01036022	Lotan kini ta Ori mi Omam . Mi Lotan lunuri zaana Timna .
