19103007	Muŋgu , ni iswe zaala kini pa Mose , mi ikam uraata bibip ila zin Israel matan ma tire kat .
19103008	Yooba , ni leleene izanzaana pizin mbesooŋo kini , mi imuŋaiŋai zin mi ikampewe zin . Ni keteene malmal karau som . Mi itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur kat leleene pa wal kini .
19103009	Ŋonoono , ni keteene malmal pa sanaana kiti mi iyamyaamba iti pa . Tamen kete malmalŋana kini ko imbotmbot ma alok na som .
19103010	Mbulu ta takamam ŋoobo na , ni irao iŋgal kat matanda pa . Tamen ikamam ta kembei som . Imuŋaiŋai iti , mi ipokotkot kat sanaana kiti som .
19103011	Muŋaiŋana ta Yooba izzwe pizin wal ta timototo i mi tileŋleŋ la kalŋaana na , isala ta kor a , kembei saamba imbot kor kat pa toono .
19103012	Kere . Lele pakaana ta zoŋ izze pa i , mi pakaana ta zoŋ izulla pa i , tipargarau zin ? Som . Timbot molo kat . Mi Yooba ikamam pa sanaana kiti ta kembena . Izirziiri ma ila imbot molo kat piti .
19103013	Zin wal ta timototo Yooba mi tiurur lelen pini na , ni leleene izanzaana pizin kembei ta pikin taman bizin lelen izanzaana pizin .
19103014	Pa ni itunu ta imbuuzu iti . Tana mataana iŋgalŋgal ta kembei : Iti tomtom toono kanda na , ululu men .
19103015	Mbotŋana ta takam su toono ti na , molo som . Tombot rimen mi tamap . Iti kembei ta manman pwoono . Sombe zoŋ ise , na ipeele . Mi so ila rorou , na imelle .
19103016	Mi sombe miiri iwilaala , na itop su toono ma muriini bilim .
19103017	Tamen zin wal tau timototo Yooba mi tileŋleŋ la kalŋaana na , ni ko iurur leleene pizin mi imuŋaiŋai zin , mi iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila . Mi ni ko imendernder pa popoŋana kizin mi iuluulu zin pa pataŋana kizin . Tana zin wal tau titoto sua ta ziŋan Anutu timbuk na , mi tiurpe tutu kini mi titoto ka mbulu na , ni ko iurur leleene pizin ma alok .
19103018	
19103019	Yooba iur muriini peeze kana isu saamba . Ni king biibi ta ikamam peeze pa koroŋ ta boozomen .
19103020	Tana niom aŋela mbolkeŋkeŋŋoyom ki Yooba , kamap ma kapakuri . Niom aŋela ta keleŋleŋ la kalŋaana mi kototo sua kini na , kiwit uruunu !
19103021	Mi niom malmal koyom ki kar saamba ta kembesmbeeze pini mi kototo kat leleene na , ta kembena . Kiwit uruunu ma isala kor !
19103022	Niom koroŋ ta Yooba iur yom ma karao pa toono na , kamap ma kapakuri . Pa ni biibi tiom mi ikamam peeze piom . Mi nio ta kembena . Leleŋ ko imap ipakur Yooba pa kampeŋana kini .
19104001	Leleŋ ko imap ipakur Yooba pa kampeŋana kini . O Yooba , Anutu tio , nu ta biibi ŋonoono . Mburom mi azuŋka ku , ramaki mbulu boozomen ta zom biibi pa i , ina iliu u ma iwe kembei ta mburu pu . Muŋgu kat , nu ur saamba ma iwe kembei saŋarai ta begeene ila molo na , bekena mbotmbot pa .
19104002	
19104003	Mi ur murim ise yok kor kana ŋwaana . Mi miiri tieene , ta iwe lem karis be zze . Tana miiri ikwarra u mi wwa pa maŋaanaŋana .
19104004	Nu ŋgoŋgo miiri ma ilala be ikam uraata ku . Mi lolo ta iwenweene mi ikamam ma you iwedet , ta iwe lem mbesooŋo .
19104005	Muŋgu nu ur toono ma imbot se uunu ta mbolŋana kat . Tana irao imuzik na som .
19104006	Mi nu kam ma tai ilol toono mi zin abal ma timap .
19104007	To maŋga mi kalŋom isala ma yaamba tai . Tabe iko pa toono . Pa kalŋom na , mburaana biibi , kembei ta lele ikuruŋ i . Tana tai ileŋ to , karau men mi iyaaru ma isula imbot muriini , mi toono raraazaŋana ipet .
19104008	Tai iyaaru ma isula na , izem toono mi abalabal ta boozomen ma timbot mat . Mi yok rereereŋan tipet ma tila tizulla lele ŋgolooboŋan . Pa ina murin ta nu ur pizin be timbotmbot pa .
19104009	Mi nu ur mbut pa tai mi toono . Mbut tana , tai irao imolo na som . Tana tai ko irao izooro mi ilol toono mini na som .
19104010	Nu ta kamam yok mbukmbukŋan ma tiwedet pa abal zilŋanzilŋan , mi tirereere ma tizulla pa lele ŋgolooboŋan .
19104011	Yok tana timbotmbot be zin buzur su kan ta boozomen tiwin . Mi zin doŋki saŋsaŋŋan ta miri zin na , zin tomini tiwin ma tirao .
19104012	Mi ke ta timendernder la yok kezenkezen na , man tiwwo len ŋgini sala be timbotmbot pa mi titaŋtaŋ .
19104013	Nu mbotmbot murim ta kor a , mi kamam yaŋ ma izzu bekena pembesmbeeze zin abal . Mi uraata ku tana ikamam ma toono ipiyotyooto koroŋ ambaimbaiŋan boozomen .
19104014	Nu kamam mbutmbuutu ma izze bekena zin mbili tikanan . Mi ur koroŋ pakan pa niam tomtom be ampaaza ma iwe koyam kini .
19104015	Nu ur koyam baen be ampaaza mi amwin ma leleyam ambai . Mi kam ke olib piam , bekena amkam ka ŋgere , mi amsuulu yam pa ma ruŋguyam ambai . Mi ur koyam kini bekena amkan ma ipombol yam .
19104016	Yooba , nu motom iŋgalŋgal ke ku bibip ta timbotmbot Lebanon na , mi kamam yaŋ ma izzu pizin . Tabe tise ma tiwe bibip . Ke tana , nu itum ta paaza zin .
19104017	Ke tana namannaman na , man tiwwo len ŋgini isala . Mi utenuten na , tiwe man kokomo murin .
19104018	Zin abal ta uten mololo na , mekmek saŋsaŋŋan timbotmbot sala . Mi moozo tikewe lela toono sumbunsumbun ta timbotmbot dogo zilŋanzilŋan na .
19104019	Nu ta ur puulu bekena iwe seŋgaaŋa pa ndaama . Mi zoŋ ta ur , ina iute nol tabe ise , mi nol tabe isula .
19104020	Mbeŋ na , nu kamam ma lele zugut , bekena koroŋ su kan tipa .
19104021	Tana laion kalŋan izalla mi tiwwa pa mbeŋ ma tirru kan buzur ta nu itum ur pizin na .
19104022	Mi sombe zoŋ ise , na timilmiili ma tilala mini murin , mi tikenne lela .
19104023	Tonabe tomtom kadoono tiyotyooto pa ruumu kizin , mi tilala ma tikamam uraata kizin ma irao zoŋ isula .
19104024	O Yooba , nu ur koroŋ matakiŋa boozo . Mi koroŋ boozomen ta nu ur na , ina tiswe kembei ŋgar ku biibi kat . Toono ti bok pa koroŋ munŋaana ka tieene ta ur zin na .
19104025	Mi nio aŋkam ŋgar pa tai tomini . Ina biibi kat . Mi koroŋ bibip mi munmun matakiŋa ta timbotmbot sula . Tinin zin na tarao som .
19104026	Wooŋgo tikowo pa tai . Mi Lebiatan , koroŋ zazaŋana ŋonoono ta muŋgu uri na , ta imbotmbot tai leleene mi izogzoogo lele .
19104027	Koroŋ ta munŋaana men tana , sombe petel zin , na tiurur matan pu be kam kan kini .
19104028	Nu mborro zin , tanata tikanan kan kini . Itum nomom , ta ipututu zin pa koroŋ ambaimbaiŋan ma kopon bok .
19104029	Mi sombe turke motom pizin , na tiseŋeeŋe ma tiru zalan . Mi sombe kiskis zin som mi tatke bubuŋan pizin , to timetmeete ma tiwe toono mini .
19104030	Zin buzur mi koroŋ matakiŋa ta timbotmbot su toono na , Bubuŋom ta ipiyotyooto popoŋana kizin ma tiwedet . Gorgori nu kamam uraata , tana popoŋana kizin iwedet su toono .
19104031	Yooba zaana biibi , ramaki mburaana mi azuŋka kini ko imbotmbot ma alok . Mi ni ko leleene ambai pa uraata boozomen ta itunu namaana ikamam na .
19104032	Ni mburaana biibi kat . Sombe mataana isu pa toono risa , na yeŋyeeŋge itok toono . Mi sombe iteege su pa zin abal , na you imaŋga raama ka koi .
19104033	Tana mazwaana ta so aŋbot motoŋ yaryaara na , kalŋoŋ ko izalla mi aŋbombo mboe pa Yooba . Ko leleŋ ambai pa Anutu tio , mi aŋpakurkuri pa mboe ma irao meeteŋana tio .
19104034	Nio menmeen yo biibi pa Yooba . Mi aŋsuŋi be ipazal ŋgar ta imbot la leleŋ i mi mboe tio ma irao pa itunu leleene .
19104035	Mi wal sananŋan mi wal zorzooroŋan na , leleŋ be ni ipambiriizi zin pa toono ma timap kat . Leleŋ be kizin tasa imbot mini pepe . Leleŋ ko imap ipakur Yooba ! Haleluya !
19105001	Leleyom ambai pa Yooba , mi kosoyaara zaana biibi . Koso uraata kini bibip ila zin karkari mazwan bekena zin tiute .
19105002	Kombo mboe pini mi kapakuri . Kipit mbol pa uraata kini ndabokbokŋan boozomen ta ipa ndel kat .
19105003	Yooba , ni zaana potomŋana . Tana iti nindi se pini mi tapakuri ! Zin wal ta so tikam kinkiini be tiute i mi timbot kolouŋana pini , nako lelen ambai kat mi menmeen zin .
19105004	Kuur motoyom pa Yooba mi kusuŋi be ipombol yom pa itunu mburaana . Kakam kinkiini be kuute kati mi kombot kolouŋana pini . Naso ni imbotmbot raama yom totomen .
19105005	Niom popoŋana ki Abaraam ta mbesooŋo kini na , niom popoŋana ki Yakop ta Anutu ipeikat yom na , motoyom iŋgalŋgal uraata mi mos bibip ta ni ikam na . Uraata kini tana ipa ndel kat . Mi kadoono ta ni iur pa kanda koi bizin na , motoyom mbeleele pepe .
19105006	
19105007	Ni Yooba , Anutu kiti tau . Kadoono ta ni iurur pa kanda koi bizin na , uruunu ila ma irao toono ta boozomen .
19105008	Ko mataana iŋgalŋgal sua kini mbukŋana mi itoto ma alok . Tomtom tipepeebe len kelŋan , mi iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila . Mi sua ta ni itunu iur na , ta kembena . Ko imbol ma imbotmbot ma alok .
19105009	Muŋgu ni imbuk sua pa Abaraam be ziru tiparlup zin ma tiwe tamen . To ikam sua raraate men pa Isak , mi ipombol ma imbol kat .
19105010	To ikam sua mbukŋana tana pa Yakop , mi ipombol mini ma iso sua tana ko imbol ma imbotmbot ma alok . Mi iso pa Yakop ta kembei : “ Nio ko aŋkam toono Kanaan ma iwe lem . Mi toono tana ko iwe matamur pa popoŋana ku , be timbotmbot pa , mi iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila . ”
19105011	
19105012	Indeeŋe tana , zin wal boozoŋan som . Wal rimen ŋonoono . Mi tiwe leembe men su toono tana .
19105013	Tana timbot ri isu lele ta , to tizem mi tila lele toro . Tila tipet ki king ta mi timbot raami , to tizemi mi tila tipet ki king toro . Ta kembei men mi tiwwa .
19105014	Mi Anutu , ni mataana pizin . Tana iyok pa wal sa be tikoto zin mi tipasaana zin na som . Mi ikam ŋgalseki pa king pakan ma iso pizin ta kembei : “ Zin wal ta ituŋ aŋpeikat zin mi aŋur zin be tikam uraata tio na , kumbuulu zin pepe . Pa zin tiwe nio kwoŋ . Tana kapasaana zin pepe . ”
19105015	
19105016	To Yooba ikam ma peteele ipet pa toono Kanaan . Tabe Yakop bizin tirao be tindeeŋe kan kini sa som .
19105017	Mi ni iŋgo tomtom kizin ta , zaana Yosep ma imuuŋgu pizin . Ni , tikam mburooŋo pini ma iwe mbesooŋo sorok pizin Aikuptu .
19105018	Mi zin Aikuptu kan tiuri lela ruumu sanaana , mi tikam sen ila ŋgureene mi timbit la kumbuunu . Tana ni ire yoyouŋana ma isaana kat .
19105019	Imbotmbot ta kembei ma irao iso zin Aikuptu kan pa mbulu tabe ipet pizin i , mi sua kini tana iur ŋonoono . Tana sua ta Yooba ikam pini na , iswe Yosep kembei ni le uunu sa som , mi mbulu kini iŋgeeze men .
19105020	To king ki Aikuptu ta ikamam peeze pizin wal boozomen na , iur sua be tiputke Yosep , mi tizemi ma iyooto pa ruumu sanaana .
19105021	Mi iuri be imboro ruumu kini biibi , mibe ikam peeze pa koroŋ kini ta boozomen .
19105022	Tana Yosep iwe biibi pizin wal ta timuŋmuuŋgu pa uraata ki king na , mi ipazalzal zin . Mi zin wal ta tiuluulu king pa ŋgar na , ni ipaute zin pa ŋgar ambaiŋana .
19105023	Ina zaala tina ta zin Israel tisula Aikuptu . Tana popoŋana ki Yakop tiwe leembe pa wal ki Ham toono kizin .
19105024	Mi Yooba ipombolmbol wal kini , ma timasak ma tiwe boozo kat . Tabe mburan ilip pa zin kartu .
19105025	To itooro ŋgar kizin Aikuptu ma tiwe wal kini kan koi . Tana tiru zaala be tipakaam zin mbesooŋo ki Anutu mi tikam pataŋana pizin .
19105026	To Yooba iŋgo mbesooŋo kini Mose ziru Aron ma tisula Aikuptu . Aron tana , Yooba itunu ipeikati .
19105027	Mi ziru tiwe Yooba kwoono mi tiso zin Aikuptu kan pa mos bibip mi uraata mburanŋan tabe Yooba ikam la mazwan i . Uraata tana ipa ndel kat .
19105028	Yooba ikam ma zugut mandiŋ ipet pa toono kizin Aikuptu . Pa zin tizooro la kalŋaana tau .
19105029	Mi itooro yok kizin ma tiwe siŋ . Tabe ye kizin ta boozomen timetmeete lup .
19105030	Mi ikam ma lele kizin bok pa ŋgeu . Ruumu leleene boozomen ta zin peeze kan kizin Aikuptu tikenne pa na , ina tomini ŋgeu tilela ma bok .
19105031	Mi Yooba iur sua , to mberommberom ramaki muŋgingin dudut ma timar , mi tirao pa toono kizin Aikuptu .
19105032	Mi ni itooro yaŋ kizin ma iwe yaŋpat , mi isu ma ipasaana toono kizin . Mi ikam ma lolo niini iwenweene irao lele kizin ta boozomen .
19105033	Tana ipasaana ke baen mi ke fik kizin , mi ke pakan tomini .
19105034	Mi iur sua to siizi munŋaana ka tieene tipet ma tilol lele ma sik . Siizi tana , tinin na tarao som .
19105035	Mi tikan kini ramaki koroŋ boozomen ta tindomdom pa toono kizin Aikuptu na ma imap .
19105036	Kaimer to Yooba ikasgeege lutun bizin muŋgamuŋga ta boozomen . Ula kizin ka ŋonoono mataana kana , ta tisu lup .
19105037	To Yooba iyaaru zin Israel ma tizem Aikuptu , mi tila raama mburu milmilŋan kizin Aikuptu ta tiurpe pa silba mi gol na . Mi timap ma tipa ambai men mi tila . Kizin tasa imborene som .
19105038	Indeeŋe zin Aikuptu kan tire zin Israel tizem zin mi tila na , lelen ambai kat . Pa timoto zin tau !
19105039	Yooba ikam miiri tieene ma iwe ur pizin pa aigule . Mi mbeŋ na , you miaana iyaryaara mi iurur mat pizin .
19105040	Indeeŋe zin tiwi i pa kan kini na , ni ikam man kiau mi kini saamba kana pizin . Tana tikam ma tikan ma kopon bok .
19105041	Ni ipetepaala pat , mi yok ipet pa . Yok tana irereere ma biibi pa lele magargaaraŋana ta ka yok somŋana na .
19105042	Yooba ikam mbulu ta boozomen tana paso , mataana iŋgalŋgal sua kini potomŋana ta imbuk pa mbesooŋo kini Abaraam na .
19105043	Tana Yooba iyaaru zin wal kini ta itunu ipeikat zin na , ma tizem Aikuptu , mi tila raama menmeen zin , mi timbombo mboe pakurŋana .
19105044	Mi ni ikam toono kizin karkari pa wal kini ma iwe len . Tana timbot se wal pakan uraata kizin tieene .
19105045	Mbulu ta boozomen tana , Yooba ikam pizin , bekena tito tutu kini ta imbot pataaŋa kek na , mi mataana iŋgalŋgal sua ta ni ikam pizin . Haleluya !
19106001	Haleluya ! Leleyom ambai pa Yooba mi kapakuri . Pa ni ambaiŋana kat . Ni ko itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19106002	Asiŋ irao inin uraata bibip ta Yooba ikamam na ? Mi asiŋ irao isoyaara mbulu kini boozomen ta iti tapakurkuri pa i ma imap ? Som .
19106003	Zin wal ta so timendernder pizin tomtom mi tiuluulu zin pa pataŋana kizin , mi tikamam mbulu ndeeŋeŋana totomen , nako lelen ambai kat . Pa kampeŋana ki Anutu ko imbotmbot se kizin .
19106004	O Yooba , nu itum ta peikat zin Israel mi kam zin ma tiwe lem . Sombe swe kampeŋana ku pizin mini mi kamke zin pa pataŋana kizin , na motom iŋgal yo mi uulu yo tomini . Pa leleŋ be ituŋ aŋre kat mbulu ambaiŋana tabe kam pizin i . Mi sombe uulu zin ma timbot ambai mini , mi kam zin ma lelen ndabok , na leleŋ be aŋgaaba zin , mi niamŋan menmeen yam mi ampakuru .
19106005	
19106006	Niam taiŋgi , mbulu tiam sa irao pa nu motom som . Pa amkamam sanaana kembei ta tumbuyam bizin . Amkam ŋoobo kek . Pa zaala ku , amtoto som .
19106007	Indeeŋe tumbuyam bizin timbotmbot Aikuptu na , nu kam uraata bibip pizin . Uraata tana ipa ndel kat . Tamen zin tikam ŋgar pa som . Mi nu urur lelem pizin mi muŋaiŋai zin biibi kat . Tamen zin matan iŋgalŋgal mbulu ku tana som . Nu ta Anutu kor kana kat . Mi zin tila tipet Tai Siŋsiŋŋana , to tikam zooroŋana pu .
19106008	Tamen Yooba , ni zaana biibi pa mburaana mi muŋaiŋana kini . Tana ikamke zin bekena iswe mburaana biibi ma ipet mat .
19106009	Indeeŋe tana , ni kalŋaana isala ma iso la pa Tai Siŋsiŋŋana , to imet ma iwe ru , mi toono raraazaŋana ipet . To iyaaru wal kini ma tipa pa magargaara ta imbot meleebe kat na , ma tila .
19106010	Tana ni ikamke zin pa kan koi bizin . Itatke zin la kan koi bizin naman , tana zin tirao be tipasaana zin som .
19106011	To tai imiili ma ilol kan koi bizin ma timetmeete lup . Kizin tasa imbot mini som .
19106012	Tona zin Israel tiurla sua kini , mi timbo mboe pakurŋana pini .
19106013	Tamen molo som to , matan mbeleele uraata bibip ta ni ikam pizin na . Mi tisa i be iswe ŋgar kini pizin som . Tito zitun ŋgar kizin men .
19106014	Pa indeeŋe ta timbotmbot lele bilimŋana na , nin gesges pa kini mataana ta , mi tikam kaisiigi be tikan koroŋ matakiŋa . Tana tisu mi tisombe titoombo Yooba mburaana .
19106015	Mi koroŋ ta tiwi i pa na , ni ikam pizin . Tamen iur mete sananŋana ma ipasaana zin tomini .
19106016	Zin tilup zin ma timbotmbot su lele bilimŋana na , tomtom kizin pakan timaŋga mi matan mburmbur pa Mose ziru toono Aron ta mbesooŋo potomŋana ki Yooba na .
19106017	To toono kwoono ikaaga , mi iwon Datan . Mi Abiram ziŋan wal kini titoptop sula toono sumbuunu tana tomini , to toono ila imun mini .
19106018	To you imbot saamba mi isu ma ikan wal pakan ta tito zin pa ŋgar kizin tana . Wal sananŋan tana , you ikan zin ma timap .
19106019	Tila tipet abal Sinai uunu , to tiurpe makau ruŋguunu pa pat gol , mi tilek kumbun pa merere pakaamŋana tana .
19106020	Tana Anutu kizin ta zaana biibi , mi mburaana biibi , mi imbotmbot lela azuŋka kini leleene na , tipizil ndemen pini . Mi tisu ma tipakur koroŋ ta ikanan mbutmbuutu na ruŋguunu .
19106021	Tana Anutu ŋonoono ta ikamke zin , mi ikam uraata bibip su Aikuptu na , matan mbeleele kati .
19106022	Ni itooro mos bibip isu toono kizin Ham , mi ikam uraata mburanŋan isu Tai Siŋsiŋŋana . Uraata tana , tomtom tire ma timoto . Tamen zin Israel tikam ŋgar pa som .
19106023	Tana Anutu isombe ipambiriizi zin ma timap kat . Tamen mbesooŋo kini Mose ta ni itunu ipeikati na , ni imender pizin Israel ma isuŋ mbolŋana pa Anutu . Tabe ni ikoto kete malmalŋana kini , mi ipasaana wal kini som .
19106024	Indeeŋe zin Israel tigarau toono Kanaan na , tiurla sua mbukŋana ki Yooba som . Pa toono ambaiŋana ta ni isombe ikam pizin na , zin titit .
19106025	Mi lelen be tito kalŋaana som , mi timbotmbot lela beeze kizin men mi tikamam ŋunuŋunuŋ .
19106026	Tana ni imbuk sua mbolŋana pizin , mi iwit namaana bekena ipombol sua tana ma imbol kat . Sua ta kembei : Ni kola ikas zin su lele bilimŋana ma timap kat ,
19106027	mi iyaŋgwiiri popoŋana kizin ma tila timbot leŋaleŋa irao lele ta boozomen .
19106028	Indeeŋe ta tila tipet abal Peor na , tigaaba zin wal ta timbesmbeeze pa merere pakaamŋana zaana Baal . Pa patoronŋana ta wal tana tikamam pa ke teeteŋan kizin na , zin Israel tikan ka kini tomini .
19106029	Tabe tipas kat Yooba keteene , mi ni ipasaana zin pa mete sananŋana .
19106030	To tomtom kizin ta , zaana Pineas , imaŋga mi imender la Anutu mi zin Israel mazwan , mi isuŋ pizin . Tabe mete sananŋana tana imap .
19106031	Mbulu kini tana , ta ikam ma Anutu ire i kembei tomtom ndeeŋeŋana . Mi Anutu ko mataana iŋgalŋgali ta kembei ma alok .
19106032	Zin tila ma tipet yok Meriba , to tipamalmal Yooba keteene mini . Mi tikam pataŋana pa Mose tomini .
19106033	Pa tipas keteene , tabe ni ikam kat ŋgar som , mi ipiri sorok sua .
19106034	Indeeŋe ta tipet toono Kanaan na , Yooba iso pizin be tikas zin wal ta timbotmbot toono tana ma timap kat . Tamen tikas zin som .
19106035	Ziŋan zin Kanaan timbotmbot mbata , mi tigabgaaba zin pa mbulu kizin soroksorok ta boozomen .
19106036	Mi timbesmbeeze pa merere kizin pakaamŋan , mi mbulu tana iwe kilis pizin .
19106037	To tisu ma tikam zitun lutun bizin mi lutun moori bizin , mi tipun zin ma timetmeete , bekena tiwe patoronŋana pa merere pakaamŋan kizin Kanaan .
19106038	Zitun lutun bizin mi lutun moori bizin ta len uunu sa isaana som , ta zin Israel tipun zin ma siŋin ireere su toono , bekena tiwe patoronŋana pa zin merere pakaamŋan kizin Kanaan . Tana tikam ma toono kizin isaana kat pa Anutu mataana .
19106039	Pa mbulu kizin iŋgeeze som , mi sua ta ziŋan Yooba timbuk na , tipizil ndemen pa .
19106040	Zin na , Yooba wal kini ŋonoono . Tamen tipas kat keteene . Tabe tikam ma ni leleene pizin mini risa som .
19106041	To izem zin la zin karkari naman , mi kan koi bizin kadoono timboro zin .
19106042	Tana kan koi bizin tiur pataŋana boozo ise kizin , mi tikoto zin pa mburan , mi tikam zin ma tiwe mbesooŋo sorok pizin .
19106043	Tana Yooba , ni mataana iŋgalŋgal zin Israel , mi itatkewe zin pa pataŋana boozomen . Tamen zin tizorzoori , mi titoto zitun ŋgar kizin men . Tipaŋoobo kat pa zaala kini . Tana tisu ma timbot ŋoobo kat .
19106044	Mi Yooba ileŋleŋ tiŋiizi kizin mi irre pataŋana kizin ,
19106045	to mataana iŋgal sua mbukŋana ta ikam pa tumbun bizin na , mi ikototo kete malmalŋana kini . Pa ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini .
19106046	Tana kan koi bizin boozomen ta tiyo zin ma tila lele kizin na , Yooba itooro ŋgar kizin ma lelen isaana pizin Israel mi timuŋai zin .
19106047	O Yooba , Anutu tiam , iŋgi ambot leŋaleŋa ila zin karkari mazwan . Yogeege yam , mi kam yam ma amiili mi amlup yam su toono tiam mini . Tonabe leleyam ambai pu mi ampakur zom potomŋana .
19106048	Iti tapakur Yooba pa kampeŋana kini . Ni Anutu kiti Israel . Tapakurkuri totomen ! Mi iwal biibi be tiso : “ Ŋonoono . ” Haleluya !
19107001	Leleyom ambai pa Yooba mi kapakuri . Pa ni ambaiŋana kat . Ko iurur leleene pa wal kini mi imuŋaiŋai zin ma alok .
19107002	Zin wal ta Yooba itatke zin la kan koi bizin naman na , irao tiso sua ta kembei . Paso ni itatke zin pa pataŋana kizin , mi ikam zin ma timbot ambai .
19107003	Muŋgu kan koi bizin tikam zin ma tila timbot leŋaleŋa ila karkari mazwan . Pakan timbot lele ta zoŋ izze pa i , mi pakan timbot lele ta zoŋ izulla pa i . Timbot irao tai pakaana ta boozomen . Mi Yooba iyogeege zin , mi ikam zin ma timiili ma timar kar kizin mini .
19107004	Tomtom pakan tisaŋsaŋ pa lele bilimŋana ta magargaara men . Mi tirru zaala ki kar sa be tito mi tila timbot pa . Tamen tindeeŋe som .
19107005	Zin petel zin , mi miri zin ma mburan imap .
19107006	Tana timbot ŋoobo kat . Mi titaŋroro Yooba , to ni iuulu zin pa pataŋana kizin .
19107007	Ipatooŋo zin pa zaala ambaiŋana , mi zin tito ma tila mi tindeeŋe kar be timbot pa .
19107008	Tana zin irao lelen ambai pa Yooba mi tipakurkuri . Pa ni iurur leleene pa wal kini mi imuŋaiŋai zin . Mi ikamam uraata bibip ta ipa ndel kat , bekena iuulu zin tomtom .
19107009	Wal ta miri zin na , ni ipalumluumu ŋguren . Mi zin wal ta petel zin na , ni ikamam kan koroŋ ambaimbaiŋan ma tirao kat .
19107010	Mi tomtom pakan na , timbotmbot lela zugut biibi leleene , mi pataŋana ikamam zin mabe timeete i . Timbotmbot lela ruumu sanaana leleene , mi re ma sen ikanan zin ma tisaana kat .
19107011	Pa tizorzooro sua ki Anutu kor kana kat . Mi ŋgar ta ni leleene iur pa na , tirepilpiili mi tito som .
19107012	Tana ni iur uraata sananŋana kat ise kizin bekena ikoto zin . Mi zin tikunkun ma titoptop su toono , mi len tomtom sa be iuulu zin som .
19107013	Tana timbot ŋoobo kat . Mi titaŋroro Yooba , to ni iuulu zin pa pataŋana kizin .
19107014	Itatke zin pa zugut biibi tana leleene , mi ikam zin ma tiyooto ma tipet mat . Mi iyembut re mi sen pizin .
19107015	Tana zin irao lelen ambai pa Yooba mi tipakurkuri . Pa ni iurur leleene pa wal kini mi imuŋaiŋai zin . Mi ikamam uraata bibip ta ipa ndel kat , bekena iuulu zin tomtom .
19107016	Kataama mbolŋana ki ruumu sanaana na , ni ipetepaala . Mi ain mbolŋan ta ipombolmbol kataama na , ni ibogboogo ma ipolpol lup .
19107017	Mi tomtom pakan na , zin talliŋan mi tinoknok zooroŋana . Zin tikamam ŋoobo mbulu , tana mete biibi ikam zin ma tirre yoyouŋana pa .
19107018	Zin lelen pa kini sa mini som . Sombe tire kini sa , na tikamam be tilulu . Tana timbot naala kezeene kek .
19107019	Zin ra , timbot ŋoobo kat . Mi titaŋroro Yooba , to ni iuulu zin pa pataŋana kizin .
19107020	Iur sua mi sua kini tana iurpe zin ma nin ambai mini . Muŋgu timbot naala kezeene . Mi ni itatke zin pa meeteŋana .
19107021	Tana zin irao lelen ambai pa Yooba mi tipakurkuri . Pa ni iurur leleene pa wal kini mi imuŋaiŋai zin . Mi ikamam uraata bibip ta ipa ndel kat , bekena iuulu zin tomtom .
19107022	Tana zin irao lelen ambai pa uraata bibip ta ni ikam pizin na , mi tikam patoronŋana pini . Mi kalŋan isala mi tipakuri pa mboe , mi tisoyaara uraata kini tana .
19107023	Tomtom pakan na , tise wooŋgo mi tikwai ma tila lele molo be tikam mburooŋo .
19107024	Zin tire kat Yooba mburaana , mi uraata bibip ta ni ikamam su tai lwoono na .
19107025	Pa ni iur sua , to miiri biibi ipol , mi ipei duubu ma ise .
19107026	Mi duubu iwit wooŋgo kizin ma isala ta kor a . Beso izem na , sam ma ila ne . Som , mi ise mini . Tana motoŋana biibi ikam zin ma mburan imap kat .
19107027	Mi matan mburri , mi tila ma timelmel su kembei tomtom ta iwin ma ikankaana . Zin tiute kat peeze kamŋana . Tamen tirao som .
19107028	Tana timbot ŋoobo kat . Mi titaŋroro Yooba , to ni iuulu zin pa pataŋana kizin .
19107029	Ikam ma miiri imap , mi duubu keten su , mi taun .
19107030	Zin tire taun isu , to lelen ambai mi menmeen zin biibi . Mi Yooba ikam zin ma sor lela lele ta tisombe tila pa i .
19107031	Tana zin irao lelen ambai pa Yooba mi tipakurkuri . Pa ni iurur leleene pa wal kini mi imuŋaiŋai zin . Mi ikamam uraata bibip ta ipa ndel kat , bekena iuulu zin tomtom .
19107032	Tana sombe Anutu wal kini tilup zin pa suŋŋana , na wal tana bela tiwit Yooba uruunu ma isala ta kor a . Mi tipakuri lela lupŋana kizin wal peeze kan tomini .
19107033	Yooba , ni irao ikam ma lele ta yok bibip tireere pa i iwe lele magargaaraŋana ta ka yok somŋana i . Mi lele ta yok bukbuk ma tizze pa i na , ni irao ipumun mi lele tana kerekere .
19107034	Mi toono mbuyeeneŋana na , ni irao be ipasaana ma iwe toono sananŋana ta kosa sa irao be indom pa mini som . Mbulu ta kembei , ni ikamam pa lele ta ka tomtom bizin tinoknok mbulu sananŋana .
19107035	Ni irao be ikam ma yok biibi ireere pa lele magargaaraŋana ta ka yok somŋana i . Mi ni irao be ikam ma yok bukbuk ma tise pa lele kerekereŋana .
19107036	Mi zin wal ta petel zin na , ni ko ikam zin ma tila timbot pa lele ambaiŋana tana , mi titu ma iwe len kar .
19107037	Mi zin ko tipaaza kan kini ma baen , mi tikam mai ambaiŋana .
19107038	Mi ni ko ipombol zin ma timasak ma tiwe boozo kat , mi mataana pa mbili kizin tomini ma timasak ma tiwe boozo .
19107039	Muŋgu mburan izzu mi tire yoyouŋana . Pa kan koi bizin tikototo zin mi tiseseeze matan . Tana timbot ŋoobo mi lelen ipata kat . Mi iŋgi timbot ambai mini .
19107040	Pa Yooba ikototo zin wal zanŋan mi ipasomsom zin . Mi ikamam ma tizirri zin mi tila tiliuliu len sorok pa lele bilimŋana .
19107041	Tamen zin wal ta timbot ŋoobo mi tibaada pataŋana biibi na , ni ipakurkur zin , mi mataana pizin ma timasak ma tiwe wal boozo .
19107042	Mbulu kini tana , zin wal ndeeŋeŋan tire ma lelen ambai kat . Mi wal sananŋan ta boozomen na , len sua sa mini som . Sua kizin imap .
19107043	Tomtom ta so le ŋgar , inako ikamam ŋgar pa mbulu ti , mi mataana ilala pa mbulu ki Yooba ta iurur leleene pa wal kini mi imuŋaiŋai zin .
19108001	O Anutu , iŋgi leleŋ iwe ru som . Ŋgar tio imbol be aŋpase pu mi aŋto zaala ku . Tana nio ko aŋbo mboe mi aŋpakuru .
19108002	
19108003	Ko aŋmaŋga mi aŋkam kombom tio , mi aŋzze ma irao zoŋ pok ma ise .
19108004	Yooba , nio ko aŋpakuru ila karkari mazwan , mi aŋso zin ta kembei : Nio leleŋ ambai pa kampeŋana ku . Ko aŋbombo mboe mi aŋwidit urum isala kor irao toono ta boozomen .
19108005	Pa muŋaiŋana mi kampeŋana ta nu zzwe pa wal ku , ina biibi kat . Isala ma ilip pa saamba a . Mi mbulu ku ta toto sua ku mbukŋana na , ta kembena . Isala ta kor a .
19108006	O Anutu , maŋga mi swe azuŋka ku mi mburom ta zom biibi pa i , sala saamba . Mi swe ma irao toono ta boozomen tomini .
19108007	Leŋ suŋŋana tiam ti , mi swooro nomom woono ma uulu yam . Pa niam wal ku ta nu lelem piam ilip . Tana kamke yam lak !
19108008	Muŋgu Anutu imbot lela urum kini potomŋana mi iso ta kembei : “ Nio niŋ se paso , aŋporou ma aŋlip kek . Tana ko aŋpeete toono Sekem mi lele ŋgolooboŋana ki Sukot , mi aŋur ma iwe leyom leyom .
19108009	Toono pakaana ki Gileat , ina nio tio . Mi toono kizin Manase tomini , ina nio tio men . Eparaim ta iwe kembei koroŋ ta ipakaala uteŋ . Mi lele pakaana ki Yudea , ina kembei tete ta iwe kilalan pa peeze ta aŋkamam i .
19108010	Mi lele pakaana ki Moap , ina iwe kembei timbiiri ta aŋwwe pa i . Mi lele pakaana ki Edom , ina lele ta aŋpiri kumbuŋ keteene pa . Mi zin Pilistia kan na , nio aŋlip pizin kek . Tana niŋ ise mi kalŋoŋ izalla ! ”
19108011	Asiŋ ta irao be ikam yo ma aŋlip pa koŋ koi bizin , mi aŋlela kar kizin ta ka siiri mbolŋana na ? Asiŋ ko imuuŋgu pio , mi iyaaru yo ma aŋla aŋpet lele pakaana ki Edom ?
19108012	Asiŋ toro ? Anutu , nu tau ! Tamen iŋgi nu pizil ndemem piam , mi gabgaaba zin malmal kan tiam mini som .
19108013	O Anutu , uulu yam be amlip pa koyam koi bizin . Pa ulaaŋa ta amkamam la kizin tomtom , ina koroŋ sorok .
19108014	Sombe Anutu igaaba iti , nako tilip . Pa ni irao be ikoto kanda koi bizin ma mburan imap .
19109001	O Anutu , nio aŋpakurkuru . Mi nu mbomboorem sorok pepe . Maŋga mi kam mbulu sa tabe iswe kembei nio leŋ uunu sa isaana som !
19109002	Pa wal sananŋan mi wal pakamkaamŋan tiwe koŋ koi mi tiŋgalŋgal sorok sua pakaamŋana pio .
19109003	Zin tiurur koi pio mi tiwirri sorok sua sananŋana kat pio . Mi timaŋgaŋga pio mi tipasansaana sorok nio zoŋ .
19109004	Muŋgu nio aŋurur leleŋ pizin . Tamen iŋgi tisu mi tipokot mbulu tio tana pa mbulu sananŋana mi tiŋgalŋgal sua pio . Mi nio tomtom ki suŋŋana .
19109005	Nio aŋkamam mbulu ambaiŋana men pizin mi aŋurur leleŋ pizin . Tamen zin tipokot pa mbulu sananŋana , mi tiurur koi pio sorok . Mi timbuuru koŋ mi tisuŋ sosor pio ta kembei :
19109006	“ Kozo tuur tomtom sananŋana tasa be imender su zilŋaana uunu , mi iŋgal sua pini ta kembei : ‘ To tana , nio aŋre i ikam ŋoobo mbulu . ’
19109007	Beso ni imender be titiiri sua kini , nako tindeeŋe le uunu mi tiur kadoono sananŋana pini . Mi suŋŋana kini tomini ko irao pa Anutu mataana som .
19109008	Niam leleyam be to tana swoono imap karau men . Kozo tomtom toro ikam muriini mi ikeli pa uraata .
19109009	Lutuunu bizin ko tiwe moondo , mi kusiini iwe nora .
19109010	Mi ko tipasaana lutuunu bizin ruumu kizin . Tana zin ko tizem lele kizin mi tiwe wal sorrokŋan , mi tiliuliu len sorok ma tinono ruumu be tiru kan kini , mi tizuŋzuŋ zin tomtom pa len pat .
19109011	Sombe mbun kini imbot ki tomtom sa , na tomtom tana ko imar mi iyo koroŋ kini ta boozomen men ma imap iwe lene . Mi wal pakan ki lele toro ko timar mi tisei len koroŋ kini , mi timbot se uraata kini tieene .
19109012	Tomtom sa ikampe i pepe . Mi tomtom sa imuŋai zin moondo kini pepe .
19109013	Popoŋana kini ta boozomen ko timbiriizi ma timap lup . Tana wal tabe tipet pa kaimer i , ko tiute zin risa som . Pa zan imap kat .
19109014	Sanaana ta tumbuunu bizin tikamam , nako tiso Yooba pa , bekena mataana iŋgalŋgal mi iur ka kadoono ise ki to tana . Mi naana sanaana kini tomini , Yooba imus ma ila ne pepe .
19109015	Tana sanaana ki to tana ziŋan wal kini na , Yooba ko mataana iŋgalŋgal totomen , mi imus zan ma tila len . Naso tomtom matan mbeleele kat zin .
19109016	Pa to tana , ni mataana iŋgalŋgal mbulu ki kampeŋana mi muŋaiŋana som . Zin sorrokŋan , mi zin wal ta timbot ŋoobo , mi zin ta lelen ipata kat na , ni iseseeze matan mi ipunun zin ma timetmeete .
19109017	Mi mbulu ki tusuŋ sosor na , ni leleene pa ilip . Tamen sua kini sananŋana tana ko imiili mini pa itunu . Mbulu ki tusuŋ Anutu be ikampe zin tomtom na , ni leleene pa som . Tana kampeŋana ki Anutu imbotmbot molo pini tomini .
19109018	Mbulu kini ta iwirri sua sananŋana na , ni izemzem som . Ina iwe kembei mburu ta ni izebzeebi pa totomen . Tamen sua kini tana kola imiili mini ma ipasaana itunu . Ko isula kat leleene kembei ta yok , mi izil pa mazaana mi tiroono kembei ta ŋgere .
19109019	Mi izukkaali ma sik kembei ta kawaala mat kana , mi ikipiiri i ma tuŋ kembei ta pus . Mi ko imbotmbot ta kembei ma alok ! ”
19109020	O Yooba , sua sananŋan boozomen ta koŋ koi bizin tiŋgalŋgal pio na , leleŋ be nu pimiili pizin . Naso pokot mbulu kizin .
19109021	Yooba , Merere tio , nu zom biibi pa mbulu ku ambaiŋana . Pa nu toto sua ku mbukŋana mi urur lelem pa wal ku . Tana uulu yo , mi tatke yo pa pataŋana tio taiŋgi .
19109022	Pa iŋgi aŋbot ŋoobo kat , mi leŋ zaala sa som . Tana keteŋ kutkut .
19109023	Nio kembei koroŋ kunuunu ta so zoŋ isula na , imbiriizi raama . Nio kembei siizi ta miiri iwilaali ma ila lene .
19109024	Nio aŋgalsek ituŋ pa kini kanŋana ma molo , tana kumbuŋ mburaana mini som , mi aŋkoŋkoŋ ma tiroŋ men .
19109025	Mi sombe koŋ koi bizin tire yo , na tirepilpiili yo mi aŋwe ŋeu pizin . Mi uten suk pio ma tiso : “ Aa buri , yamaana kek ? ”
19109026	Yooba Anutu tio , uulu yo . Pa nu toto sua ku mbukŋana mi urur lelem pa wal ku . Tana kamke yo lak !
19109027	Kam uraata biibi pa nomom woono , mi swe mburom pa koŋ koi bizin ma tire kat . Naso tikilaala kembei nu ta ulaaŋa tio .
19109028	Ŋonoono , zin tiwirri sua sananŋana pio . Tamen nu ko kampe yo . Mi sombe lelen be timaŋga pio , na timaŋga lak ! Pa nu ko koto zin mi pimiili zin ma tila raama kan miaŋ . Naso kam mbesooŋo ku ma leleene ambai mi menmeeni .
19109029	Tana zin wal ta tiŋgalŋgal sua pio na , pakankaana zin mi kam zin ma tiru zalan . Naso kan miaŋ ma tisaana kat , mi timbotmbot men ta kembei . Kan miaŋ tana ko iwe kembei mburu pizin be tizebzeebe zin pa totomen .
19109030	Sombe Yooba ikam ta kembei , nako leleŋ ambai kat pini , mi kalŋoŋ isala ma aŋpakuri . Mi sombe niamŋan zin iwal biibi amlup yam pa suŋŋana , nako aŋmaŋga ma aŋwit zaana ma isala ta kor a .
19109031	Pa zin wal ta timbot ŋoobo mi tiru zalan na , ni imbotmbot zilŋan uunu be iuulu zin . Mi zin wal ta tomtom tiŋgalŋgal sorok sua pizin ma tisombe tipun zin ma timetmeete na , ni ikamkewe zin .
19110001	Yooba itunu iso pa Merere tio ta kembei : “ Mar mbulem su ta nomoŋ woono i ma irao aŋkoto kom koi bizin ma mburan imap kat , mi kumbum ise ŋguren . ”
19110002	O king , iŋgi nu mbotmbot kar Sion mi Yooba ipombolmbolu . Tana peeze ku mbolŋana ilala pa kom koi bizin , bekena kam zin ma timbot la kopom mbarmaana .
19110003	Mi nu sombe maŋga be la pa malmal , na wal ku ta munŋaana men ko nin se , mi lelen be tigaabu ma niomŋan kala . Sombe zoŋ pok ma ise , na naŋgaŋ kaibiim ku boozomen ko tisama ku mi tirao zin abal potomŋan kembei ta numur berek kana irao mbutmbuutu .
19110004	Yooba imbuk sua pu , mi ipombol ma imbol kat . Mi irao be itooro ŋgar kini mini na som . Sua ta kembei : “ Nu ko we patoronŋana ka tomtom kembei ta Melkisedek , mi mendernder la Anutu mi zin tomtom mazwan ma alok . ”
19110005	Merere , ni imbotmbot nomom woono mi ipombolmbolu . Sombe nol tabe iswe kete malmalŋana kini ipet , to ni kola ikasgeege zin king ma timap .
19110006	Ko iur kadoono pizin karkari , mi ikasgeege zin ma tisu tiwe uri men . Tana zin peeze kan ta tirao toono ta boozomen na , ni ko ikasgeege zin ma timap .
19110007	Mi king tiam na , ni ko iwin yok rereereŋana ta imbot kolouŋana pa zaala zilŋaana na , mi niini se . Pa Anutu ko ipakuri ma iwe biibi .
19111001	Haleluya ! Sombe zin wal ndeeŋeŋan tilup zin pa suŋŋana , na nio ko aŋgaaba zin mi aŋur leleŋ imap ma ila ki Yooba mi aŋpakuri .
19111002	Pa Yooba , ni ikamam uraata bibip kat . Tana zin wal ta lelen pa uraata kini ilip na , matan iŋgalŋgal mi tikamam ŋgar pa .
19111003	Uraata kini izzwe i kembei ni ta king biibi ŋonoono , mi ni ndabokŋana kat . Mbulu kini ndeeŋeŋana ko imbotmbot ma alok .
19111004	Ni ikam ti ma tuluplup pa suŋŋana , bekena matanda iŋgalŋgal uraata kini bibip ta ipa ndel kat . Ni leleene izanzaana pizin mbesooŋo kini , mi imuŋaiŋai zin mi ikampewe zin .
19111005	Zin wal ta timototo i mi tileŋleŋ la kalŋaana na , ni ikamam kan kini . Mi sua ta ni ziŋan wal kini timbuk be tiparlup zin ma tiwe tamen na , ni ko mataana iŋgalŋgal ma alok .
19111006	Muŋgu , ni iswe uraata kini mburanŋan pa wal kini ma tire kat pa matan . Pa ikam toono kizin karkari ma iwe len be timbot pa .
19111007	Uraata ta ni ikamam , ina iswe i kembei ni ndeeŋeŋana mi itoto sua kini . Tana sua boozomen ta ni iur pizin tomtom na , irao tuurla mi tototo .
19111008	Pa sua tana ko imbol mi imbotmbot ma alok . Mi ni leleene be toto sua tana , mi matanda iŋgalŋgal sua ta ni itiŋan tumbuk na , mi takamam mbulu ndeeŋeŋana .
19111009	Ni itatke zin wal kini pa pataŋana kizin . Mi iur sua pizin pa zaala tabe ni ziŋan tiparlup zin ma tiwe tamen . Sua tana ko imbol mi imbotmbot ma alok . Ni potomŋana mi mburaana biibi . Tana tomtom timototo i mi tileŋleŋ la kalŋaana .
19111010	Ŋgar ambaiŋana uunu ŋonoono , ina ta kembei : Bela tomototo Yooba mi teleŋleŋ la kalŋaana . Pa zin wal ta so titoto sua ta ni iur na , zin ko tikam len ŋgar ambaiŋana . Tana ko tapakurkuri ma alok !
19112001	Haleluya ! Tomtom ta so imototo Yooba mi ileŋleŋ la kalŋaana , mi leleene pa tutu kini ilip , nako leleene ambai kat . Pa kampeŋana ki Anutu ko imbotmbot se kini .
19112002	Mi popoŋana kini ko tiwe wal zanŋan mi ndeeŋeŋan . Tana zin wal ta timbotmbot toono ti , nako matan ikot se kizin , mi kampeŋana ki Anutu imbotmbot se kizin .
19112003	Tomtom ta kembena , ziŋan zin wal ta timbotmbot ruumu kini na , ko tirao kat pa koroŋ ta boozomen . Mi ni ko ikiskis mbulu ndeeŋeŋana ma imbol pini , mi iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila .
19112004	Tomtom ndeeŋeŋana , sombe imbotmbot la zugut biibi leleene , na mat ko iyaara pini . Mi ni leleene izanzaana pa zin mbesooŋo kini , mi imuŋaiŋai zin mi ikampewe zin .
19112005	Tomtom ta so imuŋaiŋai zin tomtom , mi irairai koroŋ kini pizin , mi ikamam katkat mbulu pizin , nako imbot ambai .
19112006	Tomtom ndeeŋeŋana ta kembei na , toomboŋana sa ko irao be itoki na som . Mi tomtom ko tikamam ŋgar pini mi matan iŋgalŋgal mbulu kini , mi iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila .
19112007	Sombe ni ileŋ uruunu sananŋana sa , na irao imoto na som . Pa ipase pa Yooba , mi urlaŋana kini imbol kat .
19112008	Tana kopoono rru som , mi imototo som . Izza men mi iurur mataana pa Anutu be ikoto ka koi bizin .
19112009	Mi zin wal ta timbot ŋoobo ma tiru zalan na , ni irairai koroŋ boozo pizin . Mi ni ko ikiskis mbulu ndeeŋeŋana ma imbol pini , mi iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila . Tana tomtom ko matan ikot se kini mi tipakurkuri .
19112010	Mi zin wal sananŋan , sombe tire mbulu ta iwedet pini , nako keten malmal , mi matan mburmbur pini , mi tiŋa zurun . Tamen ŋgar ta lelen iur pa be tikam , nako iur ŋonoono som . Tana zin ko tikam ma som , mi tisaana ma tila len .
19113001	Haleluya ! Niom mbesooŋo ki Yooba , kapakuri . Kapakur zaana ma isala kor !
19113002	Kapakurkur Yooba zaana pa kampeŋana kini ta buri , mi iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila !
19113003	Niom ta zoŋ uunu koyom , mi ila irao lele ta zoŋ izulla pa i , kapakur Yooba zaana !
19113004	Yooba , ni imbotmbot sala kor kat . Ni ilip pa tomtom ta boozomen ki toono ti . Mi zaana biibi mi mburaana ilip pa koroŋ ta boozomen ki saamba .
19113005	Asiŋ ta ni irao pa Anutu tiam Yooba ? Som . Ni kadoono sa som . Ni imbotmbot se muriini peeze kana ta imbot sala kor kat .
19113006	Tana sombe leleene be ire koroŋ sa ki saamba , som toono , na bela ituundu mi mataana isu .
19113007	Tamen zin sorrokŋan ŋonoono ta timbot ŋoobo kat mi tilala musmuuzu muriini be tiru kan kini na , ni mataana mbeleele zin som . Ni iuluulu zin ma timbot ambai mini , mi ipakurkur zin . Tana zin tirao be tigaaba zin wal zanŋan ta tikamam peeze pa wal kini na , ma ziŋan timbotmbot .
19113008	
19113009	Mi zin moori ta kopon somŋan i , na ni iuluulu zin mi iurur len zaala be tikam len pikin boozo . Tana timbotmbot raama lutun bizin ma lelen ambai kat . Haleluya !
19114001	Muŋgu zin Israel ta Yakop popoŋana kini na , tizem Aikuptu . Tizem zin wal ta tizzo kalŋan toro .
19114002	Indeeŋe tana , zin Yuda tiwe wal potomŋan ki Yooba . Zin Israel tiwe Yooba lene , mi ni ikamam peeze pizin .
19114003	Indeeŋe Tai Siŋsiŋŋana ire i na , iko ma ila lene . Mi yok Yordan ire i na , imiili ma ila , mi ipot ma imbotmbot .
19114004	Zin abal tiseŋeeŋe mi tilulu zin kembei ta mekmek . Mi lele mbukunbukun timorsop , mi tilulu zin kembei ta sipsip popoŋan .
19114005	O tai , nu tina ko pa so uunu i ? Mi yok Yordan , parei ta nu miili ma la mi pot ?
19114006	Mi niom abalabal mi lele mbukunbukun na , keseŋeeŋe mi kululu yom paso ?
19114007	O toono , re u kek ? Pa molo som , to Yooba imar . Iŋgi be Anutu ki Yakop iswe kat mburaana .
19114008	Ni ta ikam ma yok ipet pa pat mi irereere ma biibi . Mi ikam ma yok ipet pa raŋ , mi irereere ma isu .
19115001	O Yooba , niam leleyam be tomtom tipakur zoyam pepe . Bela tipakur nu zom . Pa nu itum tamen ta zom biibi . Mi nu toto sua ku mbukŋana , mi urur lelem pa wal ku mi muŋaiŋai zin . Tana swe mburom mi uulu yam .
19115002	Kokena zin karkari tirepilpiilu mi tizzo piam ta kembei : “ Anutu tiom mburaana iŋgoi ? ”
19115003	Anutu tiam , ni imbotmbot saamba . Mi mbulu pareiŋana ta so ni leleene pa be ikam , na ikam men .
19115004	Tamen wal pakan na , tiurpewe merere kizin pa silba mi gol . Merere kizin tana na , tomtom naman murin men .
19115005	Zin kwon mi matan . Mi tirao be tiso sua som , tire lele som .
19115006	Zin talŋan mi kuzun . Mi tirao be tileŋ sua som , mi tiyoozo koroŋ sa som .
19115007	Zin kumbun mi naman . Mi tirao be tipa som , mi tiyamaana koroŋ sa som . Mi miiri sa ipet pa kwon som . Pa ina zin matan yaryaaraŋan som .
19115008	Tana zin wal ta so tiurpe merere pakaamŋan ta kembei , mi zin ta tipase pa merere pakaamŋan , nako len mburan sa som , mi tiwe koroŋ sorok kembei ta merere kizin .
19115009	Niom iwal biibi ki Israel , kapase pa Yooba . Pa ni ta ulaaŋa tiom , mi iwe siŋgiao piom mi iporoukalkaala yom .
19115010	Mi niom patoronŋana koyom ta popoŋana ki Aron na tomini , kapase pa Yooba ! Pa ni ta ulaaŋa tiom , mi iwe siŋgiao piom mi iporoukalkaala yom .
19115011	Tana niom wal ta komototo Yooba mi keleŋleŋ la kalŋaana na , niom ta boozomen kapase pini . Pa ni ta ulaaŋa tiom , mi iwe siŋgiao piom mi iporoukalkaala yom .
19115012	Yooba , ni mataana iŋgalŋgal yam . Mi ni ko ikampe yam . Ko ikampe zin iwal biibi ki Israel , mi ikampe zin patoronŋana kan ta popoŋana ki Aron na tomini .
19115013	Tana zin wal ta timototo i mi tileŋleŋ la kalŋaana na , ni ko ikampe zin ta boozomen . Zin sorrokŋan , mi zin ta zanŋan na tomini .
19115014	Yooba ko ipombol yom ramaki lutuyom bizin ma kamasak ma kewe boozo .
19115015	Yooba ta iur saamba mi toono . Itunu ko ikampe yom .
19115016	Yooba iur saamba be iwe itunu muriini . Mi toono na , ni iur piti tomtom be tombot pa .
19115017	Zin wal ta timetmeete ma tisula len Andewa na , tizzo sua mini som . Tana tirao be tipakur Yooba mini som .
19115018	Tamen iti ta tombot matanda yaryaara i , nako lelende ambai pa Yooba mi tapakurkuri pa kampeŋana kini ta buri , buri , mi iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila . Haleluya !
19116001	Nio leleŋ pa Yooba ilip paso , ni ileŋ tiŋiizi tio . Nio aŋtaŋroro i , mi ni iŋgun talŋaana pio mi iuulu yo . Tana mazwaana ta so aŋbotmbot su toono , nako aŋzzoyaryaara uraata biibi ta ni ikam pio na .
19116002	
19116003	Kilis ki meeteŋana , rimen mi ikam yo . Wooro ki Andewa ta ikaukau yo , mi iyakat yo be aŋsula zin meeteŋan murin . Tabe ikam ma leleŋ ipata , mi aŋmoto koŋ ma aŋsaana kat .
19116004	To aŋtaŋroro Yooba . Aŋso ta kembei : “ O Yooba , uulu yo lak ! ”
19116005	Yooba , ni ndeeŋeŋana . Mi imuŋaiŋai iti ta mbesooŋo kini na , mi ikampewe kat iti . Pa Anutu kiti , ni leleene izanzaana piti .
19116006	Tana zin wal ta tirao be tiuulu zitun som na , Yooba itunu imenderkalkaala zin . Kembei ta nio i . Indeeŋe ta mburoŋ imap ma aŋsaana kat na , ni imar mi ikamke yo .
19116007	Tana ko irao aŋmoto mini som mi leleŋ ambai . Pa Yooba ikampe yo kat , mi ikam yo ma keteŋ su .
19116008	Ŋonoono kat , ni itatke yo pa meeteŋana , mi imus motoŋ luluunu ma ila ne . Mi ni ta ikiskis yo . Tana aŋtop som , mi aŋmeete som , mi iŋgi aŋbot motoŋ yaryaara , mi niamru Yooba amwwa .
19116009	
19116010	Ŋonoono , muŋgu aŋso ta kembei : “ Iŋgi pataŋana biibi isalakaala yo mi aŋbot ŋoobo kat . ” Tamen aŋzem urlaŋana tio som .
19116011	Pataŋana tana ikam yo ma aŋru zaala . Tana aŋpiri sorok sua ma aŋso ta kembei : “ Tomtom ta boozomen na , pakamkaamŋan men . Irao aŋdemeere tasa na som . Som kat ! ”
19116012	Mi ko aŋpekel kampeŋana ambaimbaiŋan boozomen ki Yooba be parei ?
19116013	Nio ko aŋkam patoronŋana pini , mi aŋkam mbooro baen ma aŋliŋ sala . Mi leleŋ ambai pini , mi aŋpakuri pa ulaaŋa biibi ta ni ikam pio na , mi aŋzzoyaryaara zaana biibi .
19116014	Tana Yooba wal kini tisombe tilup zin pa suŋŋana , na nio ko aŋto sua ta aŋbuk la kini na , mi aŋkam ka uraata ila matan .
19116015	Zin wal ta tiurur lelen pa Yooba mi titoto mbulu kini na , ni ire zin kembei koroŋ kini ŋonoono . Tana leleene be kizin tasa imeete sorok na som .
19116016	O Yooba , nio mbesooŋo ku . Aŋbesmbeeze pu kembei ta muŋgu naŋgoŋ ikamam na . Mi nu ta putke wooro ta ikaukau yo na , mi tatke yo pa meeteŋana .
19116017	Tana leleŋ ambai pu , mi aŋso aŋkam patoronŋana pu , mi aŋzzoyaryaara zom biibi .
19116018	Tana Yooba wal kini tisombe tisala Yerusalem mi tilup zin pa suŋŋana lela urum kini , na nio ko aŋto sua ta aŋbuk la kini na , mi aŋkam ka uraata ila matan . Haleluya !
19116019	
19117001	Niom karkari ta boozomen , kapakur Yooba ! Niom tomtom ta karao pa toono ta boozomen na , kiwit uruunu ma isala kor !
19117002	Pa muŋaiŋana mi kampeŋana ta Yooba izzwe piti na , biibi kat . Isala ta kor a ! Mi ni ko itoto sua kini mbukŋana ma alok . Haleluya !
19118001	O niom iwal , leleyom ambai pa Yooba mi kapakuri . Pa ni ambaiŋana kat . Ni ko itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19118002	Niom iwal biibi ki Israel , koso ta kembei : “ Ni ko itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok . ”
19118003	Mi niom patoronŋana koyom ta popoŋana ki Aron na tomini , koso ta kembei : “ Ni ko itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok . ”
19118004	Tana niom wal ta komototo Yooba mi keleŋleŋ la kalŋaana na , niom ta boozomen koso ta kembei : “ Ni ko itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok . ”
19118005	Nio ti , indeeŋe ta aŋbotmbot pataŋana leleene mi aŋru zoloŋ na , aŋtaŋroro Yooba be iuulu yo . Mi ni ileŋ kalŋoŋ mi iur leŋ zaala , tabe aŋyooto pa pataŋana tana mi aŋbot mat .
19118006	Sombe Yooba ilae tio , na nio ko aŋmoto koroŋ sa som . Pa tomtom len mburan iŋgoi be tipasaana yo ?
19118007	Iŋgi Yooba imbotmbot kolouŋana pio be iuulu yo . Tana nio ko aŋre i ikoto koŋ koi bizin mi ikam yo ma aŋlip pizin .
19118008	Iti tapase pizin tomtom pepe . Tapase pa Yooba itutamen be iporoukaala iti , to ambai .
19118009	Mi zin bibip ta tikamam peeze i tomini , tapase pizin pepe . Tapase pa Yooba itutamen be iporoukaala iti , to ambai .
19118010	Muŋgu zin karkari timar ma tiliukaala yo be tikam malmal pio . Tamen nio aŋpase pa Yooba mburaana , tana aŋkas zin ma timap .
19118011	Timar pa lele boozomen , mi tiliukaala yo ma sik . Tamen nio aŋpase pa Yooba mburaana , tana aŋkas zin ma timap .
19118012	Zin tiku yo ma sik kembei ta parambel . Mi bil pa tamen mi mburan imap , mi tiko ma tila len , kembei ta you ikan mbutmbuutu gorokŋana . Pa nio aŋpase pa Yooba zaana , tana aŋkas zin ma timap .
19118013	Zin timaŋga pio ma rimen mi tikoto yo . Tamen Yooba iuulu yo .
19118014	Yooba ikamam leŋ mburoŋ mi iporoukalkaala yo . Ni ulaaŋa tio ŋonoono .
19118015	Keleŋ la pa zin wal ndeeŋeŋan . Iŋga timbotmbot beeze kizin kizin , mi kalŋan izalla ma tiyotyooto . Pa Yooba ikamke iti kek . Tizzo ta kembei : “ Yooba namaana woono na , mburaanaŋana .
19118016	Namaana woono , ta ikam uraata biibi piam . Yooba namaana woono na , mburaanaŋana kat ! ”
19118017	Uunu tina ta aŋmeete som , mi iŋgi aŋbot motoŋ yaryaara men , bekena aŋsoyaara uraata bibip ki Yooba .
19118018	Ŋonoono , ni ibalis kat yo . Tamen izem yo ma aŋmeete som .
19118019	Tana kataama ta kizin wal ndeeŋeŋan i na , kakaaga zin pio . Pa aŋsombe aŋlela mi aŋpet Yooba kereene uunu , mi aŋpakuri pa mbulu ta ni ikam pio na .
19118020	Iŋgi kataama ki Yooba be zin wal kini ndeeŋeŋan tilela ma tipet kereene uunu .
19118021	Yooba , nu leŋ tiŋiizi tio mi uulu yo . Tana leleŋ ambai pu mi aŋpakuru .
19118022	Pat ta zin ruumu poŋana kan matan repiili mi tipiri lae lene na , pat tamen tana ko iwe pat mataana kana be ruumu mbuleene ise .
19118023	Mbulu tana ipet pa Anutu itunu mburaana . Mi amre na , ipa ndel kat .
19118024	Aigule ambaiŋana ti , Yooba ikam piti . Tana lelende ambai mi menmeen ti pa .
19118025	O Yooba , muŋai yam mi kamke yam ! Kampe yam mi kam yam ma ambot ambai !
19118026	Yooba ko ipombol tomtom taiŋgi mi ikampe i . Pa ni ikam Yooba ruŋguunu ta imar i ! Tana niam ta ambot lela Yooba urum kini leleene na , amsuŋi be ipombol yom mi ikampe yom .
19118027	Yooba , ni ta Anutu ŋonoono ! Ni iurur mat piti mi ikampewe iti . Keteege ni runrun ila nomoyom , mi kala kapapiliu artaal mi kapakuri .
19118028	Nu ta Anutu tio . Nio leleŋ ambai pu mi aŋpakuru . Nu ta Anutu tio . Nio ko aŋwit urum isala kor !
19118029	O niom iwal , leleyom ambai pa Yooba mi kapakuri . Pa ni ambaiŋana kat . Ni ko itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok !
19119001	Ziŋoi ta lelen ambai mi kampeŋana biibi imbotmbot se kizin ? Ina zin wal ta tikamam ŋoobo mbulu sa som , mi tipa pai kizin ma indeeŋe men pa sua ta Yooba ikam piti .
19119002	Pa zin tomtom tau matan iŋgalŋgal zaala ta Anutu iur pa wal kini na , mi titoto ka tutu , mi tiur lelen imap ma ila kini mi tikam kinkiini be tiute kati , na zin ko lelen ambai , mi kampeŋana biibi imbotmbot se kizin .
19119003	Pa zin tikamam ŋoobo mbulu sa som , mi titoto zaala ki Anutu men .
19119004	Yooba , sua boozomen ta nu kam piam na , nu sombe amto ma amto kat .
19119005	Nio leleŋ ilip be aŋkam tutu ku ta tibeede pataaŋa kek na , ma imbol pio , mibe mbulu tio ito kat tutu tana .
19119006	Pa sombe motoŋ iŋgalŋgal tutu ku ta boozomen , nako koŋ miaŋ ila iwal biibi matan som .
19119007	Nu sombe paute yo pa tutu ku ndeeŋeŋan , nako leleŋ ambai pu mi aŋpakuru raama leleŋ ta iŋgeeze men .
19119008	Tutu ku ta tibeede pataaŋa kek na , nio ko motoŋ iŋgalŋgal mi aŋtoto . Tana pizil kat ndemem pio pepe .
19119009	Naŋgaŋ sa , sombe leleene be mataana iŋgal itunu mi ikam mbulu ta iŋgeeze men pa nu motom , nako ikam parei ? Bela mataana iŋgalŋgal sua ku mi itoto .
19119010	Nio aŋur leleŋ imap ma ima ku , mi aŋkam kinkiini be aŋute katu mi aŋbot kolouŋana pu . Tana uulu yo : Kokena aŋpaŋoobo pa tutu ku .
19119011	Nio aŋur sua ku ila leleŋ be ipombol yo : Kokena aŋkam mbulu sa ta irao pa lelem som .
19119012	O Yooba , nio aŋpakuru pa kampeŋana ku . Paute yo pa tutu ku ta tibeede pataaŋa kek na .
19119013	Tutu ku ndeeŋeŋan boozomen ta nu so piam na , nio aŋsinin zin ma timap .
19119014	Zaala ta nu ur pa wal ku na , ka tutu ta ikam yo ma menmeen yo biibi kat , kembei tomtom menmeen zin pa koroŋ bibip mi zanŋan ta ki toono i .
19119015	Sua boozomen ta nu ur na , motoŋ lala pa mi aŋrru ka ŋgar . Mi motoŋ iŋgalŋgal zaala ku .
19119016	Tutu ku ta tibeede pataaŋa kek na , ina ikam yo ma leleŋ ambai kat . Tana irao motoŋ mbiriizikaala sua ku na som .
19119017	O Yooba , nio mbesooŋo ku . Kampewe yo mi muŋai yo . Naso aŋbot ambai mi aŋtoto sua ku .
19119018	Pei ŋgar tio bekena aŋkilaala ŋgar ndabokbokŋan boozomen ta imbot la sua ku .
19119019	Toono ti na , kar tio ŋonoono som . Iŋgi aŋwe leembe pa men . Tana turke tutu ku pio pepe .
19119020	Gorgori nio leleŋ ilip pa tutu ku ndeeŋeŋan .
19119021	Zin wal tau tipakurkur zitun mi tipaŋobŋoobo pa tutu ku na , nu yamyaamba zin , mi ketem malmalŋana ku imbotmbot se kizin .
19119022	Mi nio na , motoŋ iŋgalŋgal zaala ta nu ur pa wal ku na , mi aŋtoto ka tutu . Tana piŋgis sua repiiliŋana mi pamiaŋŋana kizin ma imbot molo pio .
19119023	Zin bibip ta tikamam peeze i tomini tilup zin mi timbuuru pio . Mi toŋgo . Nio ko motoŋ lala pa tutu ku ta tibeede pataaŋa kek na , mi aŋkamam ŋgar pa . Pa nio mbesooŋo ku tau .
19119024	Zaala ta ur pa wal ku na , ka tutu ta ikam yo ma leleŋ ambai kat . Mi tutu tana izzo yo pa mbulu tabe aŋkam .
19119025	Nio mburoŋ imap kat ma iŋgi be aŋmeete ma aŋla leŋ i . Tana to sua ku mbukŋana , mi uulu yo ma aŋbot ambai mini .
19119026	Nio aŋso u pa mbulu tio ta boozomen , mi nu leŋ suŋŋana tio mi uulu yo . Paute yo pa tutu ku ta tibeede pataaŋa kek na .
19119027	Sua boozomen ta nu ur na , paute yo pa ka ŋgar . Naso aŋute zaala ku , mi motoŋ lala pa uraata ku bibip ta ipa ndel kat .
19119028	Nio leleŋ ipata ma mburoŋ imap kat . Tana to sua ku , mi pombol yo mini .
19119029	Uulu yo be aŋbotmbot molo pa mbulu pakaamŋana . Kokena aŋpizil ndemeŋ pu . Sua ta nu kam piam , ina ko iwe zaala pio be kampeŋana mi muŋaiŋana ku ise tio .
19119030	Nio leleŋ iur kek be aŋto zaala ki sua ŋonoono . Mi aŋpo tutu ku ndeeŋeŋan se ndomoŋ .
19119031	O Yooba , zaala ta nu ur pa wal ku na , nio aŋkiskis kat ka tutu . Tana zem yo pepe : Kokena koŋ miaŋ ila iwal matan .
19119032	Nu kam leŋ ŋgar pa koroŋ boozo . Tana niŋ ise be aŋto zaala ki tutu ku .
19119033	O Yooba , tutu ku ta tibeede pataaŋa kek na , paute yo pa ka zaala . Naso motoŋ iŋgalŋgal mi aŋtoto ma irao swoŋ imap .
19119034	Kam leŋ ŋgar pa sua ta nu kam piam . Naso motoŋ iŋgalŋgal , mi aŋtoto raama leleŋ .
19119035	Pazal yo be aŋto zaala ki tutu ku . Pa zaala tana , ta ko ikam yo ma leleŋ ambai kat .
19119036	Zaala ta nu ur pa wal ku na , kam yo ma aŋur kat leleŋ pa ka tutu . Kokena motoŋ koroŋŋoŋ mi aŋru zaala be aŋdoundou leŋ koroŋ boozo .
19119037	Kam yo ma aŋpiŋgis motoŋ pa koroŋ soroksorok ki toono ta ŋonon somŋan i . Pombol yo be aŋto zaala ku . Naso kam yo ma aŋbot ambai mini .
19119038	Nio mbesooŋo ku tau . Tana motom iŋgal sua ta mbuk pio na , mi kam ma iur ŋonoono . Sua tana , nu kam pa wal boozomen ta timototo u mi tileŋleŋ la kalŋom na .
19119039	Nio aŋmoto sua repiiliŋana mi pamiaŋŋana ki koŋ koi bizin . Tana piŋgis sua kizin tana pio . Pa kadoono ta urur pizin tomtom , ina indeŋdeeŋe men .
19119040	O Yooba , nio leleŋ ilip pa sua boozomen ta ur na . Tana to mbulu ku ndeeŋeŋana , mi uulu yo ma aŋbot ambai mini .
19119041	O Yooba , nu toto sua ku mbukŋana mi urur lelem pa wal ku . Swe mbulu ku tana pio . To itum kalŋom , mi kamke yo .
19119042	Naso aŋrao be aŋpekel sua repiiliŋana ta tomtom tiwirri pio na . Pa nio aŋpase pa sua ku .
19119043	Nio aŋurur motoŋ pu be to tutu ku ndeeŋeŋan mi uulu yo . Naso aŋwit urum pa mbulu ku ta zzo sua ŋonoono men mi toto sua ku . Tana re : Kokena uulu yo som , to aŋrao aŋso sua sa mini pa mbulu ku tana som .
19119044	Sua ta nu kam piam na , nio ko aŋtoto totomen .
19119045	Nio aŋkam kinkiini be aŋto sua boozomen ta nu ur na . Tana kosa sa ko irao be ipakaala zaala pio mini na som .
19119046	Nio ti aŋmoto som , mi koŋ miaŋ pizin tomtom som . Zaala ta ur pa wal ku na , nio ko aŋsoyaara ka tutu ila zin king keren uunu .
19119047	Pa tutu ku ta ikam yo ma leleŋ ndabok kat . Tana leleŋ pa ilip .
19119048	Nio aŋwit nomoŋ isala , mi aŋpakuru pa sua ku . Mi motoŋ lala pa tutu ku ta tibeede pataaŋa kek na , mi aŋkamam ŋgar pa .
19119049	Nio mbesooŋo ku . Tana motom iŋgalŋgal sua ku mbukŋana ta kam pio na . Pa ina ipombolmbol yo be aŋur motoŋ pu mi aŋsa ulaaŋa ku .
19119050	Sombe pataŋana ikam yo , na sua ku ko iuulu yo be aŋbot ambai . Ŋgar tana , ta ipotor leleŋ .
19119051	Zin wal ta tipakurkur zitun mi tirepilpiili Anutu na , timbel sua repiiliŋana pio . Tamen sua ta nu kam piam na , aŋzem som .
19119052	O Yooba , nio motoŋ ŋgalŋgal tutu ku ndeeŋeŋan ta ur muŋgu kek na . Tabe ipombol yo mi ipotor leleŋ .
19119053	Nio , sombe aŋre zin wal sananŋan tipizil ndemen pa sua ta nu kam piam , ina ikam yo ma keteŋ malmal kat .
19119054	Toono ti , kar tio ŋonoono som . Iŋgi aŋwe leembe pa men . Mi mazwaana ta so aŋbotmbot su toono ti na , nio ko aŋpakurkuru pa tutu ku ta tibeede pataaŋa kek na , mi aŋbombo mboe pa .
19119055	Yooba , mbeŋ tomini , motoŋ iŋgalŋgalu , mi leleŋ be aŋto sua ta nu kam piam na .
19119056	Tana nio aŋkamam ta kembei : Sua boozomen ta nu ur na , motoŋ iŋgalŋgal mi aŋtoto .
19119057	O Yooba , nio aŋre u kembei koroŋ tio ŋonoono . Pa nu kampewe yo , mi aŋbotmbot se ku pa koroŋ ta boozomen . Tana aŋbuk sua pu be aŋto sua ku .
19119058	Iŋgi suŋŋana tio ima ku raama leleŋ : To sua ku mbukŋana , mi kampe yo mi muŋai yo . Pa nio mbesooŋo ku tau .
19119059	Nio aŋkam ŋgar pa zaala ta aŋtoto i , tana aŋtooro yo mi aŋso aŋto zaala ta nu ur pa wal ku na .
19119060	Mi irao aŋnaunau na som . Ko aŋmaŋga mi aŋto tutu ku pataaŋa .
19119061	Zin wal sananŋan tiur kilis boozo be tikeene yo . Tamen motoŋ mbeleele sua ta nu kam piam na som .
19119062	Nio aŋmaŋgaŋga pa mbeŋ lukutuunu , mi aŋpakurkuru pa tutu ku ndeeŋeŋan .
19119063	Zin wal ta timototo u mi tileŋleŋ la kalŋom na , nio leleŋ pizin mi aŋgabgaaba zin .
19119064	O Yooba , mbulu ku ta toto sua ku mbukŋana mi urur lelem pa wal ku , ina nu zzwe ma irao toono ta boozomen . Paute yo pa tutu ku ta tibeede pataaŋa kek na , bekena aŋute kat .
19119065	O Yooba , nio mbesooŋo ku . Mi nu toto sua ku mbukŋana , mi kamam mbulu ambaiŋana pio .
19119066	Paute yo pa ŋgar ku , mi kam leŋ ŋgar ambaiŋana . Pa nio aŋpase pa tutu ku .
19119067	Muŋgu nio aŋpaŋobŋoobo pa zaala ku . Mi nu balis yo mi pazal yo , tana koozi motoŋ iŋgalŋgal sua ku mi aŋtoto .
19119068	Nu ambaiŋom kat . Mi mbulu ta kamam ta kembena , ina ambai men . Paute yo pa tutu ku ta tibeede pataaŋa kek na .
19119069	Zin wal ta tipakurkur zitun mi matan pasomu na , tiŋgalŋgal sua pakaamŋana pio . Tamen nio aŋur leleŋ imap pa sua ta nu ur na , mi motoŋ iŋgalŋgal mi aŋtoto .
19119070	Wal tina len ŋgar somŋan , mi tiyamaana sanaana kizin som . Mi nio na , sua ta nu kam piam , ta ikam yo ma leleŋ ambai kat .
19119071	Pataŋana ta muŋgu ikam yo na , koroŋ ambaiŋana . Pa ipazal yo mi ipei ŋgar tio pa tutu ku ta tibeede pataaŋa kek na .
19119072	Sua ta ipet pa kwom na , nio aŋre kembei koroŋ tio ŋonoono . Ilip pa pat silba mi gol munŋaana ka tieene .
19119073	Itum nomom ta imbuuzu yo mi iur yo . Tana uulu yo be aŋkam kat ŋgar pa tutu ku .
19119074	Zin wal ta timototo u mi tileŋleŋ la kalŋom na , sombe tire yo , na menmeen zin . Paso , aŋpase pa sua ku mbukŋana , mi aŋurur motoŋ pa ka ŋonoono be ipet .
19119075	O Yooba , nio aŋute : Tutu ku mi kadoono ta urur pizin tomtom , ina indeŋdeeŋe men . Mi nu toto sua ku mbukŋana mi urur lelem pio , tanata balis yo mi pazal yo .
19119076	Nio mbesooŋo ku tau . Tana aŋsuŋu be to sua ku mbukŋana , mi swe mbulu ku ta urur lelem pa wal ku mi muŋaiŋai zin na . Naso potor leleŋ mi pombol yo .
19119077	Lelem isaana pio , mi uulu yo ma aŋbot ambai mini . Pa sua ta nu kam piam , ta ikam yo ma leleŋ ndabok kat .
19119078	Zin wal ta tipakurkur zitun mi matan pasomu , nako kan miaŋ . Pa tiŋgalŋgal sorok sua pakaamŋana pio . Mi nio , nako motoŋ lala pa sua boozomen ta nu ur na , mi aŋkamam ŋgar pa .
19119079	Zin wal ta timototo u mi tileŋleŋ la kalŋom , mi tiute tutu ta nu ur pa wal ku na , zin ko timar mi tigaaba yo .
19119080	Nio leleŋ be ŋgar tio iŋgeeze men , mibe aŋto kat tutu ku ta tibeede pataaŋa kek na . Naso koŋ miaŋ pa ituŋ som .
19119081	O Yooba , nio aŋzza u be uulu yo , mi aŋbel naamaŋom kek . Tana mburoŋ imap ma aŋsaana kat . Tamen aŋpase men pa sua ku .
19119082	Nio aŋurur motoŋ pa sua ku mbukŋana be iur ŋonoono . Mi aŋnaama , aŋnaama ma som . Ŋiizi na potor leleŋ ma ambai mini ?
19119083	Nio aŋsaana ma tomtom matan mbeleele yo kek . Tamen tutu ku ta tibeede pataaŋa kek na , motoŋ mbeleele som .
19119084	Nio mbesooŋo ku tau . Parei ta nu gedgeede koŋ koi bizin mi tiseseeze motoŋ ? Ŋiizi na ur kadoono pizin ?
19119085	Re . Zin wal ta tipakurkur zitun mi matan pasomu na , tikel naala pio kek be aŋtop sula . Mi sua ta nu kam piam na , wal tana titoto som .
19119086	Tutu ku ta boozomen na , irao aŋdemeere mi aŋpase pa be iuulu yo . Mi iŋgi tomtom tiseseeze sorok motoŋ . Tana uulu yo lak !
19119087	Pa molo som to tipun yo ma aŋmeete ma aŋmap pa toono . Tamen aŋpizil ndemeŋ pa sua ta nu ur na som .
19119088	Nu toto sua ku mbukŋana mi urur lelem pa wal ku . Tana uulu yo ma aŋbot ambai mini . Naso motoŋ iŋgalŋgal zaala ta nu ur pa wal ku na , mi aŋtoto ka tutu . Tutu tana ipet pa itum kwom tau .
19119089	O Yooba , sua ku ko imbol mi imbotmbot ma alok . Irao imap na som . Pa uunu imbot ta saamba a .
19119090	Tomtom tipepeebe len kelŋan , mi iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila . Mi mbulu ku ta zzo sua ŋonoono men mi toto sua ku na , ta kembena . Iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila . Nu ta ur toono ma tuŋ kat , tana imbol ma imbotmbot .
19119091	Pa sua ta nu ur , ta ikiskis koroŋ ta munŋaana men ma timbotmbot murin . Mi koroŋ ta boozomen timbotmbot be timbesmbeeze pu men .
19119092	Sombe leleŋ ilip pa sua ku som , so pataŋana tio ikam yo ma aŋmeete .
19119093	Sua boozomen ta nu ur na , irao motoŋ mbeleele na som . Som ma som kat . Pa sua ku , ta ikam yo ma aŋbot ambai .
19119094	Nio aŋwe lem kek . Tana kamke yo lak ! Pa nio aŋkam kinkiini be aŋto sua boozomen ta nu ur na .
19119095	Iŋgi zin wal sananŋan tizaŋzaaŋa yo be tipun yo ma aŋmeete . Tamen nio aŋkamam ŋgar men pa tutu ta nu ur pa wal ku na .
19119096	Nio aŋre koroŋ sa ila ma iwe ambai komboono na som . Pa koroŋ ta boozomen tilala ma timilmiili . Tamen tutu ku na , ambai komboono , mi imbotmbot ma alok .
19119097	Sua ta nu kam piam na , nio leleŋ pa ilip ! Tana zoŋ ise ma ila zoŋ isula na , motoŋ ilala pa mi aŋrru ka ŋgar .
19119098	Tutu ku imbotmbot raama yo totomen . Tabe ikam ma ŋgar tio ilip pa koŋ koi bizin ŋgar kizin .
19119099	Mi ŋgar tio ilip pa zin wal ŋgarŋan ta tipaute yo na tomini . Pa zaala ta nu ur pa wal ku na , motoŋ ilala pa ka tutu mi aŋkamam ŋgar pa .
19119100	Mi ŋgar tio ilip pa zin kolman ŋgar kizin tomini . Pa sua boozomen ta nu ur na , motoŋ iŋgalŋgal mi aŋtoto .
19119101	Nio aŋgabiizi ituŋ , mi aŋbotmbot molo pa zaala sananŋan ta boozomen , bekena aŋto sua ku .
19119102	Tana aŋpizil ndemeŋ pa tutu ku ndeeŋeŋan som . Pa nu itum ta paute yo pa tutu tana .
19119103	Bigil suruunu inamut . Mi sua ku na , inamut kat . Ilip pa bigil suruunu .
19119104	Sua boozomen ta nu ur na , iuluulu yo be aŋkam ŋgar ambaiŋana . Tana aŋurur koi pa mbulu boozomen ta iyaryaaru yo be aŋpizil ndemeŋ pu .
19119105	Sua ku , ta iurur mat pio kembei ta kai i , mi izzo yo pa zaala tabe aŋto .
19119106	Nio aŋbuk sua pu , mi aŋpombol ma imbol kat , be aŋto tutu ku ndeeŋeŋan .
19119107	O Yooba , iŋgi pataŋana biibi kat indeeŋe yo . To sua ku mbukŋana , mi uulu yo ma aŋbot ambai mini .
19119108	Nio leleŋ be aŋpakuru mi sua tio iwe kembei patoronŋana ta nu lelem pa i . Paute yo pa tutu ku ndeeŋeŋan .
19119109	Gorgori nio aŋbotmbot naala kezeene . Tamen sua ta nu kam piam na , motoŋ mbeleele som .
19119110	Zin wal sananŋan tiurur kilis be tikeene yo . Tamen sua boozomen ta nu ur na , aŋzem som .
19119111	Tutu ta nu ur pa wal ku , ina matamur ambaiŋana ta kam pio . Tana nio ko aŋkiskis ma alok . Pa ina , nio aŋre kembei koroŋ tio ŋonoono , mi ikam ma leleŋ ndabok kat .
19119112	Tutu ku ta tibeede pataaŋa kek na , nio leleŋ iur be aŋtoto ma irao swoŋ imap .
19119113	Zin wal ta tiur kat lelen pu som , mi titeege tete ru na , leleŋ pizin risa som . Mi sua ta nu kam piam na , leleŋ pa ilip .
19119114	Nu we ur pio be aŋke lela , mi nu we siŋgiao pio mi poroukalkaala yo . Tana aŋpase pa sua ku mi aŋzza be iur ŋonoono .
19119115	Tana niom wal ta kakamam mbulu sananŋana na , koko molo pio . Pa nio leleŋ be motoŋ iŋgalŋgal tutu ki Anutu tio mi aŋtoto .
19119116	O Yooba , to sua ku mbukŋana mi we silou pio . Naso aŋmender mbolŋana mi aŋbot ambai . Kokena aŋur sorok motoŋ pu , to koŋ miaŋ .
19119117	Palot yo , mi tatke yo pa pataŋana tio ti . Naso aŋbot ambai , mi motoŋ iŋgalŋgal tutu ku ta tibeede pataaŋa kek na .
19119118	Wal boozomen ta so tipaŋoobo pa tutu ku ta tibeede pataaŋa kek na , nu pizil ndemem pizin . Pa mbulu kizin pakaamŋana iswe zin kembei tipizil ndemen pa zaala ku kek .
19119119	Zin wal sananŋan ta timbotmbot toono na , nu re zin ta boozomen kembei musmuuzu sorok ta tiwirri ma ila lene . Tana zaala ta nu ur pa wal ku , ramaki ka tutu na , nio leleŋ pa ilip .
19119120	Nio aŋkam ŋgar pu na , kuliŋ imoto . Pa nu potomŋom mi mburom keskeezeŋom . Mi mbulu ku ta urur kadoono pizin tomtom , ina tomini ikam yo ma aŋmoto koŋ .
19119121	Nio aŋkam ŋoobo tomtom sa som . Aŋkamam mbulu ndeeŋeŋana men . Tana zem yo la koŋ koi bizin naman pepe .
19119122	Nio mbesooŋo ku tau . Tana mender pio mi poroukaala yo ma aŋbot ambai . Kokena zin wal ta tipakurkur zitun mi matan pasomu na , tiseeze motoŋ mi tikoto yo .
19119123	Nio aŋurur motoŋ pu be kamke yo , mi aŋbel naamaŋom kek . Ŋiizi na kam mbulu ndeeŋeŋana ta mbuk sua pa na , mi uulu yo ?
19119124	Nio mbesooŋo ku . Tana mbulu ku ta toto sua ku mbukŋana mi urur lelem pa wal ku na , swe pio ma aŋre tomini . Mi paute yo pa tutu ku ta tibeede pataaŋa kek na .
19119125	Nio mbesooŋo ku . Tana kam leŋ ŋgar ambaiŋana . Naso aŋkam kat ŋgar pa tutu ta ur pa wal ku na .
19119126	O Yooba , iŋgi tomtom timbel zooroŋana pa sua ta nu kam piam . Tana maŋga mi kam mbulu sa pizin !
19119127	Gol ta iŋgeeze kat , ina koroŋ zaanaŋana mi wal boozomen lelen pa . Tamen nio na , leleŋ pa tutu ku ma ilip pa gol .
19119128	Tana sua boozomen ta nu ur , ta ikamam peeze pio pa pai tio . Mi aŋurur koi pa zaala boozomen ta iyaryaaru yo be aŋpizil ndemeŋ pu .
19119129	Tutu ta ur pa wal ku , ina ndabokŋana kat . Tana motoŋ iŋgalŋgal mi aŋtoto .
19119130	Sua ku , sombe tipeeze , to iur mat pizin tomtom . Mi zin wal tau len ŋgar biibi som na , sua ku iwe zaala pizin be tikam len ŋgar ambaiŋana .
19119131	Nio leleŋ pa tutu ku ilip , kembei tomtom ta miri i pa ka yok .
19119132	Mar lae tio , mi muŋai yo mi kampe yo . Pa ina mbulu ta kamam pa zin mbesooŋo ku tau tiurur lelen pu mi tipakurkur zom .
19119133	Pazal yo pa sua ku . Naso aŋpa pai tio ma ambai men . Kokena mbulu sananŋana sa ikam peeze pio .
19119134	Zin wal ta tiseseeze motoŋ mi tikamam be tikoto yo na , tatke yo la naman . Naso aŋto sua boozomen ta nu ur na .
19119135	O Yooba , nio mbesooŋo ku . Swe itum ramaki kampeŋana ku pio , mi ur mat pio . Mi paute yo pa tutu ku ta tibeede pataaŋa kek na .
19119136	Nio aŋbel tiŋiizi ma motoŋ luluunu izzu . Pa sua ta nu kam piam na , tomtom tito som .
19119137	Yooba , nu ndeeŋeŋom . Mi tutu ku ta kembena . Indeŋdeeŋe men .
19119138	Tutu boozomen ta nu ur pa wal ku , ina indeŋdeeŋe men . Mi tutu tana imbol ma imbotmbot . Itortooro som . Tana aŋro aŋpase pa mi aŋurla kat .
19119139	Nio leleŋ pa sua ku ilip mi aŋkamam kaisiigi pa . Tamen koŋ koi bizin na , tikam ŋgar pa sua ku risa som . Tabe tikam ma leleŋ ibayou kat .
19119140	Niam amre kek . Sua ku , ina ŋonoono men . Tana irao amdemeere mi ampase pa kat . Mi nio ta mbesooŋo ku na , leleŋ pa ilip .
19119141	Ŋonoono , nio tomtom sorokŋoŋ mi tomtom tirepilpiili yo . Tamen sua boozomen ta nu ur na , motoŋ mbeleele som .
19119142	Mbulu ku ndeeŋeŋana ko imbotmbot ma alok . Mi sua ta nu kam piam , ina ŋonoono men . Tana irao aŋdemeere mi aŋpase pa kat .
19119143	Iŋgi pataŋana boozomen isalakaala yo , mi leleŋ ipata kat . Tamen tutu ku , ta ikam ma leleŋ ambai kat .
19119144	Tutu ta nu ur pa wal ku , ina indeŋdeeŋe men , mi imbotmbot ta kembei ma alok . Uulu yo be aŋkam kat ŋgar pa . Naso aŋbot ambai .
19119145	O Yooba , nio leleŋ imap ma aŋtaŋroro u . Leŋ suŋŋana tio mi uulu yo . Mi nio ko motoŋ iŋgalŋgal be aŋto tutu ku ta tibeede pataaŋa kek na .
19119146	Iŋgi tiŋiizi tio ima ku . Tatke yo pa pataŋana tio ti . Mi nio ko motoŋ iŋgalŋgal zaala ta nu ur pa wal ku na , mi aŋtoto ka tutu .
19119147	Zoŋ ise zen , mi aŋmaŋga mi aŋtaŋroro u be uulu yo . Pa nio aŋpase pa sua ku mbukŋana , mi aŋzza be iur ŋonoono .
19119148	Mi mbeŋ tomini na , aŋpamatmaata mi aŋkamam ŋgar pa sua ku .
19119149	O Yooba , nu toto sua ku mbukŋana mi urur lelem pa wal ku . Tana leŋ suŋŋana tio ti . To tutu ku ndeeŋeŋana , mi uulu yo ma aŋbot ambai mini .
19119150	Iŋgi wal sananŋan timar tigarau yo be tipasaana yo . Mbulu kizin ipa ndel kat pa sua ta nu kam piam na .
19119151	Tamen Yooba , nu mbotmbot kolouŋana pio . Mi tutu ku ta boozomen , ina ŋonoono men . Tana irao aŋdemeere mi aŋpase pa kat .
19119152	Zaala ta nu ur pa wal ku na , muŋgu kat nio aŋkilaala ka tutu ta kembei : Ina nu ur be imbotmbot ma alok .
19119153	Yooba , re yo pa pataŋana tio taiŋgi , mi tatke yo pa . Pa sua ta nu kam piam na , motoŋ mbeleele som .
19119154	Mender pio mi uulu yo . Pa iŋgi tomtom tiŋgalŋgal sorok sua pio . Tana to sua ku mbukŋana , mi uulu yo ma aŋbot ambai mini .
19119155	Ulaaŋa ku imbotmbot molo pa zin wal sananŋan . Pa tutu ku ta tibeede pataaŋa kek na , zin tikam kinkiini be tito na som .
19119156	O Yooba , nu lelem izanzaana kat pa zin wal ta timbotmbot raama pataŋana na . Tana to mbulu ku ndeeŋeŋana , mi uulu yo ma aŋbot ambai mini .
19119157	Pa koŋ koi bizin ta tiseseeze motoŋ na , boozo kat . Mi zaala ta nu ur pa wal ku na , aŋzem ka tutu som .
19119158	Nio aŋre zin wal ta tipizil ndemen pu na , leleŋ pizin risa som kat , mi aŋbotmbot molo pizin . Pa zin titoto sua ku som .
19119159	O Yooba , re . Sua boozomen ta nu ur na , nio leleŋ pa ilip . Uulu yo ma aŋbot ambai . Pa nu toto sua ku mbukŋana mi urur lelem pa wal ku .
19119160	Sua ku ka uunu ŋonoono , ina ta kembei : Nu zzo sua ŋonoono men mi toto sua ku mbukŋana . Tana tomtom tirao be tipase pu . Mi tutu ku ta boozomen na , ndeeŋeŋan , mi ko timbotmbot ma alok .
19119161	Zin peeze kan tiseseeze sorok motoŋ . Tamen nio aŋkam ŋgar pizin som . Pa nio aŋmototo u , mi aŋkamam ŋgar pa sua ku .
19119162	Sua ku , ta ikam yo ma leleŋ ambai kat , kembei tomtom ta indeeŋe le koroŋ ta ambaiŋana kat .
19119163	Mbulu pakaamŋan ta boozomen kizin wal ta tipizil ndemen pu na , leleŋ pa risa som , mi aŋurur koi pa . Mi sua ta nu kam piam na , leleŋ pa ilip .
19119164	Nio aŋkamam ŋgar pa tutu ku ndeeŋeŋan . Tana aigule ta boozomen leleŋ ambai pu mi aŋpakurkuru pa lamata mi ru .
19119165	Zin wal ta so lelen ilip pa tutu ku , inako timbot ambai kat . Mi kosa sa ko irao ikam zin ma titop na som .
19119166	O Yooba , nio aŋtoto tutu ku , mi aŋurur motoŋ pu be kamke yo .
19119167	Zaala ta nu ur pa wal ku na , nio leleŋ pa ka tutu ilip . Tana motoŋ iŋgalŋgal mi aŋtoto .
19119168	Nio aŋtoto tutu tana ramaki sua boozomen ta nu ur na . Pa mbulu tio mi pai tio ta boozomen na , nu re ma imap .
19119169	O Yooba , leŋ tiŋiizi tio ti . To sua ku mi kam leŋ ŋgar ambaiŋana .
19119170	To sua ku mbukŋana , ŋgun talŋom pa suŋŋana tio , mi tatke yo pa pataŋana tio .
19119171	Paute yo pa tutu ku ta tibeede pataaŋa kek na . Naso kwoŋ ipakurkuru totomen .
19119172	Nio ko aŋbombo mboe pa sua ku . Pa tutu ku ta boozomen na , indeŋdeeŋe men .
19119173	Itum nomom ko iuulu yo . Pa leleŋ iur kek be aŋto sua boozomen ta nu ur na .
19119174	O Yooba , nio leleŋ ilip be kamke yo . Tana iŋgi aŋbotmbot mi aŋurur motoŋ pu . Mi sua ta nu kam piam , ta ikam yo ma leleŋ ambai kat .
19119175	Kiskis yo ma aŋbotmbot , bekena aŋpakuru . Tutu ku ko ipombol yo .
19119176	Nio mbesooŋo ku . Tamen iŋgi aŋsaŋsaŋ kembei sipsip ta imbiriizi na . Tana ru yo , mi kam yo ma aŋmiili mini . Pa nio motoŋ mbeleele tutu ku som .
19120001	Nio aŋbotmbot raama pataŋana , mi aŋtaŋroro Yooba be iuulu yo . Mi ni ileŋ suŋŋana tio .
19120002	O Yooba , zin wal ta kwon pakamkaamŋan , mi tiŋgalŋgal sorok sua pizin tomtom na , tatke yo la naman .
19120003	Nu tomtom ta ŋgalŋgal sorok sua na , parei ? Nu wi pa kadoono tabe Yooba ikam pu i ? Mi lelem be ute sokorei tabe ikam pu ma ipokot mbulu ku ? Kadoono ku ko ta kembei :
19120004	Izi kini mataanaŋana ko iŋgalu . Mi you keseene ko isalakaalu mi ineenu !
19120005	O ra , tembel yo kek ! Pa iŋgi aŋbotmbot raama zin wal ta len ŋgar somŋan i ! Iŋgi kembei aŋwe leembe su lele pakaana Mesek , mi tomini kembei aŋbotmbot la zin Kedar mazwan .
19120006	Pa lele ti ka tomtom bizin na , tikamam mbulu kembei ta wal matan munŋan . Zin lelen be tikam mbulu luumuŋana mi niamŋan amparlup yam na som . Mi nio aŋbel mbotŋana la mazwan kek .
19120007	Nio na , aŋkamam mbulu luumuŋana men pizin , mi leleŋ be niamŋan amparlup yam ma amwe tamen . Mi zin na , lelen pa mbulu ki malmal men .
19121001	Nio motoŋ izalla pa zin abal . Ko leŋ ulaaŋa sa imar be parei ?
19121002	Ulaaŋa tio na Yooba itutamen tau . Ni ta iur saamba mi toono .
19121003	Ni ko irao izemu ma tutkat kumbum mi mel na som . Pa mboroŋan ku , ni mata ŋenŋeene somŋana .
19121004	Ŋonoono kat , mboroŋan kiti Israel , mata ŋenŋeene somŋana , mi ikenne som .
19121005	Yooba , ni mataana pu mi imborro u . Mi imbotmbot zilŋom uunu totomen mi iwe ur pu .
19121006	Tana zoŋ mataana ko ilasu pa aigule na som . Mi mbeŋ na , puulu ko irao be ipasaanu na som .
19121007	Yooba ko mataana pu mi iporoukalkaalu pa koroŋ sananŋan ta munŋaana men . Ni ko imboro u ma mbot ambai men .
19121008	Ni ko mataana pu pa pai ku ta boozomen . Tana nu sombe le ma mar , som pet ma la , na ni ko imbotmbot raamu mi mataana pu , ta buri mi iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila .
19122001	Indeeŋe tomtom tiso pio ma tiso : “ Tamaŋga mi tasala pa urum ki Yooba , ” na ikam yo ma leleŋ ambai kat .
19122002	Mi iŋgi tamar ma telela siiri kwoono ki Yerusalem , mi temendernder lela kar biibi kek .
19122003	Yerusalem , ina kar ndabokŋana . Tipo ma ambai kat . Mi ka siiri ta iliu na , mbolŋana .
19122004	Niam wal ki Yooba amzze mi amluplup yam su kar ta ti . Zin Israel un bizin ta boozomen tiwwa ma timarmar kar Yerusalem taiŋgi be tipakur Yooba zaana . Tito tutu ta ni iur pizin tau .
19122005	Pa zin king tiam ta Dabit popoŋana kini na , murin peeze kana imbotmbot kar ta ti . Tana timbotmbot ti mi tiurpewe pataŋana kizin tomtom .
19122006	Kusuŋ pa kar Yerusalem bekena imbot ambai ! Kusuŋ ta kembei : “ Zin wal ta so tiur lelen pa Yerusalem , nako timoto som mi timbotmbot ndabok men .
19122007	Mi zin wal ta timbotmbot lela siiri mbolŋana ki Yerusalem leleene , nako timbot ambai . Mi king ziŋan zin peeze kan kini ta timbotmbot lela ruumu mbolŋan ki Yerusalem na , ta kembena . Ko timoto som , mi timbot ndabok men . ”
19122008	Nio motoŋ iŋgal zin toŋmatiziŋ tio mi zin gaabaŋoŋ , tana aŋso pa Yerusalem ta kembei : “ Niom Yerusalem koyom , Anutu ko imboro yom ma kombot ambai . ”
19122009	Mi aŋkam ŋgar pa urum ki Yooba ta Anutu kiti na , tana aŋsuŋi be imboro yom Yerusalem koyom ma kombot ambai pa koroŋ ta boozomen .
19123001	O Yooba , nu mbotmbot se murim peeze kana ta saamba a . Tana aŋurur motoŋ pu mi aŋpase pu .
19123002	Yooba , Anutu tiam , niam ko amrre ma pu ma irao nu muŋai yam mi uulu yam . Pa nu ta biibi tiam . Tana ampase pu pa koroŋ ta boozomen , kembei ta zin mbesooŋo tomooto ma moori tipase pa zin bibip kizin .
19123003	O Yooba , lelem isaana piam , mi muŋai yam mi uulu yam . Pa niam mbesooŋo ku tau . Re . Iŋgi zin wal ta timoto u som , mi tipase pa zitun ma tiso zin tirao pa koroŋ ta boozomen , ta timbel repiiliŋoyam kek . Zin tana matan pasom yam mi tirepilpiili yam ndabok !
19123004	
19124001	“ Sombe Yooba ilae kiti som , mi iuulu iti som , nako parei piti ? ” Niom iwal biibi ki Israel koso ta kembei :
19124002	“ Indeeŋe tau kanda koi bizin timaŋga piti na , sombe Yooba ilae kiti mi iuulu iti som ,
19124003	so kanda koi bizin tipambiriizi iti ma tamap lup . Paso , keten malmal piam biibi kat .
19124004	Pataŋana tana , ina kembei wo mburaanaŋana ta isur ti mabe tala lende . Mi ina kembei nonor biibi ta ikamam be ilol ti . Mi som .
19124005	
19124006	Tana tapakur Yooba pa kampeŋana kini ! Pa ni izem ti ila kanda koi bizin naman be tipasaana iti na som .
19124007	Indeeŋe tana , iti kembei ŋge ta kilis ikami . Tamen Yooba iputke wooro tana piti , mi matanda yaryaara mi toko ma tala lende .
19124008	Ulaaŋa kiti na , Yooba itutamen tau . Ni ta iur saamba mi toono .
19125001	Zin wal ta tipase pa Yooba na , zin kembei ta abal Sion . Pa abal tana irao imuzik na som . Tuŋ ma imbotmbot ma alok .
19125002	Yerusalem na , abal boozomen iliu i . Mi ina raraate men pa Yooba wal kini . Ni iwe kembei siiri mbolŋana ta iliu zin . Mi imenderkalkaala zin ta buri , mi iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila .
19125003	Tana toono ta Anutu ikam pa wal kini ndeeŋeŋan na , zin wal sananŋan ko tikam peeze pa ma alok na som . Kokena tikam ma zin wal ndeeŋeŋan tomini tisemboron zitun pa mbulu sananŋana .
19125004	O Yooba , kampe zin wal ku ambaimbaiŋan ta lelen ŋgeezeŋan na .
19125005	Tamen zin wal ta tipizil ndemen pa zaala ku , mi titoto zaala pakaamŋana na , ziiri zin ma tila len raama zin wal sananŋan . O Yooba , mboro zin Israel ma timbot ambai men !
19126001	Indeeŋe kar Sion isaana kat na , Yooba iuulu kar kini ma imbot ambai mini . Tabe ikam ma lelende ambai kat . Mi tamen tuurla kat som . Toso “ Mbulu ti , ko ŋonoono ? Ko tere miuŋana ma iŋgi . ”
19126002	To lelende ambai kat mi teseeŋge . Mi kalŋanda isala ma tombo mboe raama menmeen ti . Indeeŋe tana , zin karkari tire ti ma tiso : “ Wai , Yooba ikam uraata bibip pizin Israel ! ”
19126003	Mi ina ŋonoono . Yooba ikam uraata bibip kat piti . Tanata lelende ambai kat .
19126004	Tamen Yooba , koozi amsaana mini . Tana amsuŋu : Uulu yam ma ambot ambai mini , kembei ta kamam pa lele pakaana ki Negeb na . Lele tana na , ka yok somŋana . Mi nu kamam ma yaŋ izzu , tabe yok tireere pa .
19126005	Zin wal ta tiwaswaaza kini raama tiŋiizi na , kaimer ko kalŋan isala mi tiŋgaama raama menmeen zin .
19126006	Mi zin wal ta titaŋtaŋ mi tibaada kini iweniwen ma tila mokleene na , kaimer ko timiili raama kini ŋonoono , mi kalŋan isala ma menmeen zin .
19127001	Zin wal ta tiwwo ruumu na , sombe Yooba igaaba zin pa uraata kizin som , na tipunun sorok mburan pa ruumu tana . Mi zin menderŋan ki kar biibi ta kembena . Sombe Yooba igaaba zin pa uraata kizin ma imenderkaala kar tana som , na tipamatmaata sorok .
19127002	Tana nu sombe pase pa Yooba som , mi kamam uraata pa berek ma ila mbeŋ na , nu punun sorok mburom . Pa kampeŋana kini , ta ikamam ma tere uraata kiti iurur ŋonoono mi takamam kanda kini . Tana zin wal ta Anutu leleene pizin na , kopon rru som , mi tikenne kat pa mbeŋ .
19127003	Mi lutundu bizin tomini . Yooba ipomosmoozo iti tomtom mi ikamam lende pikin . Ina kampeŋana kini tau .
19127004	Tana naŋgaŋ kaibiim sa isombe ipeebe le pikin tomooto pakan , nako leleene ambai . Pa zin ta ko timender pa urum .
19127005	Mi sombe tomtom sa ipeebe le pikin tomooto boozo , na ni ko leleene ambai kat pa kampeŋana tana . Pa kaimer , sombe ziŋan ka koi bizin tiparzorzooro pa sua isu kar keteene , na lutuunu bizin tana ko timender pini mi tiuuli . Tana ka koi bizin ko tirao be tikoto i na som .
19128001	Zin wal ta so timototo Yooba mi titoto zaala kini , nako lelen ambai pa kampeŋana tabe ise kizin i .
19128002	Nu sombe kam ta kembei , na uraata ta kamam pa nomom na , ko iur ŋonoono , mi kom kini ma lem koroŋ irao . Tana ko lelem ambai pa kampeŋana tabe imbotmbot se ku i , mi mbotmbot ambai .
19128003	Mi kusim moori ta imborro ruumu ku , nako ipeebe lem pikin boozo , kembei ta ke baen ipiyotyooto ŋonoono ambaimbaiŋan . Tana niomŋan lutum bizin ko kaparlup yom pa kini kanŋana , mi zin tiliu u kembei ta ke olib iweene tindomdom ma tizze pa ke uunu na .
19128004	Tana kampeŋana ta kembena , ta ko ise ki tomtom ta imototo Yooba mi ileŋleŋ la kalŋaana .
19128005	Yooba , ni imbotmbot kar Sion . Itunu ko ipombolu mi ikampe u . Mi mazwaana ta so nu mbotmbot su toono na , nu ko re Yerusalem imbotmbot ambai men .
19128006	Mi ko mbotmbot ma molo su toono , ma irao re tumbum bizin tipet . Yooba ko imboro zin Israel ma timbot ambai men . Ŋonoono .
19129001	“ Indeeŋe ta nio naŋgaŋŋoŋ mi imar na , koŋ koi bizin timbel motoŋ seezeŋana . ” O niom iwal biibi ki Israel , koso ta kembei :
19129002	“ Ŋonoono kat . Indeeŋe ta nio naŋgaŋŋoŋ mi imar na , koŋ koi bizin timbel motoŋ seezeŋana . Tamen tirao be tilip pio na som .
19129003	Tiballis yo ma tau ndemeŋ mbelŋan men . ”
19129004	Mi Yooba , ni ndeeŋeŋana . Tana iuulu yo ma iyembut re ta wal sananŋan tipo yo pa na .
19129005	Wal boozomen ta tiurur koi pa kar Sion na , Yooba ko ipimiili zin ma tila len raama kan miaŋ .
19129006	Pa zin tipiyooto koroŋ ambaiŋana sa som . Tana zin kembei kini ambaiŋana ta tomtom tiŋgaama , mi tikam ma ila ruumu i , na som . Zin ko tiwe kembei mbutmbuutu ta ise sorok , mi karau men mi imelle .
19129007	
19129008	Mi sombe tomtom pakan tipa se keren uunu , nako irao tipombol zin pa Merere zaana mi tiso “ Yooba ko ikampe yom ” na som . Mi niom na , amsuŋ Yooba be ikampe yom mi ipombol yom .
19130001	O Yooba , iŋgi pataŋana biibi ilol yo ma kembei ta nio be aŋmon sula leŋ ta mozo lukutuunu i ! Tana aŋtaŋroro u .
19130002	O Merere , ŋgun talŋom pa tiŋiizi tio . Leŋ suŋŋana tio ti , mi muŋai yo lak !
19130003	Yooba , sombe motom kiskis mbulu boozomen ta amkamam ŋoobo na , asiŋ ko irao be imender su kerem uunu ? Som .
19130004	Tamen nu muŋaiŋana katuunu , mi rekreege sanaana tiam . Tanata tomtom timototo u mi tileŋleŋ la kalŋom .
19130005	Nio aŋpase pa Yooba mi aŋzza i . Pa leleŋ ilip be iswe muŋaiŋana kini mi iuulu yo . Tana aŋurur motoŋ pa sua kini mbukŋana be iur ŋonoono , mi aŋbotmbot .
19130006	Nio leleŋ pa Yooba ilip mi aŋurur motoŋ pini , kembei zin menderŋan ta matan pa kar pa mbeŋ na , tiurur matan pa zoŋ . Zin , sombe tire zoŋ pok ma ise , na lelen ambai . Mi nio ta kembena . Sombe Yooba iswe itunu mi muŋaiŋana kini pio , nako leleŋ ambai kat .
19130007	O niom Israel , kapase pa Yooba mi kuur motoyom pini be iuulu yom . Pa ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini . Sombe ni itatke yom pa pataŋana tiom , nako ikam ma ikam kat .
19130008	Tana ni itunu ko itatke yom Israel pa pataŋana tiom , mi ireege sanaana tiom ta boozomen ma ila lene .
