19131001	O Yooba , ŋgar pakurŋana sa imbot la leleŋ som , aŋwidit ituŋ som , mi aŋkamam be aŋwe biibi som . Tana koroŋ bibip mi uraata bibip ta aŋrao pa som na , aŋmaŋmaŋ pa som .
19131002	Pa aŋpase pu tau . Tana aŋkototo ituŋ , mi aŋur niŋ ma aŋbotmbot . Mi kopoŋ rru som , mi leleŋ ambai men , kembei pikin ta iwin tui ma irao , mi naana imbaraari na .
19131003	O niom Israel , kapase pa Yooba , mi kuur motoyom pini be iuulu yom , ta buri , mi iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila .
19132001	O Yooba , motom ŋgalŋgal Dabit mi pataŋana boozomen ta ni ibaada pa nu zom na .
19132002	Muŋgu , ni imbuk sua mbolŋana pa Yooba , ta Anutu mbolkeŋkeŋŋana ki Yakop na . Mi ipombol sua tana ma imbol kat .
19132003	Iso ta kembei : “ Nio ti , ko irao aŋlela ruumu tio som , aŋsu muriŋ be aŋkeene som , aŋur motoŋ som , mi aŋkeenekaala ki motoŋ som ,
19132004	
19132005	ma irao aŋdeeŋe Yooba le lele sa . Pa ŋgar tio imbol be aŋkam Anutu mbolkeŋkeŋŋana ki Yakop le muriini sa be imbot pa .
19132006	Indeeŋe niam ambot lele pakaana ki Eparata na , amleŋ Sua Mbukŋana Ka Koror uruunu . Tana amla ma amdeeŋi imbot igarau kar Yar .
19132007	To amso : “ Tamaŋga mi tala Anutu muriini ta Yerusalem a . To tala tagarau muriini peeze kana , mi telek kumbundu pini ma tapakuri . ”
19132008	O Yooba , maŋga ramaki Sua Mbukŋana Ka Koror ta iswe mburom na , mi la pa murim .
19132009	Patoronŋana ka tomtom bizin ku ko tikam mbulu ndeeŋeŋana totomen . Ko iwe kembei len mburu be tizebzeebe zin pa . Mi zin wal ku ta tiurur lelen pu mi titoto mbulu ku na , kalŋan ko izalla mi tiyotyooto raama menmeen zin .
19132010	Yooba , motom iŋgal mbesooŋo ku Dabit . Popoŋana kini ta itum roogi mi uri ma iwe king na , pizil ndemem pini pepe .
19132011	Muŋgu Yooba itunu imbuk sua mbolŋana pa Dabit , mi ipombol ma imbol kat . Tana irao ireege sua tana na som . Sua ta kembei : “ Popoŋana ku tabe tiyooto pu i , nio ko aŋur kizin tasa ma ikelu be imbot se murim peeze kana .
19132012	Mi sombe lutum bizin matan iŋgalŋgal sua tio mbukŋana mi titoto kat ka tutu , tona lutun bizin tomini kadoono ko tikam murim , mi timbutultul su murim peeze kana , mi iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila . Tutu tana , nio ituŋ ko aŋpaute zin pa . ”
19132013	Yooba iroogo kar Sion , mi ikam ma iwe lene kek . Lele tana , ta ni leleene be imbotmbot pa .
19132014	Tana iso ta kembei : “ Lele ti ko iwe muriŋ be aŋbotmbot pa ma alok . Nio leleŋ be muriŋ peeze kana imbotmbot lele ta ti . ”
19132015	Nio ko aŋpombol zin Sion kan , mi aŋkampe zin ma tirao kat pa koroŋ ta boozomen . Tana zin wal ki Sion ta petel zin ma timbot ŋoobo na , nio ko aŋputu zin ma kopon bok .
19132016	Mi zin patoronŋana kan ki Sion na , nio ko aŋpombolmbol zin pa uraata kizin , mi zin ko tizzwe zaala tabe aŋkamke zin tomtom pa i . Mi zin wal ki Sion ta tiurur lelen pio mi titoto mbulu tio na , kalŋan ko izalla mi tiyotyooto raama menmeen zin .
19132017	Popoŋana ki Dabit ta iwe king mi imbotmbot Sion na , nio ko aŋkam i ma zaana mi mburaana iwe biibi . King ta ituŋ aŋroogi mi aŋuri pa uraata na , nio ko aŋpombolmbol peeze kini , mi iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila . Peeze kini ko kembei lam ta iyaryaara totomen .
19132018	Mi nio ko aŋkoto ka koi bizin ma timbotmbot raama kan miaŋ . Mi mogar ta imbotmbot sala king uteene , nako imilmil ma iŋgeeze kat .
19133001	Sombe zin toŋmatiziŋ timbot la mbata , mi tiparlup lelen ma iwe tamen , ina ambai kat . Tere na , ikam ti ma lelende ambai .
19133002	Pa ina kembei ŋgere kuziiniŋana ta tiliŋ sala Aron uteene mi ireere ma isula pa kezeene ruunu ma tuŋ sula kawaala kini molo kwopiriini na .
19133003	Mi ina kembei ta tolou biibi ki abal Hermon isu pa zin abal ta tigarau kar Sion na . Pa sombe taparlup ti ma tewe tamen su kar Sion , na Yooba ko iur kampeŋana kini ma isalakaala iti . Kampeŋana tana na , mbotŋana ambaiŋana ta iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila .
19134001	Niom mbesooŋo boozomen ki Yooba ta kembesmbeeze pini lela urum kini leleene pa mbeŋ na , kamar mi kapakuri pa kampeŋana kini . Kiwit uruunu ma isala kor .
19134002	Motoyom ila pa lele ta potomŋana kat na , mi kiwit nomoyom ma kapakur Yooba pa kampeŋana kini !
19134003	Yooba ta iur saamba mi toono . Mi imbotmbot kar Sion . Itunu ko ipombol yom mi ikampe yom . Ŋonoono .
19135001	Haleluya ! Niom mbesooŋo ki Yooba ta kembesmbeeze pini lela urum kini leleene , som kombotmbot urum zilŋaana na , kapakur Yooba zaana !
19135002	
19135003	Kapakuri paso , ni ambaiŋana kat . Kombo mboe pini mi kapakur zaana ndabokŋana .
19135004	Pa Yooba itunu ta ipeikat Yakop , mi ikami ma iwe lene . Tana ni ire iti Israel kembei koroŋ kini ŋonoono , mi leleene piti ilip .
19135005	Nio aŋute kat ta kembei : Yooba , ni ta biibi ŋonoono . Merere kiti ilip kat pa merere ta boozomen .
19135006	Sombe Yooba leleene iur be ikam mbulu sa isu saamba , som toono , som tai , som mozo lukutuunu , na ikam men . Pa koroŋ sa irao be ipakaali na som .
19135007	Ni ta ikamam ma miiri tieene indoundou ma izze pa lele uunu . Mi iŋgoŋgo yaŋ , mi ikamam ma lolo iwenweene zin koroŋ . Mi ikakaaga kataama pa ruumu kini ta miiri imbotmbot lela na , be iyooto mi iloondo ma irao toono .
19135008	Muŋgu , ni ikasgeege zin pikin muŋgamuŋga mi mbili muŋgamuŋga kizin Aikuptu ma timap lup .
19135009	Mi ikam mos mi uraata bibip isu Aikuptu , bekena iseeze king kizin ziŋan mbesooŋo kini ta boozomen matan .
19135010	Ni ta ikasgeege zin karkari boozomen , mi ipun zin king mburanŋan ma timetmeete .
19135011	Ipun Sihon ta king kizin Amor na , Og ta king ki Basan na , mi king ta boozomen ki toono Kanaan .
19135012	Mi ikam toono kizin pa wal kini Israel ma iwe len be timbotmbot pa , mi iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila .
19135013	O Yooba , zom biibi ko imbotmbot ma alok ! Tomtom ko tipepeebe len kelŋan , mi matan iŋgalŋgal uraata ku mi tizzoyaryaara urum , mi iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila .
19135014	Pa Yooba imendernder pa wal kini mi iurur kadoono pa kan koi bizin . Mi leleene izanzaana pa zin mbesooŋo kini .
19135015	Zin merere kizin karkari na , tomtom tiurpewe zin pa silba mi gol . Merere ta kembei na , tomtom naman muriini men .
19135016	Zin kwon mi matan . Tamen tirao be tiso sua som , mi tire lele som .
19135017	Zin talŋan . Mi tirao be tileŋ sua som . Mi miiri sa iwedet pa kwon som . Paso zin matan yaryaaraŋan som .
19135018	Tana zin wal ta so tiurpe merere pakaamŋan mi tipase pizin , nako len mburan sa som , mi tiwe koroŋ sorok kembei ta merere kizin .
19135019	O niom iwal biibi ki Israel , kapakur Yooba pa kampeŋana kini ! Mi niom patoronŋana koyom ta popoŋana ki Aron na tomini , kapakur Yooba pa kampeŋana kini !
19135020	Mi niom popoŋana ki Lebi ta ku'uluulu uraata ki urum na , ta kembena . Kapakur Yooba pa kampeŋana kini ! Tana niom wal ta komototo Yooba mi keleŋleŋ la kalŋaana na , niom ta boozomen kapakuri pa kampeŋana kini .
19135021	Yooba muriini imbotmbot ta Yerusalem . Tana niom wal ta kombot su Sion na , kapakuri pa kampeŋana kini ! Haleluya !
19136001	Leleyom ambai pa Yooba mi kapakuri . Pa ni ambaiŋana kat . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136002	Leleyom ambai pa Anutu mi kapakuri . Pa ni ilip pa merere ta boozomen . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136003	Leleyom ambai pini mi kapakuri . Pa ni ta Merere biibi ŋonoono . Ilip pa merere ta boozomen . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136004	Ni itutamen ta ikamam uraata bibip ta ipa ndel kat . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136005	Muŋgu ni iur saamba ramaki ka koroŋ ta boozomen . Uraata tana iswe i kembei ni le ŋgar biibi . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136006	Mi iur toono ma imbot se yok ŋwaana . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136007	Ni ta iur koroŋ bibip sala maŋaanaŋana be tiur mat piti . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136008	Iur zoŋ be iyaara pa aigule . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136009	Mi iur puulu ramaki pitik be tiyaara pa mbeŋ . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136010	Ni ta ikasgeege zin pikin muŋgamuŋga kizin Aikuptu . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136011	Mi itatke zin Israel pa zin Aikuptu kan naman . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136012	Uraata tana , ni ikam raama mburaana biibi . Pa ni mbura keskeezeŋana . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136013	Ni ikam ma tai siŋsiŋŋana imet ma iwe ru , mi toono raraazaŋana ipet . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136014	Mi iyaaru zin Israel ma tipa pa toono raraazaŋana ta imbot tai lukutuunu na , mi tilae mbaaga . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136015	Mi igiibi king kizin Aikuptu ziŋan zin malmal kan kini sula Tai Siŋsiŋŋana , ma tiwin katkat tai ma timetmeete . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136016	Ni imuŋmuuŋgu pa wal kini ma ziŋan tiwwa pa lele bilimŋana . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136017	Ni ikasgeege zin king mburanŋan . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136018	Ni ipun zin king zanŋan ma timetmeete . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136019	Ipun Sihon ta king kizin Amor na ma imeete . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136020	Mi ipun Og , ta king ki Basan na , ma imeete . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136021	Mi ikam toono kizin pa wal kini Israel ma iwe len . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136022	Ikam toono tana pa zin Israel ta mbesooŋo kini na , ma iwe len be timbotmbot pa , mi iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136023	Indeeŋe niam ambot ŋoobo kat na , ni mataana mbeleele yam som . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136024	Ni itatke yam pa koyam koi bizin naman . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136025	Ni ta ipututu koroŋ matan yaryaaraŋan ta boozomen . Ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19136026	Tana leleyom ambai pa Anutu ta imbot saamba a , mi kapakuri ! Pa ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini ma alok .
19137001	Indeeŋe ta tikam yam ma amla ambot su Babilon na , ambutultul su yok kizin kezenkezen , mi amtwermiili pa kar Sion ma leleyam isaana kat mi amtaŋtaŋ .
19137002	Mi ampalweeze kombom tiam se ke namannaman ma timbombooren sorok .
19137003	Pa koyam koi bizin ta tikam yam ma amla ambot lele kizin na , tikam seŋge piam ma tiso piam be amrak mi ambo mboe bekena tileŋ len ma lelen ambai . Tiso piam ta kembei : “ Ou , kombo mboe tiom sa ki kar Sion ma amleŋ . ”
19137004	Mi iŋgi ambot toono toro . Tana ko irao ambo mboe ki Yooba be parei ? Ina som .
19137005	O kar Yerusalem , sombe motoŋ mbeleelu , na aŋsuŋ Yooba be ipasaana nomoŋ woono ma aŋwe kaamaŋoŋ . Kokena aŋse kombom mini . Mi sombe motoŋ imbiriizikaala Yerusalem , mi menmeen yo pa koroŋ toro sa ma ilip pa Yerusalem , na aŋsuŋ Yooba be ipasaana kwoŋ ma imun . Kokena aŋbo mboe mini .
19137006	
19137007	O Yooba , motom iŋgalŋgal mbulu kizin Edom kan mi pokot . Pa indeeŋe ta koyam koi bizin tireege Yerusalem na , zin Edom menmeen zin mi kalŋan izalla ma tizzo ta kembei : “ Yo ! Kereege Yerusalem . Kereege ma isu lene kat ! ”
19137008	Mi niom Babilon koyom , nako tireege kar tiom ma isaana kat ! Tomtom ta so ipokot mbulu ta kakam piam , nako leleene ambai mi kampeŋana ki Anutu imbot se kini .
19137009	Mi zin ta so tikam lutuyom bizin mi tipiliiti zin sala pat na , ta kembena . Ko lelen ambai kat mi kampeŋana ki Anutu imbot se kizin .
19138001	O Yooba , nio leleŋ ambai pu , mi leleŋ imap ipakuru ! Nio aŋbo mboe pakurŋana pa nu itum tamen . Merere toro sa som . Tana sombe merere pakan tire yo , na tire yo lak !
19138002	Nio motoŋ ima pa urum ku mi aŋlek kumbuŋ pu . Mi leleŋ ambai pu mi aŋpakur zom ! Pa nu toto sua ku mbukŋana , mi urur lelem pa wal ku mi muŋaiŋai zin . Nu zom biibi kat . Tamen mbulu pakan ta mbuk sua pa be kam , inako ikam ma zom biibi ma ilip .
19138003	Indeeŋe ta aŋtaŋroro u be uulu yo na , nu leŋ suŋŋana tio , mi pombol yo , mi kam yo ma niŋ ise .
19138004	O Yooba , king ta boozomen ki toono , sombe tileŋ sua ta ipet pa kwom , nako lelen ambai pu mi tipakuru .
19138005	Ko timbo mboe mi tipakuru pa zom biibi , mi mburom , mi mbulu ta kamam pizin na .
19138006	Ŋonoono Yooba , nu biibi mi mbotmbot sala kor kat . Mi motom iŋgalŋgal zin wal sorrokŋan . Tamen zin wal tau tipakurkur zitun na , nu ute zin lup . Pa nu motom molo .
19138007	Sombe pataŋana boozo isalakaala yo , na nu ko uulu yo ma aŋbot ambai mini . Mi sombe koŋ koi bizin keten malmal kat pio , mi tikamam be tipasaana yo , na nomom woono mbolŋana ko iporoukaala yo ma aŋbot ambai .
19138008	O Yooba , mbulu boozomen ta lelem iur pa be ipet pio , ina kola ipet . Pa nu toto sua ku mbukŋana mi urur lelem pa wal ku ma alok . Tana pizil ndemem pio pepe . Pa nio na itum nomom muriini tau .
19139001	Yooba , nu itum tiiri kat leleŋ mi ute yo ma imap .
19139002	Nio , sombe keteŋ su , som aŋmaŋga mi aŋla pa uraata , na nu ute . Pa nu motom molo . Tana ute ŋgar tio ma imap .
19139003	Sombe aŋpa ma aŋla lele sa , som aŋur motoŋ ri mi aŋkeene leŋ , na nu rre yo . Tana nu ute mbulu tio ta boozomen .
19139004	Yooba , sua ta leleŋ iurur pa mi ipet pa kwoŋ zen i , ina tomini , nu ute ma imap .
19139005	Nu muŋmuuŋgu pio mi kemermer pio . Mi itum nomom , ta ikiskis yo mi ikamam peeze pio .
19139006	Nio aŋkam ŋgar pa mbulu ku tana ma aŋrao som . Pa ŋgar ku na , ipa ndel . Ilip kat pio .
19139007	Nio sombe leleŋ be aŋko molo pu , nako aŋla ki parei ? Som . Pa aŋrao be aŋke pa motom na som .
19139008	Sombe aŋsala pa saamba , na nu mbotmbot . Mi sombe aŋkeene sula Andewa , na nu mbotmbot su tina tomini .
19139009	Mi sombe aŋrie ma aŋla pa lele ta zoŋ ise , som aŋla aŋbot lele pakaana ta zoŋ isula pa ,
19139010	nako aŋdeeŋu mbotmbot . Mi nu ko wiliŋ yo ma ituru tala .
19139011	Mi sombe aŋso be zugut imar ma izukkaala yo , mibe mat itooro ma iwe mbeŋ , ina tomini irao be ipakaala yo pa motom na som .
19139012	Pa zugut irao be isekaala motom na som . Mi mbeŋ na , nu rre koroŋ ta boozomen raraate kembei ta aigule . Tana zugut mi mat na , raraate men pa nu motom .
19139013	Nu ta ur leleŋ . Mi nu ur koroŋŋoŋ ta boozomen , mi lup lela anaŋ kopoono leleene mi aŋsu .
19139014	Tana nio aŋmoto u mi aŋpakuru . Pa nu pa ndel kat . Mi uraata ku boozomen ta kembena . Ipa ndel kat . Nu ute yo ma imap .
19139015	Indeeŋe ta aŋtum riŋariŋa lela anaŋ kopoono na , nu ute . Tiroŋ ta boozomen iŋgalakenken , mi tasa ike pa nu motom som .
19139016	Tana aŋbotmbot lela anaŋ kopoono , mi nu re yo kek . Mi aigule ta munŋaana men tabe aŋbotmbot su toono i , na lelem iur pa mi tibeede se ro ku , mana anaŋ ipeebe yo ma aŋsu .
19139017	O Anutu , nio aŋkam kinkiini be aŋute ŋgar ku . Tamen aŋrao som . Pa ŋgar ku ilip kat . Nu kamam ŋgar pa koroŋ munŋaana ka tieene .
19139018	Sombe aŋtoombo be aŋnin zin , na aŋrao som . Pa tilip pa magargaara ta tai kana i . Mibe aŋnin ma imap , ina tomini irao ikam yo ma aŋute katu na som .
19139019	O Anutu , nio aŋsombe nu pun kat zin wal sananŋan ma timetmeete lup . Mi zin wal ta titekteege siŋ pizin tomtom na , leleŋ be timbot molo pio .
19139020	Kom koi bizin tana tipakamkaam , mi tiwirri sua sananŋana pu , mi tipombolmbol sorok sua kizin pa nu zom .
19139021	O Yooba , zin wal ta tiurur koi pu na , nio tomini aŋurur koi pizin . Mi zin wal ta timaŋga be tizorzooru na , leleŋ pizin risa som kat .
19139022	Aŋurur koi pizin , mi aŋre zin kembei koŋ koi bizin ŋonoono .
19139023	O Anutu , tiiri leleŋ mi ŋgar tio . Toombo yo bekena ute kat ŋgar ta imbot la leleŋ i .
19139024	Tiiri yo to re : Nio aŋtoto zaala sananŋana som . Mi pazalzal yo bekena aŋto zaala ku ndabokŋana . Naso aŋbot ambai ma alok .
19140001	O Yooba , tatke yo pizin wal sananŋan . Poroukaala yo pizin wal ta tikamam zaaba pizin tomtom na . Kokena tipasaana yo .
19140002	
19140003	Zin lelen iurur pa ŋgar sananŋan bozboozo , mi tipesese zin tomtom pa malmal .
19140004	Kwon na , kembei mooto sananŋan . Pa sua ta tiwirri na , mataanaŋana , mi ipasansaana zin tomtom kembei mooto kananŋana na .
19140005	O Yooba , menderkaala yo : Kokena zin wal sananŋan tikam yo . We seraara pa zin wal ta tikamam zaaba pizin tomtom na . Pa iŋgi tirru zaala be tikam yo ma aŋtop .
19140006	Zin wal ta tipakurkur zitun mi matan pasomu , ta iŋgi tiur napitpit kizin be tipasaana yo . Mi tiraara pu kizin be tikam yo . Mi tiur kilis su zaala ta aŋwwa pa , bekena tikeene yo .
19140007	Mi nio aŋso pa Yooba ta kembei : “ Nu ta Anutu tio ! Ŋgun talŋom pa tiŋiizi tio ti mi muŋai yo .
19140008	O Yooba , Merere tio , nu ulaaŋa tio mburomŋom . Indeeŋe mazwaana ki malmal na , nu poroukalkaala yo .
19140009	Yooba , iŋgi zin wal sananŋan lelen iur be tipasaana yo , mi timburmbuuru pio . Tana aŋsuŋu be koto zin . Kokena ŋgar kizin sananŋana tana iur ŋonoono .
19140010	Zin nin se mi tiliu yo be tipasaana yo . Mi nio aŋsuŋu be pimiili sua sananŋana ta iwedet pa kwon na , ma imiili pizin mi ipasaana zitun .
19140011	Kam ma you keseene itoptop sala ŋwan . Mi piri zin sula kat naala ta usomŋana i . Kokena tise mini .
19140012	Zin wal ta tiŋgalŋgal sua pakaamŋana pizin tomtom na , ziiri zin pa toono ku ma tila len . Mi zin wal ta tikamam zaaba pizin tomtom na , mbulu sananŋana ko iketo zin mi ipasaana zin ma timap .
19140013	Yooba , nio aŋute : Nu uluulu zin wal ta tomtom tikamam pataŋana pizin na , mi urur kadoono pa kan koi bizin . Mi zin wal ta timbot ŋoobo na , nu mendernder pizin mi uluulu zin pa pataŋana kizin .
19140014	Ŋonoono kat , zin wal ndeeŋeŋan ko lelen ambai pu mi tipakur zom . Mi zin wal ta lelen ŋgeezeŋan ko timbotmbot su kerem uunu totomen .
19141001	O Yooba , nio aŋtaŋroro u be loŋa mar mi uulu yo ! Ŋgun talŋom mi leŋ kalŋoŋ .
19141002	Leleŋ be suŋŋana tio iwe kembei koroŋ kuziini ambaiŋana ta tirukruk su kerem uunu na . Mi sombe aŋwit nomoŋ mi aŋsuŋ , na re suŋŋana tio kembei patoronŋana ta tikamam pa mbeŋ na .
19141003	O Yooba , mboro kat mioŋ mi menderkaala kwoŋ . Kokena sua sananŋana sa iyooto pa .
19141004	Mi zem ŋgar sananŋana sa ma izeebe yo pepe . Kokena aŋgaaba zin wal sananŋan pa mbulu kizin . Uulu yo be aŋmender mbolŋana . Kokena tiyaaru yo ma aŋla aŋgaaba zin mi niamŋan amkan kini kizin mbuyeeneŋana .
19141005	Tomtom ndeeŋeŋana sa , sombe ibalis yo mi iyaamba yo be ipazal yo , inako leleŋ ambai men . Pa ina iswe kembei ni iur kat leleene pio . Tamen zin wal sananŋan na , irao aŋyok be tipomoozo yo mi tiliŋ ŋgere kizin ambaiŋana sala uteŋ na som . Pa nio aŋzuŋzuŋu totomen be koto mbulu kizin sananŋana .
19141006	Zin wal sananŋan , sombe Ni ta Tiiriŋana Katuunu i , iur kadoono pizin mi igiibi zin sula lele taraŋgatŋana , to tikilaala ta kembei : Sua ta muŋgu aŋkamam pizin bekena aŋpazal zin na , sua ambaiŋana mi sua ŋonoono .
19141007	Wal tana tiron ko timbot leŋaleŋa su Andewa kwoono kembei toono ta bapalo itaara na .
19141008	O Yooba , Merere tio , nio aŋurur motoŋ pu be we ur pio mi menderkaala yo . Tana zem yo ma aŋmeete pepe .
19141009	Mboro yo mi motom pio . Kokena kilis ta zin wal sananŋan tiur pio na , ikeene yo , som aŋti la pu ta zin tiraara pio .
19141010	Kam wal tana ma timap titi la zitun pu kizin . Mi uulu yo ma piŋgis pai tio pa pu kizin .
19142001	Nio kalŋoŋ isala mi aŋtaŋroro Yooba . Tiŋiizi tio ila kini be imuŋai yo . Pa ni ta biibi tio .
19142002	
19142003	Pataŋana tio ta boozomen aŋzzwe la kini . Mi koroŋ ta ikam yo ma leleŋ ipata na , aŋzzo i pa .
19142004	Nio sombe leleŋ ipata kat mi mburoŋ ikamam be imap , na nu ute zoloŋ . Zaala ta aŋtoto na , koŋ koi bizin tiur kilis su be tikeene yo pa .
19142005	Mi motoŋ lae zilŋoŋ uunu na , tomtom sa imbot be iuulu yo na som . Mi muriŋ sa be aŋke lela mi aŋbot ambai pa na som . Mi tomtom sa ikam ŋgar pio som .
19142006	Yooba , nio aŋtaŋroro u be uulu yo . Mi aŋpase pu mi aŋso ta kembei : Nu ta ko menderkaala yo mi we ur pio be aŋke lela . Tana mazwaana ta so aŋbotmbot su toono na , sombe nu mbotmbot raama yo , na aŋru leŋ koroŋ toro mini paso ? Pa nu kampewe yo mi aŋbotmbot se ku pa koroŋ ta boozomen .
19142007	Ŋgun talŋom pa tiŋiizi tio . Pa iŋgi pataŋana tio taiŋgi ikoto yo ma aŋbot ŋoobo kat . Tatke yo pa koŋ koi bizin naman . Pa zin wal ta tiketoto yo na , mburan ilip kat pio .
19142008	Iŋgi aŋyamaana kembei aŋbot lela ruumu sanaana leleene i . Tana uulu yo be aŋyooto . Naso aŋpakur zom . Mi zin wal ndeeŋeŋan ko tire kampeŋana ku ta swe pio na , ma timar tiliu yo mi niamŋan ampakur zom .
19143001	O Yooba , leŋ suŋŋana tio ti mi uulu yo . Pa nu toto sua ku mbukŋana mi kamam mbulu ndeeŋeŋana men . Mi nu ta biibi tio . Tana ŋgun talŋom pa tiŋiizi tio mi muŋai yo .
19143002	Nio mbesooŋo ku . Tana pamender yo pa sua pepe . Pa tomtom sa ndeeŋeŋana kat be imender su kerem uunu na som . Niam ta boozomen leyam uunu makiŋ .
19143003	Re . Koŋ koi bizin tiketo yo mi tiparaama yo su toono kek . Mi tikam yo ma aŋbotmbot lela zugut biibi leleene , kembei zin wal ta timetmeete ta muŋgu kek na .
19143004	Iŋgi leleŋ ipata , mi aŋmoto koŋ ma mburoŋ imap . Pa leŋ zaala sa mini som .
19143005	Tana motoŋ ilala pa mbulu ta muŋgu kamam na . Nio aŋkamam ŋgar pa uraata bibip boozomen ta itum nomom ikamam na .
19143006	Mi aŋwit nomoŋ mi aŋsuŋu . Nio leleŋ pu ilip , kembei tomtom ta miri i ma ŋgureene ikerekere . Nio iŋgi kembei toono ta ka yok somŋana mi izza pa yaŋ .
19143007	O Yooba , leŋ suŋŋana tio ti , mi loŋa mar uulu yo . Pa iŋgi mburoŋ imap kat . Turke motom pio pepe . Kokena aŋmeete mi aŋgaaba zin wal meeteŋan sula Andewa .
19143008	Yooba , nio aŋpase pu tau . Sombe zoŋ ise , na so leŋ sua sa . Kam mbulu sa tabe iswe kembei muŋaiŋana ku imbotmbot se tio men . Mi patooŋo yo pa zaala tabe aŋto . Pa nio leleŋ pu mi aŋurur motoŋ pu be uulu yo .
19143009	Yooba , tatke yo pa koŋ koi bizin naman . Menderkaala yo mi we ur pio be aŋke lela .
19143010	Nu ta Anutu tio . Tana paute yo be aŋto kat mbulu ta nu lelem pa i . Itum Bubuŋom ambaiŋana ko ikam peeze pio . Naso aŋpa pa zaala keteeneŋana .
19143011	Yooba , nu zom biibi pa muŋaiŋana ku . Uulu yo be aŋbot motoŋ yaryaara . To mbulu ku ndeeŋeŋana mi tatke yo pa pataŋana ti .
19143012	Mbulu ku ta toto sua ku mbukŋana mi urur lelem pa wal ku na , swe mini , mi kas koŋ koi bizin ma timap . Wal boozomen ta tiurur koi pio na , pambiriizi zin ma timap kat . Pa nio mbesooŋo ku tau .
19144001	Nio aŋpakur Yooba . Pa ni ulaaŋa tio mbolŋana ta ipombolmbol yo mi imenderkalkaala yo . Ni ipaute yo pa mbulu ki malmal , mi ikam ma nomoŋ alalalŋana .
19144002	Ni iurur leleene pio mi iporoukalkaala yo . Mi iwe kembei siiri mbolŋana pio be aŋke lela . Mi iwidit yo mi iurur yo sala kor bekena aŋbot ambai . Ni itatkewe yo pa koŋ koi bizin naman , mi iwe siŋgiao pio . Mi ikototo zin karkari ma timbot la kopoŋ mbarmaana .
19144003	O Yooba , niam tomtom toono koyam na , koroŋ sorok . Parei ta nu kamam ŋgar biibi piam , mi motom ŋgalŋgal yam ?
19144004	Pa niam ambot rimen mi amap , kembei miiri ta iwedet pa kwoyam na . Mbotŋana tiam isu toono na , kembei koroŋ kunuunu ta sombe zoŋ imap na imap .
19144005	Yooba , kaaga saamba mi su ! Teege su pizin abal , mi pei you raama ka koi ma ise .
19144006	Kam ma lolo niini iwenweene mi iyaŋgwiiri koŋ koi bizin ma tiko leŋaleŋa . Ser peene ku lutuunu . Naso tiko papirik .
19144007	Pa iŋgi kembei wo mburaanaŋana ikamam be isur yo ma aŋla leŋ i . Tana nomom su mi maata yo ma aŋse . Uulu yo , mi tatke yo pizin wal ta timar pa toono toro na naman .
19144008	Wal tana , kwon pakamkaamŋan . Tiwit naman woono isala be tipombol sua kizin mbukŋana ma imbol kat . Tamen tito sua kizin som .
19144009	O Anutu , nio ko aŋbo mboe popoŋana pu , mi aŋse kombom be aŋpakuru .
19144010	Pa nu ta uluulu zin king tiam Israel ma tiliplip pa kan koi bizin . Nu kamkewe mbesooŋo ku Dabit ziŋan popoŋana kini .
19144011	Piŋgis zaaba pio , mi tatke yo pa zin wal ta timar pa toono toro na naman . Wal tana , kwon pakamkaamŋan . Tiwit naman woono isala be tipombol sua kizin mbukŋana ma imbol kat . Tamen tito sua kizin som .
19144012	Lutuyam bizin ko titum ma tiwe bibip , kembei ke popoŋan . Mi lutuyam moori bizin ko ruŋgun ambaimbaiŋan kembei gungun ta tisap koroŋ kunun ila bekena tipeŋgeeze king ruumu kini .
19144013	Mi diditu tiam ko bokbok pa kini matakiŋa , mi sipsip mi mekmek tiam timasak ma tiwe munŋaana ma munŋaana ka tieene .
19144014	Mi makau tiam ta kembena . Mete sa ko irao ikam zin na som . Ko tumŋan , mi tipepeebe ambai men ma tiwe boozo kat . Mi ko teleŋ tiŋiizi sa isu kar keteene som .
19144015	Zin wal ta so kampeŋana ta kembei imbotmbot se kizin , nako lelen ambai kat . Mi ina zin wal ta timbesmbeeze pa Yooba . Tana zin ta ko lelen ambai . Pa kampeŋana kini ko imbotmbot se kizin .
19145001	O Anutu , nu ta king tio . Nio ko aŋwit urum isala kor , mi aŋpakur zom pa kampeŋana ku ta buri , mi iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila .
19145002	Aigule ta boozomen nio ko aŋpakurkuru pa kampeŋana ku , mi aŋwidit zom isala kor ta buri , mi iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila .
19145003	Yooba , ni ta biibi ŋonoono . Takam ŋgar pini na tarao som . Tanata tomtom tiwidit uruunu ma isala kor kat ! Pa ni biibi kat .
19145004	Tomtom ko tipepeebe len kelŋan , mi tiwidit urum pa uraata ku ndabokbokŋan , mi tizzo zin pa . Ko tizzo zin pa mos ku mburanŋan ma tileŋleŋ . Naso zin tomini tipakurkur zom , mi iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila .
19145005	Ko tizzo pa mburom , zom biibi , mi azuŋka ku ta ilip kat . Mi nio ta kembena . Leleŋ be aŋkamam ŋgar pa uraata ku ndabokbokŋan ta ipa ndel kat .
19145006	Tomtom ko tizzoyaryaara uraata ku mburanŋan ta tomtom tire ma timoto na . Mi nio ko aŋzzoyaryaara zom biibi .
19145007	Tomtom ko matan iŋgalŋgal kampeŋana ku biibi mi tizzoyaryaara uruunu . Ko kalŋan izalla mi timbombo mboe pa mbulu ku ndeeŋeŋana .
19145008	Pa Yooba , ni leleene izanzaana pizin mbesooŋo kini , mi imuŋaiŋai zin mi ikampewe zin . Ni keteene malmal karau som . Mi itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur kat leleene pa wal kini .
19145009	Yooba , ni ikamam mbulu ambaiŋana pa tomtom ta munŋaana men . Mi leleene izanzaana pa koroŋ boozomen ta itunu iur zin na .
19145010	O Yooba , koroŋ boozomen ta itum ur zin , nako timap ma tipakur zom . Mi wal ku ta tiurur lelen pu mi titoto mbulu ku , nako lelen ambai pu mi tipakuru pa kampeŋana ku .
19145011	Ko tizzo pa peeze ku ta mburaanaŋana mi ndabokŋana kat na . Mi tiwidit mbol pa mburom biibi .
19145012	Naso tomtom ta boozomen tiute ta kembei : Nu kamam uraata mburanŋan . Mi peeze ku ta kembena . Mburaanaŋana mi ndabokŋana kat .
19145013	Peeze ku ko iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila . Koroŋ ta boozomen ko timbotmbot la kopom mbarmaana , mi nu mborro zin ma alok . Yooba itoto sua kini mbukŋan ta boozomen . Uraata kini ta boozomen iswe i kembei ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini .
19145014	Zin wal ta so pataŋana ipun zin ma mburan imap na , ni iuluulu zin . Mi wal boozomen ta pataŋana ikototo zin na , ni isilou zin .
19145015	Koroŋ matan yaryaaraŋan ta boozomen tiurur matan pu . Pa sombe petel zin , na nu kamam kan kini . Nu welweele nomom be pututu zin , mi zin ta boozomen tikan ma tirao .
19145016	
19145017	Yooba mbulu kini ta boozomen iswe i kembei ni ndeeŋeŋana . Mi uraata kini ta munŋaana men iswe i kembei ni itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini .
19145018	Zin wal ta so titaŋroro i raama lelen , na ni imbotmbot kolouŋana pizin mi iuluulu zin .
19145019	Mi zin wal ta timototo i mi tileŋleŋ la kalŋaana na , sombe lelen pa koroŋ pakan mi tisuŋi pa , na ni ikamam pizin . Ileŋleŋ tiŋiizi kizin mi iuluulu zin .
19145020	Tana zin wal ta tiurur lelen pini na , ni mataana pizin mi imenderkalkaala zin . Tamen zin wal sananŋan na , ni ko ipasaana zin ma tila len lup .
19145021	Nio kwoŋ ko ipakurkur Yooba . Mi koroŋ boozomen ta ni iur zin na tomini , ko timap ma tipakur zaana potomŋana . Ta buri , mi iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila .
19146001	Haleluya ! Leleŋ ko imap ipakur Yooba !
19146002	Mazwaana ta so aŋbot motoŋ yaryaara , nako aŋpakurkur Yooba . Nio ko aŋbombo mboe pa Anutu tio , mi aŋpakurkuri ma irao swoŋ .
19146003	Zin wal peeze kan na , kapase pizin pepe . Pa zin na , tomtom toono kan men . Tana tirao be tikamke yom na som .
19146004	Mi sombe timeete , nako timiili ma tisula mini toono . To ŋgar pareiŋana ta muŋgu lelen iur pa be tikam , nako iur ŋonoono som . Pa ina , ko timetmeete ramaki .
19146005	Mi tomtom ta so ipase pa Anutu ki Yakop be iuuli , nako leleene ambai . Pa tomtom ta so iurur mataana pa Yooba Anutu kini mi ipase pini , na kampeŋana ki Anutu ko imbotmbot se kini .
19146006	Yooba , ni ta iur saamba , toono , mi tai , ramaki koroŋ boozomen ta timbotmbot pa . Mi sua ta ni imbuk pa wal kini na , ni ko mataana iŋgalŋgal mi itoto ma alok .
19146007	Zin wal ta so tomtom tikam ŋoobo zin mi tiseseeze matan , na Yooba imendernder pizin mi iuluulu zin pa pataŋana kizin . Mi zin wal ta so peteltel zin , na ni ikamam kan kini . Mi wal ta so timbotmbot la kan koi bizin naman , na ni ikamkewe zin .
19146008	Mi zin ta matan pisŋan na , ni iurpewe zin ma matan ipeere . Mi zin wal ta tikunkun pa pataŋana kizin na , ni iuluulu zin be tipa kat . Yooba , ni iurur leleene pizin wal ndeeŋeŋan .
19146009	Mi zin wal ta so tiwe leembe pa lele sa , na ni mataana pizin . Mi zin noroŋa mi zin moondo na , ni iuluulu zin ma timbot ambai . Tamen zin wal sananŋan na , ni ipakokoogo zaala kizin ma tindeeŋe pataŋana boozo .
19146010	Yooba ko ikam peeze ma alok . O niom Sion koyom , peeze ki Anutu tiom ko iseeŋge iseeŋge ma ila . Haleluya !
19147001	Haleluya ! Ŋonoono kat . Sombe tombo mboe pa Anutu kiti mi tapakuri , ina ambai . Pa mbulu ta kembei , ina indeeŋe men . Mi ikamam ti ma lelende ambai .
19147002	Iŋgi Yooba ikamam uraata be iurpe Yerusalem mi ipamender mini . Mi iyyo zin Israel ta kan koi bizin tikoki zin ma tila timbot leŋaleŋa na , mi ikamam zin ma timilmiili mini .
19147003	Mi zin wal ta so lelen ipata ma tisaana kat na , ni ipotortor lelen mi iurpewe pataŋana kizin .
19147004	Ni ta iur zin pitik , mi inin zin lup . Mi itunu iwatwaata zanzan ma ikot zin .
19147005	Merere kiti , ni biibi ŋonoono mi mburaana ilip kat . Mi ŋgar kini ta kembena , biibi kat . Koroŋ boozomen ta ni ikamam ŋgar pa na , tomtom sa irao iute kat na som .
19147006	Zin wal ta so timbotmbot raama pataŋana na , Yooba iuluulu zin ma timbot ambai mini . Tamen zin wal sananŋan na , ni ikototo zin mi iparamraama ŋguren isula toono .
19147007	Leleyom ambai pa Yooba mi kombo mboe pini . Kese kombom mi kapakur Anutu kiti .
19147008	Ni ikamam ma miiri tieene irao pa saamba . Mi iŋgoŋgo yaŋ ma izzu bekena ipembesmbeeze toono . Mi ikamam ma mbutmbuutu izze pa abal lwonlwon .
19147009	Ni ikamam zin buzur kan kini . Mi sombe man aŋkor lutun bizin titaŋ pa kan kini , na ni ipututu zin tomini .
19147010	Tomtom lelen pa hos mburanŋan mi zin malmal kan ta kumbun imbol pa malmal na , mi nin se pizin . Tamen Anutu , ni leleene pa koroŋ ta kembei som , mi niini se pizin som .
19147011	Ni leleene pizin wal ta timototo i mi tileŋleŋ la kalŋaana , mi zin wal ta tipase pa mbulu kini ta itoto sua kini mbukŋana mi iurur leleene pa wal kini na .
19147012	O niom Yerusalem koyom , kapakur Yooba ! Niom Sion koyom , kiwit Anutu tiom uruunu ma isala kor !
19147013	Pa kar tiom ka siiri kwonkwon na , ni ipombolmbol ma tuŋ . Mi kampeŋana kini imbotmbot se tiom .
19147014	Ni mataana pa lele tiom mi iporoukalkaala yom ma kombotmbot ambai men . Mi ikamam koyom kini ta ndabokŋana kat .
19147015	Sombe ni leleene be mbulu sa ipet su toono , na iur sua men mi mbulu tana ipet . Pa sua kini ikamam uraata karau men .
19147016	Ni ikamam ŋauŋau ma izzu mi ilol toono . Mi iswirri tolou ma izzu ma irao toono .
19147017	Ni iwirri yaŋpat mi imiyaryaara kembei patpat , mi ikamam ma lele ilomo kat . Tabe yok itooro ma iwe ais .
19147018	To izzo sua mini mi ais itooro ma iwe yok . Pa ipei miiri kini bayouŋana ma iloondo , tabe ais itooro ma iwe yok mini mi ireere .
19147019	Muŋgu ni ikam sua kini ila ki Yakop . Iso zin Israel pa tutu kini ta iur pataaŋa kek na , mi isope zin pa tutu kini ndeeŋeŋan .
19147020	Mbulu tana , ni ikam pa toono toro sa ka tomtom bizin som . Tanata zin tiute tutu kini ndeeŋeŋan som . Haleluya !
19148001	Haleluya ! Niom wal saamba koyom , kapakur Yooba ! Niom ta kombot sala kor kat na , kapakuri !
19148002	Niom aŋela kini ta boozomen , kapakuri ! Mi niom malmal koyom ta boozomen ki kar saamba , kapakuri !
19148003	Zoŋ mi puulu , kapakuri ! Mi niom pitik ta kayaryaara na , kapakuri !
19148004	Nu saamba ta mbot sala kor kat na , pakuri ! Mi niom yok ta kombot sala kor a , kapakuri !
19148005	Zin ta boozomen tana bela tipakur Yooba zaana . Pa ni iur sua ma zin tipet .
19148006	Mi iur zin la murinmurin be timbotmbot ta kembei ma alok . Pa kan sua ta ni iur pataaŋa kek na , irao imap na som .
19148007	Mi niom koroŋ ta kombotmbot su toono na tomini , kapakur Yooba ! Niom koroŋ mburanŋan ki tai mi mozo lukutuunu na , kapakuri !
19148008	Mi lolo niini , mi yaŋpat , ŋauŋau mi tolou , mi miiri mburanŋan ta keleŋleŋ la kalŋaana na , kapakuri !
19148009	Niom abalabal mi lele mbukunbukun ta boozomen , mi ke ŋononŋan mi ke mbolŋan ta munŋaana men ki su na , kapakuri !
19148010	Mi niom mbili kar koyom mi buzur su koyom , niom koroŋ karraŋoyom , mi niom man ta kirie na , kapakuri !
19148011	Niom king , mi iwal karkari ta boozomen , niom peeze koyom , mi niom ta zoyomŋoyom na , kapakur Yooba !
19148012	Niom naŋgaŋ mi tamuriŋ , kolman mi pikin , kapakuri !
19148013	Niom ta boozomen bela kapakur Yooba zaana . Pa ni itutamen ta zaana biibi ma ilip . Koroŋ boozomen ta timbot pa saamba mi toono na , tiswe i kembei ni ta biibi ŋonoono .
19148014	Mi iŋgi ni ikam wal kini len mburan popoŋana mi ipakur zin mini . Zin wal kini ta tiurur lelen pini mi titoto mbulu kini na , ni ikam ma urun iwe biibi . Pa ni leleene pizin Israel mi imbotmbot kolouŋana pizin . Haleluya !
19149001	Haleluya ! Kombo mboe popoŋana pa Yooba . Niom wal kini ta kuurur leleyom pini mi kototo mbulu kini na , kulup yom mi kombo mboe pini ma kapakuri !
19149002	Niom Israel , leleyom ambai pini . Pa ni ta iur yom . Niom Sion koyom , menmeen yom pini . Pa ni ta king tiom .
19149003	Karak mi kapakur Yooba zaana . Kitir kakaaba mi kese kombom be kapakuri .
19149004	Pa Yooba , ni leleene ambai kat pa wal kini . Zin wal ta timbotmbot raama pataŋana mi tipase pini men na , ni ko ikamke zin , mi ikam zin ma nin se .
19149005	Tana zin wal tau tiurur lelen pa Yooba mi titoto mbulu kini , nako lelen ambai mi nin se . Pa ni ko ipakur zin , mi ikam zin ma tilip . Mi sombe tilek kumbun pini be tisuŋ , nako kalŋan isala mi tipakuri raama menmeen zin .
19149006	Mboe pakurŋana ko imbot la kwon , mi buza mata mbaaru imbot la naman keteene ,
19149007	bekena tipokot mbulu sananŋana kizin karkari mi tiur kadoono pa kan koi bizin .
19149008	Ko tipo zin king kizin pa re mbolŋan , mi tipo zin peeze kan kizin pa sen ta tiurpe pa ain na .
19149009	Naso tikam ma wal tana tire kadoono kizin . Kadoono tana , tibeede ka sua pataaŋa kek . Mbulu tana iso ipet , tona zin wal ta tiurur lelen pa Yooba mi titoto mbulu kini na zan ko iwe biibi . Haleluya !
19150001	Haleluya ! Kapakur Anutu lela muriini potomŋana ! Kapakuri lela muriini mbolŋana ta saamba a !
19150002	Kapakur zaana pa uraata kini mburanŋan ta ni ikamam na . Kapakuri pa ni ta zaana biibi ma ilip .
19150003	Kiwi twiiri mi kapakur zaana . Kese kombom mi kupun gita mi kapakuri .
19150004	Kitir kakaaba , mi karak mi kapakur zaana . Kapakuri pa mamaaza mi gita .
19150005	Kupun koŋ mi kapakuri . Mi sombe kupun , na kupun kat bekena kalŋaana biibi .
19150006	Tana niom koroŋ mata yaryaaraŋoyom ta munŋaana men , kapakur Yooba ! Haleluya !
20001001	Iŋgi sua tutŋana mi sua tooroŋan pakan ki Dabit lutuunu Salumo ta king kizin Israel na .
20001002	Sua tiŋgi ko ipaute iti pa ŋgar ambaiŋana mi ipazal ŋgar kiti . Mi ipei ŋgar kiti pa sua ta izzwe mbulu ambaiŋana mi mbulu sananŋana na .
20001003	Mi sua tiŋgi ko iuulu iti be tagabiizi itundu , mi takam mbulu kiti raama ŋgar . Naso takam mbulu ambaiŋana men ta indeeŋe pa Anutu mi tomtom matan , mi takam mbulu raraate men pizin tomtom ta boozomen .
20001004	Zin wal tau len ŋgar biibi som na , sua tiŋgi ko ipei ŋgar kizin mi iso zin pa mbulu ambaiŋana tabe tikam i . Sua tiŋgi ko ipaute zin naŋgaŋ pa so ŋgar i tabe tito .
20001005	Mi zin wal ta len ŋgar biibi na , zin tomini irao tileŋ la sua ti . Naso tiseeŋge ŋgar kizin . Zin wal tau ŋgar kizin ipet kek na , sua tiŋgi irao ikam peeze pizin .
20001006	Sua tiŋgi ko iuulu iti be takam kat ŋgar pa sua matakiŋa : sua tutŋan , sua tooroŋan , mi sua pambaaraŋan kizin wal ŋgarŋan , ramaki sua kizin pakan ta tizzo na .
20001007	Mbulu tau tomototo Yooba mi teleŋleŋ la kalŋaana , ina ŋgar ambaiŋana uunu ŋonoono . Tamen wal kankaanaŋan ta tizorzooro na , matan repilpiili ŋgar ambaiŋana mi sua pazalŋana .
20001008	O lutuŋ , sombe tomom ipazalu , na leŋ la sua kini . Mi mbulu ambaiŋana ta nom ipaute u pa na , ta kembena . Zem pepe . Kiskis mi to .
20001009	Pa sua kizin ko iurpe mbulu ku ma ambai pa Anutu mi tomtom matan , kembei natabu ma mogar ta iwe aigau piti na .
20001010	Lutuŋ , sombe wal sananŋan tiwatu pa sua kizin mbuyeeneŋana be gaaba zin , na leŋ zin pepe .
20001011	Wal tana tizzo ta kembei : “ Ai , mar itiŋan tala ma teke su zaala lwoono mi tazaŋzaaŋa . Beso tomtom tasa ipa pa zaala ma imar , to tupuni sorok ma imeete .
20001012	Ko tapamorsopi , mi tupuni ma imeete , kembei meeteŋana ipamorsop tomtom mata yaryaaraŋana , mi imeete karau men ma isula lene naala .
20001013	Naso takam lende koroŋ ambaimbaiŋan matakiŋa ta kan kadon bibip i , mi tadaaba ruumu kiti pa mburu tana ma bok .
20001014	Mi nu ta kembena . Sombe gaaba yam , inako amur ndomom tomini . Pa mburu ta so takam na , ko tarai ma lende lende . ”
20001015	O lutuŋ , sombe tikam sua ta kembei pu , na ruutu itum , mi la gaaba zin pepe . Zaala ta titoto na , nu to zin pa pepe .
20001016	Pa zin na , karau men mi timaŋgaŋga be tikam zaaba pizin tomtom , mi tipun zin ma timetmeete . Tiserseere kat pa sanaana kamŋana .
20001017	Kwiili ta imbot la mban na , ye tire kek . Tamen tikam kinkiini pa mban be tikan , tana tila ma kwiili ikam zin .
20001018	Mi wal sananŋan tana ta kembena . Mbulu kizin ta tikewe mi tizaŋzaaŋa zin tomtom , ina kaimer ko imiili pizin mi ikam zaaba pizin ma timetmeete . Tamen tikilaala som , mi tila men .
20001019	Ŋonoono kat . Wal boozomen taso tikamam malmal be tikem len koroŋ , na zaala kizin ta kembei . Mbulu kizin tana ko ipasaana mbotŋana kizin , mi tisaana ma tila len .
20001020	Ŋgar ambaiŋana ikewe piti som . Ina kembei moori ta imbotmbot zaala biibi , mi ilala nol uunu tomini mi ipaŋarairai kalŋaana .
20001021	Mi sombe zin iwal biibi tilup zin su kar keteene , som zaala kwoono , na ni iboboobo zin ma izzo ta kembei :
20001022	Niom wal ta leyom ŋgar biibi som na , parei ? Leleyom be kombotmbot men ta kembei ma alok ? Niom wal ta kapakurkur ituyom mi kerepilpiili ŋgar ambaiŋana na , mi niom wal kankaanaŋoyom ta kapase pa ituyom mi leleyom pa ŋgar ambaiŋana ri sa som na , ŋiizi mi kezem mbulu tiom tana ?
20001023	Nio aŋso aŋpazal yom . Tamen leleyom be kotooro ŋgar tiom som . Mibe kotooro yom , so aŋswe ŋgar ta imbotmbot la leleŋ i , mi aŋso yom pa .
20001024	Nio ti , aŋbelmbel sua piom . Tamen niom kitidit kalŋoŋ . Mi aŋkololo yom be kamar , tamen leleyom be kamar som .
20001025	Pa ŋgar ambaiŋana ta aŋzzo yom pa i na , leleyom pa som . Mi aŋtomtoombo be aŋpazal yom na , keleŋleŋ la kalŋoŋ som .
20001026	Tana kaimer , sombe pataŋana biibi sa itok yom kembei miiri biibi , mi ipasaana yom kembei miiri napiu , mi isalakaala yom , mi ikau yom , mi ikam yom ma keseŋeeŋe , na nio tomini ko uteŋ katkat piom , mi aŋseeŋge piom .
20001027	
20001028	To niom ko kataŋroro yo be aŋuulu yom . Tamen nio ko aŋleŋ yom som . Mi ko kuru yo . Tamen ko karao be kendeeŋe yo na som .
20001029	Pa leleyom pa ŋgar ambaiŋana ri sa som . Mi leleyom be komoto Yooba mi keleŋ la kalŋaana som .
20001030	Indeeŋe ta aŋzzo yom pa ŋgar ambaiŋana na , kakan la kalŋoŋ som . Mi indeeŋe ta aŋtoombo be aŋpazal yom na , motoyom pasom sua tio kembei koroŋ sorok .
20001031	Tana mbulu bozboozo ta kakamam , ta iŋgi be kakan ka ŋonoono . Gorgori kurru zaala sananŋana , tana iŋgi be kayamaana kat ka pataŋana .
20001032	Pa zin wal ta len ŋgar biibi som , mi tileŋsil sua na , mbulu kizin tana ko ipun zin ma timetmeete . Mi zin wal kankaanaŋan ta tipase pa zitun mi tindemeere sorok na , mbulu kizin tana ko ipasaana zin ma tila len .
20001033	Tamen zin wal ta so tileŋleŋ la kalŋoŋ , na nio ko aŋporoukaala zin ma timbot ambai . Irao timoto na som . Pa kosa sa ko irao be ipasaana zin na som . ”
20002001	O lutuŋ , kan la sua tio ti . Re tutu tio ta boozomen kembei koroŋ ku ŋonoono , mi kiskis ma imbol la lelem .
20002002	Ŋgun talŋom pa ŋgar ambaiŋana , mi ur lelem be kilaala kat ŋgar iŋgoi ta ambai ma ilip .
20002003	Taŋroro Anutu be ipei ŋgar ku , mi iso u pa ŋgar iŋgoi ta ambai ma ilip .
20002004	Kam kinkiini pa ŋgar ambaiŋana mi rru , kembei tomtom tikelel toono mi tirru silba mi koroŋ ndabokbokŋan pakan ta timbotmbot la toono leleene na .
20002005	Naso mbot mat pa mbulu ki tomototo Yooba mi teleŋleŋ la kalŋaana . Mi nu ko ute kat Anutu .
20002006	Pa Yooba ta ikamam lende ŋgar ambaiŋana . Sua ta iwedet pa kwoono , ta ipeyei ŋgar kiti , mi iuluulu iti be tikilaala ŋgar iŋgoi ta ambai ma ilip .
20002007	Zin wal ta mbulu kizin iŋgeeze men na , ni iuluulu zin ma uraata kizin iurur ŋonoono . Mi zin wal ta tipa pai kizin ma ambai men na , ni iwe kembei siŋgiao pizin .
20002008	Pa ni mataana pizin wal ndeeŋeŋan pa pai kizin . Zin wal ta tiurur lelen pini mi tikiskis mbulu kini na , ni imborro zin ma timbotmbot ambai .
20002009	Tana kam kinkiini pa ŋgar ambaiŋana . Naso mbot mat pa zaala ambaimbaiŋan ta boozomen . Nu ko kilaala mbulu ta indeeŋe men pa Anutu mi tomtom matan , mi kam mbulu raraate men pizin tomtom ta munŋaana men .
20002010	Pa ŋgar ambaiŋana ko izeebu . Mi sombe kam kat ŋgar , nako yamaana ambai .
20002011	Mbulu ki tombot mi takam kat ŋgar muŋgu , inako imboro u ma mbot ambai . Mi sombe nu rao be kilaala ŋgar iŋgoi ta ambai ma ilip , nako iuulu u be mbotmbot molo pa koroŋ boozomen tabe ipasaanu i .
20002012	Ŋgar ambaiŋana ko iuulu u be mbotmbot molo pa zaala ta wal sananŋan titoto na . Wal tana tipasansaana zin tomtom pa sua kizin pakamkaamŋana .
20002013	Zin tizem zaala ndeeŋeŋana kek , mi iŋgi titoto zaala ki zugut .
20002014	Zin lelen pa mbulu sananŋana ilip . Sombe tikam ŋoobo mbulu pa tomtom sa , ina ikam zin ma menmeen zin biibi .
20002015	Tana zaala ŋonoono , zin tizem kek . Mi iŋgi titoto zaala sananŋana .
20002016	Ŋgar ambaiŋana ko iuulu u be mbotmbot molo pizin moori zaala lwoono kan . Zin moori ta kembei kwon imbesmbeeze pizin tomooto bekena tiyaaru zin ma tila kizin .
20002017	Pa zin moori ta kembei tipizil ndemen pa kusin bizin ta mata popoten kana i kek . Mi sua kizin mbukŋana ta tikam la Anutu mataana na , matan mbelele kek .
20002018	Zaala ta isula pa Andewa na , kwoono imbot kat ta ndeete uunu kizin . Tana wal ta so titop la kizin , nako tisula ma tigaaba zin wal meeteŋan ma ziŋan timbotmbot .
20002019	Zin wal ta so tila kizin moori ta kembei , na kizin tasa ko imiili mi ito zaala ki mbotŋana mata yaryaaraŋana mini na som . Sombe tila , na timbot pataaŋa .
20002020	Tana zaala tau wal ambaimbaiŋan titoto na , nu tomini motom iŋgal be pa pa . To zin wal ndeeŋeŋan pa mbulu kizin totomen . Zem pepe .
20002021	Pa zin wal ta len uunu sa isaana som , mi mbulu kizin iŋgeeze men , ta tirao be timbotmbot pa toono ta Yooba ikam pa wal kini na .
20002022	Tamen zin wal ta tipizil ndemen pini na , Yooba ko ipuru zin ma tila len pa toono kini , kembei ta tomtom tipuru ro sananŋan pa mokleene kizin . Ni ko iyembut kat zin wal sananŋan ma irao timar tigarau toono kini mini som .
20003001	Lutuŋ , sua ta nio aŋkam pu na , motom mbelele pepe . Motom iŋgalŋgal tutu tio ta boozomen mi kiskis la lelem .
20003002	Pa ina ko ikamu ma mbot ambai , mi iseeŋge mbotŋana ku ma molo .
20003003	Mbulu ki tu'urur lelende pa Anutu mi zin tomtom mi tototo sua kiti mbukŋana na , zem pepe . Mbulu ru tana , kiskis la lelem mi zzwe totomen . Pa ina ko iwe kembei aigau ta imbot la ketem na .
20003004	Tana kiskis mbulu ru tana . Naso ndeeŋe kampeŋana biibi , mi Anutu ziŋan zin tomtom tire u kembei nu lem ŋgar ambaiŋana .
20003005	Re : Kokena pase pa itum ŋgar ku . Ur lelem imap ila ki Yooba , mi pase pini men .
20003006	Mi so zaala i ta lelem iur pa be to , na kam ŋgar pa Yooba muŋgu , mana kam . Naso ni ikam peeze piwi mi iso u pa ka zaala .
20003007	Re itum kembei nu rao kat pa ŋgar pepe . Moto Yooba , leŋleŋ la kalŋaana , mi pizil ndemem pa mbulu sananŋan ta boozomen .
20003008	Pa mbulu ta kembei ko iuulu kulim ma imbot ambai , mi ikam ma kulim iŋgeeze mi nim se pa uraata .
20003009	Yooba , ni ikam lem koroŋ boozo kek . Tana pimilmiili koroŋ pakan ma ilala kini bekena pakuri pa . Koroŋ ku paazaŋan ta boozomen na , motom iŋgal be pazas mataana kana ma ilala kini .
20003010	Naso Anutu ikam ma mokleene ku ipiyooto kini boozo , mi diditu ku bokbok men . Mi baen ku ko ipiyotyooto ŋonon ta sorok som , mi baen piiziŋana muriini bokbok kat pa yok baen popoŋana .
20003011	Lutuŋ , sombe Yooba ikam mbulu sa pu bekena ipazalu pa , na parsiki pepe . Mi sombe iyaambu , na lelem iŋgis pa pepe .
20003012	Pa zin wal ta Yooba leleene pizin na , ni ipazalzal zin , kembei ta takamam pa lutundu bizin tau lelende pizin ilip na .
20003013	Tomtom ta so iru ŋgar ambaiŋana ma indeeŋe , mi ikilaala ŋgar iŋgoi ta ambai ma ilip , nako leleene ambai kat , mi kampeŋana ki Anutu imbotmbot se kini .
20003014	Pa ŋgar ambaiŋana ipiyotyooto ŋonoono ambaimbaiŋan boozomen piti . Ilip pa silba ma gol .
20003015	Mi ilip pa pat milmilŋan pakan ta ndabokbokŋan kat . Tana koroŋ boozomen ta nu lelem pa i na , sa irao kembei ŋgar ambaiŋana na som .
20003016	Ŋgar ambaiŋana namaana ru iteege koroŋ boozomen be ikam piti . Namaana woono irao iseeŋge swondo ma molo . Mi namaana ŋas na , irao ikam lende koroŋ boozo , mi ikam ma zanda iwe biibi .
20003017	Zin wal ta so titoto zaala ki ŋgar ambaiŋana , nako tiyamaana ambai . Pa mboti kizin ko ndabok kat .
20003018	Ŋgar ambaiŋana , ina iwe kembei ke ki mbotŋana mata yaryaaraŋana . Pa zin wal ta so tikami ma iwe len mi tikiskisi , nako timbot ambai , mi kampeŋana ki Anutu imbotmbot se kizin .
20003019	Muŋgu kat Yooba ito ŋgar kini ambaiŋana , mi iur toono uunu ma imbol . Mi ikam kat ŋgar , mana iur saamba .
20003020	Muŋgu kat yok ta imbot meleebe na , ise raama mburaana biibi . Ito ni ŋgar kini . Mi ŋgar kini , ta izzo i pa mbulu tabe ikam ma yaŋ izzu pa gubur tiene , mi tolou iwedet .
20003021	Lutuŋ , motom iŋgal be kiskis ŋgar ambaiŋana . Ŋgar ta iurur ŋonoono na , zem pepe .
20003022	Pa ina ko ikamu ma mbot ambai , mi ipeŋgeeze mbulu ku , kembei aigau ta imbot la ketem na .
20003023	To pa pai ku ma ambai men . Pa kosasa ko ipasaanu som , mi irao tutkat kumbum na som .
20003024	Mi sombe su murim be keene , nako moto som . Ko keene kat lem .
20003025	Tana pataŋana biibi tabe ipamurur zin wal sananŋan mi ipasaana zin i , nu ko irao moto na som .
20003026	Pa Yooba ko imbotmbot zilŋom uunu mi imborro u . Tana kilis sa ko irao ikeene kumbum na som .
20003027	Sombe pataŋana indeeŋe tomtom sa mi nu lem uraata be uuli , na titi pepe . Sombe rao be uuli , na kam pataaŋa . So pini be ila ma gaaga to imiili mini pepe . Sombe lem koroŋ imbot , na kam pini pataaŋa .
20003028	
20003029	Tomtom ta so ruumu kini igarau u , na kam ŋgar be pasaani pepe . Pa ina ni indemeere kembei nu ko kam mbulu ambaiŋana men pini .
20003030	Mi tomtom ta so ikam ŋoobo mbulu som , na maŋga mi kam sorok sua pini pepe .
20003031	Zin wal ta tikamam zaaba pizin tomtom na , motom berber pa mburu kizin pepe , mi to zin pa zaala kizin pepe .
20003032	Pa zin wal ta tikamam ŋoobo mbulu na , Yooba leleene pizin ri sa som kat . Tamen zin wal ta mbulu kizin iŋgeeze men na , Yooba igabgaaba zin mi izzwe leleene mi ŋgar kini pizin .
20003033	Wal sananŋan ziŋan wal kizin na , Yooba kete malmalŋana kini imbotmbot se kizin . Mi wal ndeeŋeŋan ziŋan wal kizin na , kampeŋana kini imbotmbot se kizin .
20003034	Zin wal ta tipakurkur zitun mi matan pasom ŋgar ambaiŋana na , Yooba irepilpiili zin . Mi zin wal ta tikototo zitun na , ni leleene pizin mi ikampewe zin .
20003035	Zin wal ta len ŋgar ambaiŋana , nako zan iwe biibi . Mi wal kankaanaŋan ta tizorzooro , nako kan miaŋ biibi .
20004001	O lutuŋŋan , tomoyom ta nio i . Keleŋ sua tio tutŋana ti mi motoyom iŋgalŋgal . Naso ŋgar tiom ipet mi kikilaala ŋgar iŋgoi ta ambai ma ilip .
20004002	Ŋgar ambaiŋana ta tipaute yo pa kek , ta iŋgi be aŋkam piom i . Tana kezem sua tio ti pepe .
20004003	Muŋgu ta nio naŋgaŋŋoŋ mi aŋbotmbot tamaŋ ruumu kini na , naŋgoŋ lutuunu tamen ŋonoono ta nio i . Tana ni leleene pio ilip .
20004004	Indeeŋe mazwaana tana , tamaŋ ipaute yo ma iso ta kembei : “ Motom iŋgal be kiskis sua tio ila lelem , mi toto tutu tio . Naso mbot ambai .
20004005	Kam kinkiini be kam lem ŋgar ambaiŋana mi kilaala ŋgar iŋgoi ta ambai ma ilip . Mi motom mbelele sua tio pepe , mi paŋoobo pa pepe .
20004006	Pizil ndemem pa ŋgar ambaiŋana pepe .
20004007	Kam kinkiini pa ŋgar ambaiŋana . Pa ina ilip pa koroŋ ta boozomen . Tana ru zaala be kam lem ŋgar ambaiŋana . Sombe zem koroŋ ku ta boozomen ma ila bekena kam lem ŋgar ambaiŋana , na ila lak ! Nin pepe .
20004008	Nu sombe pakur ŋgar ambaiŋana , nako ŋgar ambaiŋana ipakuru tomini . Mi sombe yogeege lem ŋgar ambaimbaiŋan matakiŋa , nako ikam ma zom iwe biibi .
20004009	Ŋgar ambaiŋana ko iwe kembei mogar ndabokŋana kat tau imbot la ndomom mi iwe aigau pu .
20004010	O lutuŋ , leŋ sua tio ti mi kan la . Naso mbotmbot su toono ma molo , mi kom ndaama boozo .
20004011	Nio iŋgi aŋpaute u pa zaala ki ŋgar ambaiŋana . Aŋmuŋmuuŋgu pu , mi aŋzzo u pa zaala ndeeŋeŋana .
20004012	Zaala tana , ambaiŋana . Sombe pa pa , na koroŋ sa ko irao iŋgal kumbum na som . Mi sombe loondo pa , na kumbum ko irao ikam giris ma mel na som .
20004013	Sua tutŋana ta aŋkam pu na , zem pepe . Motom iŋgalŋgal mi kiskis la lelem . Pa ina ko ikamu ma mbot ambai .
20004014	Zaala ta zin wal sananŋan titoto na , ur kumbum ise ri sa pepe . Kokena gaaba zin mi to zin pa mbulu kizin . Tana pizil ndemem pa zaala kizin mi mbotmbot molo pa . Motom iŋgalŋgal zaala ambaiŋana men mi toto .
20004015	
20004016	Pa wal sananŋan ŋgar kizin ta kembei : Aigule ta boozomen bela tikam mbulu sananŋana sa , tona lelen ambai mi tisu murin ma tikeene kat len . Mi sombe tipasaana tomtom sa som , na irao tikeenekaala matan na som .
20004017	Pa mbulu sananŋana ta iwe kan kini . Mi mbulu ki malmal ta iwe kan yok . Aigule ta boozomen bela tikam , to lelen ambai .
20004018	Tana zin wal sananŋan titoto zaala ki zugut biibi . Mi koroŋ tabe titutkat zin sala ma sursur ma tila kaŋkuruŋ su na , tikilaala som . Tamen wal ndeeŋeŋan na , zaala kizin toro . Mbotŋana kizin kembei zoŋ mataana ta pok ma ise , mi iyaara iyaara ma ila irao aigule palakuutu , to ka azuŋka biibi kat .
20004019	
20004020	O lutuŋ , motom mar mi ŋgun talŋom pa sua ta aŋzzo i .
20004021	Motom mbelele sua tio pepe . Kiskis mi ur la lelem .
20004022	Pa zin wal ta so tikam sua tio ti ma iwe len , nako tindeeŋe mbotŋana ambaiŋana . Mi sua tio ko iuulu zin ma kulin tomini imbot ambai .
20004023	Motom iŋgalŋgal be mboro kat lelem . Ina koroŋ biibi ta ilip pa koroŋ ta boozomen . Pa lelende ta ipiyotyooto mbotŋana kiti .
20004024	Mi mboro kat kwom tomini : Kokena sua sananŋana , som pakaamŋana sa ipet pa .
20004025	Motom su pa zaala ndeeŋeŋana men mi toto . Motom rikrik pepe .
20004026	Motom iŋgalŋgal kumbum be itoto kat zaala ndeeŋeŋana . Naso pa pai ku ma ambai men , mi irao yasipir na som .
20004027	Kumbum ilalae mi imarmare pepe . Kokena kam mbulu sananŋana sa .
20005001	O lutuŋ , leŋ la ŋgar ambaiŋana tabe aŋso u pa i . Ŋgun talŋom pio . Pa sua tio ti ko iuulu u be kilaala mbulu iŋgoi ta ambai ma ilip .
20005002	Naso kam kat ŋgar , mi kwom izzo ŋgar ambaiŋana men .
20005003	Kozo re u pizin moori zaala lwoono kan . Pa sua kizin inamut kat , kembei ta bigil suruunu . Sua ta iwedet pa kwon na , mbuyeeneŋana ma ilip .
20005004	Mi nu sombe la ki moori sa ta kembei , na kaimer mbotŋana ku ko isaana ma ipakpak kat . Ko kembei ta buza mata mbaaru iŋgalu .
20005005	Nu sombe to zaala kini , nako meete ma la lem . Pa ni ko iyaaru ma sula lem naala .
20005006	Zaala ki mbotŋana mata yaryaaraŋana na , ni ikamam ŋgar pa ri sa som kat . Zaala ta ni itoto , ina ipa ndel pa zaala ndeeŋeŋana . Tamen ni ikilaala som .
20005007	Tana lutuŋŋan , keleŋ la kalŋoŋ . Kipizil ndemeyom pa sua tio ti pepe .
20005008	Moori ta kembei na , kagarau i pepe . Kombotmbot molo pini .
20005009	Kokena ipasaana zoyom , mi koroŋ tiom ta ndaama ndaama mi kembelmbel uraata pa na , imap pini sorok . Mi koroŋ toro tomini . Sombe kusiini ileŋ , nako iseeze kat motoyom . Irao imuŋai yom ri sa na som . Som kat !
20005010	Tana koroŋ tiom ambaimbaiŋan ta uze tiom tiene na , ko iwe wal pakan len , be tikanan ma tiwinin .
20005011	Mi niom ko kusu ma kewe koroŋ sorok , mi mete ikam yom ma mburoyom imap mi saana kat . Mi sombe swoyom igarau , to ko ketwer ma koso ta kembei :
20005012	“ O yae , muŋgu wal pakan titut yo . Mi parei ta aŋleŋ la kalŋan som ? Indeeŋe ta titoombo be tipazal yo na , aŋrepilpiili sua kizin .
20005013	Mi titoombo be tipaute yo na , aŋgun talŋoŋ pizin som , mi aŋto sua kizin som .
20005014	Tana iŋgi mbotŋana tio isaana kat , mi koŋ miaŋ biibi ila iwal matan . ”
20005015	O lutuŋ , niomru kusim men kaparlup yom mi menmeen yom pa mbulu ki ula . Pa ina kembei nu winin yok ta itum touŋom na .
20005016	Parei ta nu lelem be la kizin moori pakan ma niomŋan kekeene ? Pa ina kembei nu kam yok ta ireere pa yok ku lepeene na , mi liŋ sorok su zaala lwoono , som kar keteene .
20005017	Ula ka mbulu , ina koroŋ ki niomru kusim men be menmeen yom pa . Tana niomŋan moori pakan kakam pepe .
20005018	Bela nu menmeenu pa kusim ta nu naŋgaŋŋom mi wooli na . Naso kampeŋana ki Anutu imbotmbot se ula tiom , mi waem ko ikamu ma lelem ambai kat .
20005019	Pa ni ko iurur kat leleene pu , mi nu re ruŋguunu mi koroŋŋanŋan ta boozomen na , ambai men pa motom . Zuzuunu ko ikamu ma so tekteege lem . Tana ni ko ikam kat lelem , mi ŋgar ku imap ma ilala kini .
20005020	O lutuŋ , kokena moori toro ikam lelem ma zem ula ku . Re : Nu sombe teege tomooto toro kusiini zuzuunu , ko ambai ? Som .
20005021	Pa mbulu boozomen ta iti tomtom takamam na , imbot kat mat pa Yooba mataana . Ni itirtiiri iti pa mbulu kiti ta boozomen .
20005022	Mbulu sananŋana kizin wal sananŋan ta ikaukau zin . Mbulu kizin ta irao pa Yooba mataana som na , ina iwe kembei wooro be tipo zin pa .
20005023	Tana wal ta kembei ko timeete ma tila len . Paso tiyaraama zitun som tau . Ŋgar kizin ikankaana kat mi timbelmbel zooroŋana . Tabe ikam zin ma tipaŋoobo pa zaala ambaiŋana .
20006001	Lutuŋ , sombe waem toro sa ikam mbun , mi tiwi u be mbuk sua ta kembei : “ Sombe ni itunu irao be ikot som , na nio ko aŋmender pini mi aŋkot mbun kini . ” Na sua mbukŋana ta kembei , kam pepe .
20006002	Pa ina , sua ta ipet pa itum kwom , ta ko iwe kembei kilis pu be ikeenu .
20006003	Tana mbotmbot pepe ! Ru lem zaala sa be tatke itum pa kilis tana . Pa tomtom ta waem tana ikam mbun la kini na , nu mbotmbot la namaana kek . Tana koto itum , koŋuru tomtom tana ma la , mi taŋroro i be mataana mbiriizikaala sua ku mbukŋana tana . Pazonognoogi ma irao ileŋ la kalŋom .
20006004	Keene ma mbot aigule toro pepe . Maŋga mi la ta buri be re i !
20006005	Kozo kam kembei ŋge ta iti la pu , mi ipus ma ila ne , som kilis ikeeni mi ipurus .
20006006	Nu ta tomtom maolŋom na , la ma re moolo mbulu kizin mi kam ŋgar pa .
20006007	Zin len biibi sa be iur zin pa uraata mi ikam peeze pizin na som .
20006008	Tamen mazwaana ta so kini boozo imbotmbot na , tiyyo mi tindoundou lae . Beso mazwaana ki peteele , to tirao pa kan kini .
20006009	Nu tomtom maolŋom , ŋiizi na zem keeneŋana mi maŋga ?
20006010	Parei , nu sombe mbulu ki namanda ikamam uraata som , mi ketende izzu , mi tekenne lende sorok , ina ambai ? Na kozo re u . Pa molo som to su ma mbot ŋoobo kat mi ru zolom . Mbulu ta kembei ko ipamorsopu kembei ta wal kuumbuŋan tikamam i . Mi ko iwe kembei tomtom ta ipasepeelu pa le koroŋ , mi iniimu ma map kat .
20006011	
20006012	Wal sananŋan ta tipasansaana mboti kizin tomtom na , kwon ambai som kat .
20006013	Mi lelen be tiswe mbulu mi ŋgar kizin ma ipet mat na som . Tana matan ikinmetmeete , mi tiurur naman , mi tikamam mbulu pakan pa kumbun , bekena tipatooŋo waen bizin pa so mbulu i tabe tikam i .
20006014	Lelen na , iurur pa mbulu soroksorok boozomen ta sananŋan i . Mi tipesese zin tomtom mi tikamam ma ŋoŋi imbotmbot la mazwan .
20006015	Tamen molo som to pataŋana biibi sa ko ipamurur zin , mi ipasaana zin ma tila len . Mi ko len zaala sa be timbot ambai mini na som .
20006016	Mbulu lamata mi ta , ta Yooba leleene pa ri sa som , mi iurur koi pa . E-e , aŋso ŋoobo . Mbulu lamata mi ru :
20006017	Mbulu ki tapakur itundu mi matanda pasom zin tomtom , mbulu tau kwondo ipakamkaam , mbulu ki namanda iteege siŋ pizin wal ta len uunu sa isaana som ,
20006018	mbulu tau lelende iur pa ŋgar sananŋana , mbulu tau kumbundu ipawwai iti be takam mbulu sananŋana ,
20006019	mbulu ki topombol sorok sua pakaamŋana ila zin bibip matan , mi mbulu tau tukuru toŋmatiziŋ kopon , mi takam ma ŋoŋi imbotmbot la mazwan .
20006020	O lutuŋ , motom iŋgalŋgal tutu ta boozomen ki tomom mi toto . Mi ŋgar ambaiŋana ta nom ikam pu na , zem pepe .
20006021	Po sua kizin ila ndomom , mi kiskis la ŋgar ku . Pa ina ko ipeŋgeeze mbulu ku , kembei aigau ta imbot la ketem na .
20006022	Sua kizin irao ikam peeze pu , mi iuulu u be pa pai ku ma ambai men . Mi keeneŋana ku tomini ko ambai . Pa sua kizin ta imborro u . Mi sombe maŋga , na sua kizin ko ipeyei ŋgar ambaiŋana pu .
20006023	Tutu kizin ko iwe kembei ta kai pu be iyaara pu mi iso u pa zaala . Sua ta tikam pu na , ko iurur mat pu . Mi sua tutŋana ta tikam pu bekena tipazalu pa na , ina ko iwe zaala pu be ndeeŋe mbotŋana ambaiŋana .
20006024	Sua kizin ko iuulu u be mbotmbot molo pizin moori zaala lwoono kan . Kokena timbuulu kwon pu , to tikam lelem .
20006025	Ŋonoono , zin moori ta kembei na , ruŋgun ambaimbaiŋan . Tamen motom la pizin pepe . Mi sombe matan ikinmeete pu , na tikam lelem pepe .
20006026	Zin moori ta zaala lwoono kan na , kan kadon bibip som . Mi nu sombe la ki tomtom toro kusiini ma niomru kekeene , nako ka kadoono biibi kat . Pa nu ko meete ma la lem !
20006027	Lak , sombe tomtom sa iur namaana sala you , ko ikani som ?
20006028	Mi sombe ipa se you keseene , ko kumbuunu ipokpok som ?
20006029	Mi ina raraate men pa tomtom ta so ila ki tomooto toro kusiini na . Ni kola ire ka kadoono . Irao tileeli na som .
20006030	Sombe tomtom sa peteli ma isaana kat , mi ikam kuumbu pa ka kini , nako tomtom tire kembei ambai ri . Paso lelen isaana pini .
20006031	Tamen sombe tindeeŋi , nako tiur sua pini be ikot koroŋ ta ni ikem na pa lamata mi ru . Ko ikot mi ila ila ma irao ruumu kini leleene ikolkol kat .
20006032	Mi tomtom ta so ila ki tomooto toro kusiini , na ni kankaanaŋana kat . Pa ina , ipasaana itunu .
20006033	Ko tipuni ma ruŋguunu isaana , mi ka miaŋ biibi kat . Mi ka miaŋ tana ko irao imap na som .
20006034	Pa re . Sombe nu la ki tomooto toro kusiini , nako kam tomooto tana ma mataana mburmbur mi keteene malmal biibi kat . Tana ni kola ipokot mbulu ku . Irao imuŋai u ri sa na som .
20006035	Sombe toombo sua pini be ŋgiimi sosor ku , na irao ileŋu na som . Sombe kam le koroŋ zaanaŋana sa , ina tomini , irao iurpe leleene na som .
20007001	O lutuŋ , motom iŋgalŋgal sua tio ti , mi kiskis tutu tio ta boozomen ma imbol kat la ŋgar ku .
20007002	Motom iŋgalŋgal tutu tio mi toto . Naso mbotmbot ambai . Sua boozomen ta aŋkam pu na , kozo mboro kat , kembei ta mborro kat itum motom na .
20007003	Tana kiskis sua tio ta boozomen ma imbol la ŋgar ku totomen , kembei ta kukuugu imbotmbot la nomom totomen .
20007004	Ur kat lelem pa ŋgar ambaiŋana , kembei ta lelem pa lumri bizin mi toŋmatiziŋ ku .
20007005	Pa sombe kam lem ŋgar ambaiŋana , nako iuulu u be mbotmbot molo pizin moori zaala lwoono kan ta tiwadat zin tomooto na . Kokena kwon imbuulu u , to sua kizin ikam lelem .
20007006	Kembei ta lwoono ta . Nio aŋbotmbot ruumu leleene , mi aŋmender la miiri kwoono . Mi motoŋ la na , aŋre naŋgaŋ pakan timendernder ma timbotmbot . Ŋgar kizin ipet zen . Mi tomtom kizin ta , ni le ŋgar somŋana .
20007007	
20007008	Iwwa pa zaala ma ila , mi igarau ruumu ki moori ta .
20007009	Ila ipet ruumu tana na , zoŋ isula mi zugut isu .
20007010	To moori tana izeebi pa mburu kembei ta moori zaala lwoono kan tiurur na , mi ipaŋuru i ma imar . Imar raama ŋgar turkeŋana ta .
20007011	Moori tana mbuleene izzu ruumu som . Gorgori iwwa lene mi ipaŋarairai kalŋaana .
20007012	Mi irru zin tomooto su nol muriini , mi ikewe su zaala lwoono be izaŋzaaŋa zin .
20007013	Tana ire naŋgaŋ tina , to loŋa men mi isou i , mi ikan kwoono . Mi ka miaŋ ri sa som . Iso kat pini ma iso :
20007014	“ Ai , nio ti , muŋgu aŋbuk sua pa Anutu be aŋkam patoronŋana pini . Mi koozi aŋkam patoronŋana tana , mi buzur ka lwoono imbotmbot ruumu tio be takan .
20007015	Tana aŋyooto pa ruumu ma aŋmar be aŋru u tau . Mi iŋgi aŋdeeŋu kek .
20007016	Leŋ . Nio aŋurpe mbalia tio , mi aŋwar mburu ta kan mos ambaimbaiŋan na ise muriŋ . Mburu tana imbot taa Aikuptu mi imar .
20007017	Mi aŋliŋ koroŋ pakan ta kuzin ambaimbaiŋan na ise ma ambai leen !
20007018	Tana mar ma ituru tekeene . Ko menmeen ti mi takamam ma ila irao zoŋ ise !
20007019	Kam ŋgar pa kusiŋ pepe . Pa ni imbotmbot ruumu som . Iŋga ila pa lele molo . Ko loŋa imar na zeen .
20007020	Pa ila raama kautu kini ta bok pa pat . Tana ko imbotmbot ma puulu ilupi , tona imar . ”
20007021	Moori tana ikam mbulu boozo pa naŋgaŋ tana bekena iyaaru i . Mi kwoono imbesmbeeze pini ma tau ! Tabe ikam leleene , mi ni ito i ma ziru tila .
20007022	Naŋgaŋ tana inamnaama som . Ziru tila pataaŋa . Ni kembei makau ta iur niini mi tikami ma tila be tipuni ma imeete . Mi kembei buzur ta ikilaala kilis som mi kumbuunu isula .
20007023	Ni ikilaala som . Mbulu ta ikam na , ko ikami ma imeete . Kaimer peene lutuunu sa ko iŋgetŋgeete ise kuliini . Ni ko iwe kembei ŋge ta ila ma kilis ikami .
20007024	Tana lutuŋŋan , keleŋ la sua tio ti , mi motoyom iŋgalŋgal .
20007025	Kere yom pizin moori ta kembei : Kokena tikam leleyom ma kezem zaala ambaiŋana , mi koto zin pa zaala kizin .
20007026	Pa zin wal ta titop la kizin na , sorok som . Tikazas wal boozo kat ma timetmeete .
20007027	Zaala biibi ta isula pa naala na , kwoono imbot kat ta ndeete kizin uunu na . Tana zin wal ta so tito zaala kizin , nako tisula kizin wal meeteŋan .
20008001	Ŋgar ambaiŋana , ina kembei moori ambaiŋana ta imbotmbot , mi ipaŋarairai kalŋaana ma iboboobo iti tomtom be tala kini , bekena ipaute iti pa ŋgar iŋgoi ta ambai ma ilip .
20008002	Ni ikewe piti som . Imbotmbot sala lele mbukuunu ta igarau zaala biibi na , mi isu ma imendernder la zaala boogoŋan tomini .
20008003	Mi ilala pa zaala kwoono , mi ipaŋarairai kalŋaana ma izzo ta kembei :
20008004	“ O niom iwal biibi ki toono , nio iŋgi aŋboboobo yom be kamar ma keleŋ sua tio ti .
20008005	Niom wal ta leyom ŋgar biibi som na , kamar tio . Naso aŋuulu yom be kakam kat ŋgar . Niom wal kankaanaŋoyom ta kozorzooro na , kamar tio bekena aŋuulu yom ma kikilaala ŋgar iŋgoi ta ambai ma ilip na .
20008006	Keleŋ sua tio ti . Pa nio leŋ ŋgar ambaimbaiŋan boozomen be aŋso yom pa . Sua ta iwedet pa kwoŋ na , indeŋdeeŋe men .
20008007	Sua sananŋana sa irao ipet pa kwoŋ na som . Som kat . Sua tio , ina ŋonoono men .
20008008	Sua boozomen ta iwedet pa kwoŋ na , sa ipaŋoobo som . Indeŋdeeŋe men .
20008009	Zin wal ta ŋgar kizin ipet kek na , tikilaala kembei sua tio ta boozomen izal men . Zin wal ta len ŋgar na , tiute : Sua tio , ina ambai men .
20008010	Kakam ŋgar pa pat silba pepe . Kakan la sua tio pazalŋana . Pa ina ilip pa pat silba . Mi ŋgar ambaiŋana tabe aŋso yom pa i , ta kembena . Ilip pa gol ta ambaimbaiŋan kat . Tana kakam ma iwe leyom .
20008011	Pa ŋgar ambaiŋana , ina ilip pa pat milmilŋan ta kan kadon bibip i . Koroŋ boozomen ta leleyom pa i , sa irao iuulu yom kembei ŋgar ambaiŋana na som . ”
20008012	Ŋgar ambaiŋana izzo ta kembei : “ Nio aŋbotmbot raama ŋgar ta iurur ŋonoono . Pa aŋkam kat ŋgar kek . Tana aŋrao be aŋpaute yom pa so mbulu tabe kakam i .
20008013	Tomtom ta so imototo Yooba mi ileŋleŋ la kalŋaana , nako iurur koi pa mbulu sananŋana . Mi nio ta kembena . Mbulu ki pakurŋana mi repiiliŋana , ramaki mbulu sananŋan mi sua pakamkaamŋan ta boozomen na , leleŋ pa ri sa som kat .
20008014	Nio aŋrao be aŋso yom pa ŋgar ambaiŋana , mi aŋuulu uraata tiom ma iur ŋonoono . Pa leŋ ŋgar ambaiŋana mi mburoŋ biibi .
20008015	Nio aŋuluulu zin king mi wal peeze kan be tikam kat peeze , mibe tiur tutu ndeeŋeŋan men pizin tomtom .
20008016	Nio aŋuluulu zin bibip be timboro kat zin tomtom , mibe tiurpe pataŋana kizin ma indeeŋe men .
20008017	Zin wal ta so tiurur lelen pio , na nio aŋurur leleŋ pizin . Mi zin wal ta so tikam kinkiini be tiru yo , nako tindeeŋe yo .
20008018	Sombe nio aŋbotmbot raama tomtom sa , na ni ko ikam le koroŋ ndabokbokŋan boozomen mi zaana iwe biibi . Ni ko iute zaala ndeeŋeŋana tabe irao kat pa le koroŋ . Mi koroŋ kini ko imbotmbot ambai ma molo .
20008019	Ŋonoono ambaimbaiŋan ta aŋpiyotyooto na , ilip pa gol ma silba ta iŋgeeze kat na .
20008020	Mi zaala ta aŋtoto , ina ndeeŋeŋana . Zin wal ta so titoto zaala tio , nako tirao be tiurpe pataŋana kizin tomtom ma indeeŋe men .
20008021	Zin wal ta so tiurur lelen pio , na aŋkamam len koroŋ boozomen . Tabe ruumu leleene kizin tau titiurkewe koroŋ kizin ambaimbaiŋan ilelala pa i na , bokbok .
20008022	Indeeŋe ta matapopo ten na , Yooba iur yo ma aŋpet muŋgu , mana imaŋga pa uraata kini be iur koroŋ ta boozomen .
20008023	Muŋgu kat , indeeŋe toono ipet zen na , ni iur yo ma aŋpet .
20008024	Mazwaana ta ni ipiyooto yo na , tai imbotmbot som . Mi yok lepenlepen ta yok irereere pa i ta kembena . Timbotmbot som . Mi abal ma dogo ta boozomen tomini , tipet zen .
20008025	
20008026	Indeeŋe ta Yooba iur toono , su , mi ululu zen na , nio aŋbotmbot raami . Mazwaana tana , ni iur saamba , mi iut ma imbot ndel pa yok ta imbot meleebe na .
20008027	
20008028	Mi iur gubur tiene ma isala kor , mi iyaraama yok ta imbot meleebe na , mi iur mbut pa . Kokena izooro tutu kini mi ilol toono . Mi ŋgar kini iur pa lele tabe toono imbot pa i , mana iur toono ma ipet , mi ipombol uunu ma imbol .
20008029	
20008030	Indeeŋe tana , nio aŋbotmbot zilŋaana uunu , mi aŋkamam peeze pa uraata ta boozomen tana . Pa nio nomoŋ mosŋoŋ . Aigule ta boozomen , nio aŋbotmbot su kereene uunu na , menmeen yo mi aŋzeŋzeeŋge .
20008031	Pa leleŋ ambai kat pa toono ramaki ka koroŋ ta boozomen , mi menmeen yo pizin tomtom tomini .
20008032	Tana lutuŋŋan , kuur talŋoyom pio . Pa zin wal ta so matan iŋgalŋgal zaala tio mi titoto , nako lelen ambai kat mi kampeŋana ki Anutu imbotmbot se kizin .
20008033	Sua ta aŋkam piom na , keleŋtut pepe . Keleŋ la mi koto . Naso kakam leyom ŋgar ambaiŋana .
20008034	Zin wal tau timbotmbot ruumu tio kwoono pa aigule ta boozomen mi tinamnaama bekena aŋso zin pa ŋgar ambaiŋana , mi tileŋleŋ la sua tio na , zin ko lelen ambai kat mi kampeŋana ki Anutu imbotmbot se kizin .
20008035	Pa tomtom ta so indeeŋe yo , nako ikam mbotŋana ambaiŋana , mi Yooba leleene pini .
20008036	Tamen tomtom ta so iru yo ma som , ina ni imbel itunu . Mi wal boozomen ta lelen pio som mi tiurur koi pio , na zin lelen be timeete .
20009001	Ŋgar ambaiŋana , ni ipo le ruumu kek , mi isap nasil lamata mi ru ta mosŋan na , mi ipamender zin ma tiliu ruumu kini bekena ipeŋgeeze ruumu .
20009002	Mi iurpe buzur mi yok baen ambaiŋana , mi iur se mbalia , mi iparaŋraŋ bekena tomtom tikan mi tiwin .
20009003	Mi iŋgo zin mbesooŋo moori kini ma tisala lele mbukuunu ta igarau kar na , bekena tiboboobo la pizin tomtom be timar pa kini kanŋana .
20009004	Mi zin wal ta ŋgar kizin ipet zen na , ni izzo pizin ta kembei : “ Ai , niom wal ta leyom ŋgar biibi som na , niom ta boozomen kamar ruumu tio .
20009005	Pa kini mi yok baen , ta aŋurpe ma imap kek . Kamar ma kakan mi kiwin .
20009006	Kezem mbulu tiom kankaanaŋana ma imborene . Naso kombot ambai . Koto zaala ki ŋgar ambaiŋana . ”
20009007	Zin wal ta tipakurkur zitun mi tirepilpiili ŋgar ambaiŋana na , sombe tomtom sa itoombo be ipazal zin , nako tipiri sua sananŋana pini . Mi sombe tayaamba zin wal sananŋan , nako tipekel sua sananŋana kat piti ma kanda miaŋ !
20009008	Tana zin wal ta tipakurkur zitun mi tirepilpiili ŋgar ambaiŋana na , toombo be pazal zin pepe . Kokena tiur koi pu . Mi tomtom ta le ŋgar ambaiŋana , to pazali . Pa ni ko leleene ambai pa sua ku pazalŋana mi iur leleene pu .
20009009	Zin wal ta len ŋgar ambaiŋana na , sombe so zin pa sua ambaiŋana , nako tikam len ŋgar pakan ma isala ki . Mi tomtom ndeeŋeŋana ta kembena . Sombe paute i , nako iseeŋge ŋgar kini .
20009010	Mbulu tau tomototo Yooba mi teleŋleŋ la kalŋaana , ina ŋgar ambaiŋana uunu ŋonoono . Pa sombe tuute kat Anutu ta potomŋana i , inako tarao be tikilaala kat ŋgar iŋgoi ta ambai ma ilip .
20009011	Ŋgar ambaiŋana ko iseeŋge swom ma molo . Ko ikam ma kom ndaama boozo , mana meete .
20009012	Tana nu sombe to ŋgar ambaiŋana , nako iuulu u ma biibi . Mi sombe pakurkur itum mi zorzooro , na kozo re u . Pa mbulu ku tana ko ipasaanu .
20009013	Ŋgar kankaanaŋana , ina kembei moori ta le ŋgar somŋana , mi irao iyaraama itunu som , mi kalŋaana izalla sorok .
20009014	Ikewe piti som . Imbutultul su ruumu kini kwoono bekena iboboobo la pizin tomtom be tila kini . Mi ilala mbalia kini ta imbotmbot sala lele mbukuunu ta igarau kar na tomini be iboboobo zin tomtom .
20009015	Zin wal ta matan iŋgalŋgal zaala ambaiŋana be titoto na , ni iboboobo la pizin bekena iyaaru zin ma tizem zaala ambaiŋana .
20009016	Mi zin wal ta ŋgar kizin ipet zen na , ni izzo pizin ta kembei : “ Ai , niom wal ta leyom ŋgar biibi som na , niom ta boozomen kamar ruumu tio .
20009017	Pa yok ta so takam kuumbu pa i , ina inamut kat . Mi kini ta so tekewe mi takanan , ina ikamam ŋgurende . ”
20009018	Tamen zin wal ta tileŋ la kalŋaana ma tila kini na , tikilaala som . Zin wal ta so tiwe leembe kini , na kaimer ko timetmeete ma tisula len naala .
20010001	Iŋgi sua tutŋana mi sua tooroŋan pakan ki King Salumo . Naŋgaŋ sa , sombe le ŋgar ambaiŋana , nako ikam ma tamaana leleene ambai . Mi zin naŋgaŋ kankaanaŋan ta tizorzooro , nako tikam ma nan bizin lelen ipata .
20010002	Iti irao takam lende koroŋ boozomen pa zaala sananŋana . Tamen koroŋ tana ko irao iuulu kat iti na som . Mi mbulu ndeeŋeŋana na , itatkewe iti pa meeteŋana .
20010003	Wal ndeeŋeŋan na , Yooba irao izem zin ma tikan peteele na som . Mi koroŋ ta wal sananŋan lelen pa i na , ni ipiŋgisŋgis pizin .
20010004	Sombe namanda ikamam kat uraata som , nako tombot ŋoobo . Mi sombe namanda ikamam kat uraata , nako lende koroŋ boozo .
20010005	Sombe mazwaana ki mai ipet , mi lutundu bizin tikam uraata ma tiyo kanda kini , ina iswe kembei zin len ŋgar ambaiŋana . Mi sombe tikenne mi timbombooren , ina tipamiaŋ ti .
20010006	Wal ndeeŋeŋan na , kampeŋana matakiŋa imbotmbot se kizin . Mi wal sananŋan na , tizzwe malmal tabe tikam i som . Titurkewe .
20010007	Sombe wal ndeeŋeŋan timeete , na tomtom matan lala pa mbulu kizin ambaiŋana mi tipakurkur Anutu pa . Mi wal sananŋan na , zan ko isaana ma isaana kat .
20010008	Wal ta len ŋgar ambaiŋana na , sombe tutut zin , nako tileŋ la kalŋanda . Mi wal kankaanaŋan ta tizorzooro mi kwon perper sorok na , zin ko tisaana ma tila len .
20010009	Tomtom ta so ipa pai kini ma ambai men , na kosasa ko irao be ipasaana kati na som . Tamen zin wal ta tipaŋobŋoobo pa zaala ambaiŋana na , kaimer mbulu kizin ta tikamam ki keŋana na , ko imbot kat mat mi tomtom tiute .
20010010	Zin wal ta matan iparkinmeete pizin na , kaimer ko tikam mbulu sa mi tikam pataŋana piti . Mi wal kankaanaŋan ta tizorzooro mi kwon perper sorok na , zin ko tisaana ma tila len .
20010011	Sua kizin wal ndeeŋeŋan , ina kembei yok lepeene . Pa iuluulu zin tomtom be timbot ambai . Mi zin wal sananŋan na , tizzwe malmal tabe tikam i som . Titurkewe .
20010012	Mbulu ki tuurur koi , ina ikamam ma ŋoŋi imbotmbot la mazwanda . Mi sombe tuurur lelende pizin tomtom , nako matanda mbiriizikaala sanaana kizin , mi takam ŋgar pa mini som .
20010013	Zin wal tau tikilaala ŋgar iŋgoi ta ambai ma ilip na , kwon ipiyotyooto ŋgar ambaiŋana men . Mi zin wal ta len ŋgar somŋan na , teene ko ikan zin !
20010014	Zin wal ta len ŋgar ambaiŋana na , gorgori tirru ŋgar pakan be isala ki . Mi wal kankaanaŋan ta tizorzooro na , molo som to sua sananŋana ta iwedet pa kwon na , ko ipasaana zin .
20010015	Zin wal ta len koroŋ boozo na , tipase pa pat ma koroŋ kizin be iporoukaala zin pa pataŋana . Mi zin wal sorrokŋan ta len koroŋ som mi timbot ŋoobo na , pataŋana kizin tana ko ipun zin ma tisaana kat .
20010016	Kadoono ta wal ndeeŋeŋan tikamam pa uraata kizin , ina iuluulu zin be tikam mbotŋana ambaiŋana . Mi kadoono ta wal sananŋan tikamam pa uraata kizin , ina tiwirri sorok pa koroŋ sananŋan men .
20010017	Tomtom ta so ileŋleŋ la sua pazalŋana , na imbotmbot la zaala ki mbotŋana ambaiŋana kek . Mi zin wal tau tileŋtut sua pazalŋana , nako tiyaaru zin tomtom pakan ma tipaŋoobo pa zaala ambaiŋana .
20010018	Tomtom ta so iurur koi pu mi ikiskis la leleene , nako kwoono ipakamkaam . Mi tomtom ta so ileŋ sua ŋgalŋana sa mi ila ma izzo pizin wal pakan , na ni tomtom kankaanaŋana .
20010019	Sombe nu kwom suaŋom , na re u . Pa nu kola kam sanaana . Irao kam som na som . Mi tomtom ta so imborro kat kwoono , na ni tomtom ŋgarŋana .
20010020	Sua ta iwedet pa wal ndeeŋeŋan kwon , ina kembei pat silba ta tomtom lelen pa ilip . Tamen ŋgar ta imbotmbot la wal sananŋan lelen , ina ŋono somŋana .
20010021	Sua ta iwedet pa wal ndeeŋeŋan kwon , ina iuluulu tomtom boozomen be timbot ambai . Mi wal kankaanaŋan ta tizorzooro na , tikam kat ŋgar som . Tana kaimer ko timetmeete ma tila len .
20010022	Kampeŋana ki Yooba , ta ikamam lende koroŋ boozomen . Mi koroŋ ta so ni ikam piti , nako ka pataŋana sa som .
20010023	Wal kankaanaŋan ta tizorzooro na , sombe lelen iurur pa mbulu sananŋana sa , to ikam zin ma lelen ambai mi menmeen zin . Mi tomtom ta so ŋgar kini ipet kek , na ŋgar ambaiŋana ta ikami ma leleene ambai .
20010024	Koroŋ ta wal sananŋan timototo , ta ko ipet pizin . Mi koroŋ ta wal ndeeŋeŋan lelen pa na , Yooba ko ikam pizin .
20010025	Pataŋana biibi ko ipambiriizi zin wal sananŋan . Tamen wal ndeeŋeŋan ko timendernder mbolŋana ma alok .
20010026	Zin wal ta so tiŋgo tomtom maolŋana ma ila be ikam uraata , nako lelen ambai som . Ko kembei koroŋ ta ikam ma zoŋon imenel , mi you ka koi ila matan .
20010027	Sombe tomototo Yooba mi teleŋleŋ la kalŋaana , nako iseeŋge swondo ma molo . Tamen ni iyembutmbut wal sananŋan swon bekena timeete ma tila len karau men .
20010028	Koroŋ ambaimbaiŋan ta wal ndeeŋeŋan tiurur matan pa na , zin kola tire mi menmeen zin pa . Mi wal sananŋan na som . Koroŋ ta tiurur matan pa na , zin ko tirao be tire na som .
20010029	Yooba , ni iwe kembei siiri mbolŋana pizin wal ndeeŋeŋan be tike lela . Tamen ipasansaana zin wal sananŋan .
20010030	Wal ndeeŋeŋan , zin kembei ke mbolŋana ta irao be imuzu na som . Mi wal sananŋan na , zin ko tirao be timbot pa toono ta Yooba ikam pa wal kini na som . Ni ko iziiri zin ma tila len .
20010031	Wal ndeeŋeŋan na , kwon ipiyotyooto ŋgar ambaiŋana men . Mi zin wal ta kwon ipiyotyooto sua sananŋana na , Yooba ko ipasaana zin ma tila len bekena ipumun kwon .
20010032	Wal ndeeŋeŋan matan iŋgalŋgal be tiso sua ambaiŋana men . Mi wal sananŋan na , sua soroksorok men ta iwedet pa kwon .
20011001	Mbulu ki tapakaam zin tomtom mi tawatke lende koroŋ kizin na , Yooba leleene pa ri sa som . Tana iti sombe takam ŋgomo pa koroŋ sa , na tere be tuur kadoono ma irao kat pa ka kin . Pa Yooba leleene pa mbulu ta kembei . Kokena tasala mete .
20011002	Tomtom ta so ipakurkuri ma iso ni irao , na kaimer ko ka miaŋ . Mi tomtom ta so ikototo itunu , nako ikam le ŋgar ambaiŋana .
20011003	Zin wal ta lelen ŋgeezeŋan na , lelen be tipa pai kizin ma ambai men . Mi ŋgar tana ta ikamam peeze pizin . Tamen zin wal ta so tisu mini mi tiur koi pa zitun wal kizin na , mbulu kizin pakaamŋana ko ipasaana zin .
20011004	Anutu isombe iswe kete malmalŋana kini ma ipet kat mat , na koroŋ boozomen ta wal sananŋan tindoundou na , ko irao iuulu zin ri sa som . Tamen mbulu ndeeŋeŋana , ina ikamkewe iti pa meeteŋana .
20011005	Zin wal ta len uunu sa isaana som na , mbulu kizin ndeeŋeŋana ta iurpewe zaala pizin . Mi zin wal sananŋan na , mbulu kizin sananŋana ta ipasansaana zin .
20011006	Zin wal ta lelen ŋgeezeŋan na , mbulu kizin ndeeŋeŋana itatkewe zin pa pataŋana kizin . Tamen zin wal pakamkaamŋan ta so tisu mini mi tiur koi pa zitun wal kizin na , koroŋ ta zin lelen pa i ko iwe kembei kilis pizin mi ikeene zin .
20011007	Wal sananŋan tipase pa zitun mburan , mi tiso ko tikam len koroŋ boozo . Tamen sombe timeete , na tisula len naala raama ŋgar kizin tana . Tabe koroŋ ta tiurur matan pa i , na tire ka ŋonoono som .
20011008	Pataŋana tabe ikam zin wal ndeeŋeŋan na , Anutu ipiŋgisŋgis ma ila izze kizin wal sananŋan .
20011009	Tomtom ta so ikamam ŋgar pa Anutu som , na kwoono ko ipasansaana waene bizin . Mi wal ndeeŋeŋan na , ŋgar kizin izzo zin pa zaala tabe tiko pa pataŋana kizin .
20011010	Sombe wal ndeeŋeŋan timbot ambai , na kar kan ko menmeen zin . Mi sombe zin wal sananŋan tisaana ma tila len , ina tomini ikam zin tomtom ma lelen ambai .
20011011	Kampeŋana ta imbotmbot se kizin wal ŋgeezeŋan na , ikamam ma kar niini ise . Mi sua ta iwedet pa wal sananŋan kwon , ta ipasansaana kar .
20011012	Zin wal ta len ŋgar somŋan na , kwon pasomsom waen bizin pakan . Mi tomtom ta so ikam kat ŋgar , nako imborro kat kwoono .
20011013	Zin wal ta tininin kao na , tilala ma tizzwe sua turkeŋana kizin tomtom . Mi tomtom ŋonoono na , ni irao iswe sua turkeŋana ki waene bizin pakan na som . Tana iti irao tendemeeri .
20011014	Sombe zin bibip ki lele sa tikamam kat peeze som , nako lele tana isaana . Mi sombe wal boozomen tiuluulu zin bibip tana pa ŋgar , nako lele tana imbot ambai .
20011015	Tomtom ta so imbuk sua be imender pa tomtom toro mi ikot mbun kini , nako indeeŋe pataŋana . Tana nu sombe lelem be mbot ambai , na mbuk sua ta kembei pepe !
20011016	Moori sa , sombe mbulu kini irao pa tomtom lelen , nako ikam zaana biibi . Mi zin wal ta tikamam zaaba pizin tomtom na , tikamam len pat men . Koroŋ toro sa som .
20011017	Tomtom ta so iurur leleene pa wal kini mi ikampewe zin , na iuluulu itunu . Mi tomtom ta so imuŋaiŋai zin tomtom som , ina ni ipasansaana itunu .
20011018	Kadoono ta wal sananŋan tikamam pa uraata kizin , ina ŋono somŋana . Mi tomtom ta so iwaswaaza mbulu ndeeŋeŋana , na kadoono tabe ikam i , ina koroŋ ŋonoono .
20011019	Tomtom ta so ikam kinkiini be ito mbulu ndeeŋeŋana , nako ikam mbotŋana ambaiŋana . Mi zin wal ta tirru zaala pa mbulu sananŋana , nako timetmeete ma tila len .
20011020	Zin wal ta tikamam ŋgar sananŋana na , Yooba leleene pizin ri sa som kat . Mi zin wal ta tipa pai kizin ma ambai men na , ni leleene pizin ilip .
20011021	Lelem iwe ru pepe . Wal sananŋan na , Anutu irao ileele zin na som . Zin kola tire kadoono pa mbulu kizin . Mi wal ndeeŋeŋan ziŋan popoŋan kizin na , zin len uunu sa isaana som . Tana pataŋana sa ko irao ikam zin na som .
20011022	Moori ta so ruŋguunu ambai , mi tamen ipizil ndemeene pa mbulu ambaiŋana , ina kembei aigau ta izuk koroŋ buzaanaŋana .
20011023	Wal ndeeŋeŋan lelen pa koroŋ ambaimbaiŋan men . Tana kaimer zin ko tindeeŋe kampeŋana ambaiŋana . Mi wal sananŋan na , tiurur matan pa koroŋ sananŋan men . Tana kaimer Anutu kete malmalŋana kini ko ikam kat zin .
